10102.Content: 嗯，这个缺口的切角好整齐，感觉刚好可以插进一把剑

10103.Content: 我来试试...果然，刚好没过剑身，像是个“钥匙孔”。

10202.Content: （远处传来了一声闷响，接着眼前的石门缓缓打开）

10203.Content: 原来这把剑就是开门的钥匙

10301.Content: 还是先把剑拔出来吧，这是我们仅存的武器了

10302.Content: 嗯，我再去四周看看有什么出口

10501.Content: 我是路人NPC看向功能测试台本

10502.Content: 我是路人NPC转向功能测试台本

1000101.Content: 村子可能还是很危险，一定要小心。

1000201.Content: 自投罗网么？简直愚钝得可爱。

10010105.Content: 再歇息一会儿吧。我就在这里，哪儿都不去。
10010105.Subtitle: Get some more sleep. I won't leave — I'll be right here when you wake up.

10010106.Content: 不用了。我们回去吧，下山。
10010106.Subtitle: It's okay. We should head back. Let's get down the mountain.

10010107.Content: 现在就回村子吗？可这两天那边一直传来吼声……
10010107.Subtitle: You wanna go back to the village now? But there've been roars coming from that direction these past few days...

10010108.Content: 我是想，如果能回家拿到武器——
10010108.Subtitle: I was thinking, if we could make it home and grab our weapons—

10010109.Content: 凭你的力量，一定能找到生路。
10010109.Subtitle: And with your strength, you'll find a way out.

10010110.Content: 留在这里……也不会有人来救我们的，不是么？
10010110.Subtitle: No one's going to save us no matter how long we stay here anyway.

10010114.Content: 你的伤还没好吧，要不要紧？
10010114.Subtitle: You're not fully recovered. Are you sure you can do this?

10010115.Content: 早就没事了，区区几道沟而已。
10010115.Subtitle: I'm okay. It's just a few scratches.

10010116.Content: 别逞强。不要还没遇到秽兽，先用光了力气。
10010116.Subtitle: Don't push yourself too hard. We still have to save some strength for those Filthoids.

10010201.Content: 想活命，就如实交代清楚。
10010201.Subtitle: Tell me the truth if you want to live.

10010202.Content: 为什么在这里，你的同伴是什么人。
10010202.Subtitle: Why are you here, who's with you,

10010203.Subtitle: and who on earth are you?

10010301.Content: 我们现在赤手空拳，尽可能避开它们吧。

10010401.Content: 拿好你手里那把剑，兴许会派上用场。
10010401.Subtitle: Take that sword with you. It might be helpful one day.

10010402.Content: 保护好自己，秽兽交给我。
10010402.Subtitle: Keep yourself safe. I'll take care of these Filthoids.

10010501.Content: 拿起剑的时候，熟悉而陌生的记忆涌上来……

10010502.Content: ……已经很久没有像这样战斗过了。

10010701.Content: 啧，他们还真是……一条船都没剩下。
10010701.Subtitle: Ugh, they didn't leave even one single boat.

10010702.Content: 秽兽来的时候，你还在村子里吧？如果不是折回去找我，你本可以一起逃走的。
10010702.Subtitle: You were at the village when the Filthoids came, weren't you? If it wasn't for coming back for me, you could have escaped with them.

10010703.Content: 别说蠢话，换你在这儿也一样。我们先沿着海岸找找有没有旧一些的船。
10010703.Subtitle: Don't be silly. You'd have done the same for me. Let's search along the shore and see if there's any old boats or something.

10010704.Content: 别说傻话。我们先沿着海岸找找有没有废旧的船。

10010801.Content: 这是……大家逃跑时落下的吗？
10010801.Subtitle: Look... Someone must have lost them when they ran away.

10010802.Content: 嗯，带上吧，多做些准备总是好的。
10010802.Subtitle: Hmm, let's grab one. It's always good to be well-armed.

10011002.Content: {nickname}，等下不要离我太远。必要的话，就用我们的暗号。
10011002.Subtitle: Stay close, Phoxhunter. If necessary, give out the secret signals.

10011003.Content: 还记得吗？之前上山时为了不惊动野兽约定的暗号。
10011003.Subtitle: We made them up earlier so as not to alert the beasts up the mountain, remember?

10011005.Content: 嗯，我再确认一遍。轻拍右肩两下的意思是？
10011005.Subtitle: Alright, a quick check — Two pats on the right shoulder means...?

10011007.Content: 轻敲心口两次的意思是？
10011007.Subtitle: And two taps on the chest?

10011011.Content: 好。最后一个——连续眨眼三次是？
10011011.Subtitle: Good. And the last one — three quick blinks?

10011013.Content: 记住，连续眨眼三次的意思是——
10011013.Subtitle: Remember, three quick blinks means—

10011014.Content: 别说了，我不感兴趣，说了也记不住的。
10011014.Subtitle: ...I'm not interested in that signal, and I won't remember it anyway.

10011103.Content: 这里，曾有人给我们留下了那艘会飞的船。
10011103.Subtitle: Someone once left that flying ship here.

10011201.Content: 听着，把你身上那把剑，插进这里。
10011201.Subtitle: Listen, wedge your sword right in there.

10011301.Subtitle: So the key is... this sword?

10011302.Content: 嗯，你的剑从来不是伤人用的。
10011302.Subtitle: Yes. Your sword was not made for slashing.

10011401.Content: 一路向上走到山顶，那里以前有一架飞艇。如果它还在，我们就有机会离开这里。
10011401.Subtitle: Let's head towards the top of the mountain. There used to be an airship there. If it's still around, we might be able to make it out.

10011502.Content: 还有人在那里……我们得救了吗？

10011601.Content: 找了这么多年，军团长该死心了吧。
10011601.Subtitle: We've been searching for years. When will the chief give up this pointless hunt?

10011604.Content: 你们已经被海伯利亚十三军团包围了！
10011604.Subtitle: You're now surrounded by the Hyperborean 13th Legion!

10011607.Content: 军团……还是找到了这儿吗……
10011607.Subtitle: The Legion... They found their way here...

10011609.Subtitle: They must be up to something.

10011701.Content: 这就是“情报无误”？兰迪，你信誓旦旦保证的。
10011701.Subtitle: Is this your idea of "accurate intel," Randy? You gave me your word.

10011702.Content: 士兵们真的尽力了，岛上的秽兽群的确是预料外的状况。但是今天并不算一无所获。
10011702.Subtitle:
The soldiers did their best with the Filthoids. These are indeed unforeseen circumstances.\
But we did find something valuable on this island today—

10011703.Content: 我们在这儿找到了她使用过的炼金设施，还有一艘有军团编号的飞艇……
10011703.Subtitle: Alchemical tools she has used and an airship with a Legion serial number on it.

10011704.Content: 你应该知道我们找的是“零号”，不是这堆破铜烂铁！
10011704.Subtitle: You realise we're looking for "No. 0," not this useless junk, right?

10011705.Content: 十几年过去了，确实比较困难……不过，海上分队已经拦截了逃亡村民的船只，说不定能问出什——
10011705.Subtitle:
We've been searching for over a decade... But our maritime unit intercepted several of the villagers' vessels.\
They might be able to dig up some—

10011902.Content: 你们只是“无端”遭遇秽兽袭击，“一无所知”地来到这座遗迹，又“凑巧”打开遗迹通道的“普通”村民——对吗？
10011902.Subtitle:
The Filthoids attacked you "for no reason" after you came here,\
and you managed to open the hidden path "by chance"... Is that really your story?

10011903.Subtitle: We're telling the truth! Let her go!

10011905.Content: 西比尔军团长。根据脊椎的形态初步判定
10011905.Subtitle: Chief Sibylle, we've checked her spine and confirmed it...

10011906.Content: 这个女孩正是当年失踪的“零号”。
10011906.Subtitle: She's the "No. 0" we've been looking for.

10011908.Content: “命运女神”，终究还是选择了我。
10011908.Subtitle: Fortune has finally smiled upon me.

10011912.Subtitle: Your power... the power of Resonance...

10011913.Content: 如果你渴望拯救这一切……
10011913.Subtitle: If you wish to save all this...

10012001.Subtitle: Hang in there! I got you...

10012003.Content: 停手吧，零号。再坚硬的兵刃，也会有折断的一刻。
10012003.Subtitle: Give it up, No. 0. Even the toughest blade has its breaking point.

10012004.Content: 跟我回去。你会活着——你在乎的那个{性别：少年|小姑娘}也一样。
10012004.Subtitle: Come back with me, and you'll live — so will this kid you care so much about.

10012005.Content: 否则，{性别：他|她}的性命就——
10012005.Subtitle: Otherwise, Phoxhunter will—

10012008.Content: 我跟你回去，你放{性别：他|她}走。
10012008.Subtitle: I'll go back with you, but you have to promise to let Phoxhunter go.

10012009.Content: 说啊！否则你就带着我们两个的尸骸回去！
10012009.Subtitle: Give me your word! Or, you can only take two corpses back!

10012010.Content: 你误会了。这不是谈判，是命令。
10012010.Subtitle: Perhaps I wasn't clear — This is not a negotiation, it's an order.

10012013.Subtitle: Get out of here, and live.

10012015.Content: {nickname}，我来考考你。“眨眼三次”这个暗号——
10012015.Subtitle: Quick question, Phoxhunter. The "three quick blinks" means—

10012016.Content: 用不着贝蕾提醒，我早记住啦！眨眼三次的意思是……
10012016.Subtitle: I know, I know! I've got this, Berry. Three quick blinks means...

10012017.Content: “即使只剩一个人，你也要坚强地活下去。”
10012017.Subtitle: "Even if left all alone, you should be brave and live on."

10012102.Content: 零号的力量明明还未解放，为什么……
10012102.Subtitle: No. 0 isn't supposed to release all her powers yet. Why is she...?

10012103.Content: 不……这不是零号自身的力量，而是他人赋予的“和鸣之力”。
10012103.Subtitle: No, that's not her power, it's Resonance.

10012104.Content: ……她护着的小鬼……是“和鸣之力”新的宿体？
10012104.Subtitle: ...That brat she's protecting... that's the new receptacle for Resonance?

10012105.Content: 它于此时、此地重现，究竟意味着什么……
10012105.Subtitle: It made its appearance again here... What does this truly implies...

10012302.Content: 好多了，只是还有些头晕……

10012401.Content: 这里好像有什么人生活过。
10012401.Subtitle: It seems someone used to live here.

10012402.Content: 我猜，这是贝蕾曾经的家，对吗？
10012402.Subtitle: This was your home, am I right, Berry?

10012404.Content: ……是的，不止是我。这里是“我们”曾经的家。
10012404.Subtitle: ...Yes, and no. It was OUR home.

10012405.Content: 我们？可我什么都想不起来。
10012405.Subtitle: Our home? But I don't remember a thing.

10012406.Content: ……没关系，这样更好。等逃出去，我们会建起新的家。
10012406.Subtitle: ...It's okay. Maybe it's all for the best. After we make it out, we'll build a new home.

10012601.Content: 净界岛上的小村，我和贝蕾妮卡一起长大的地方。

10012602.Content: 这些叫做秽兽的怪物究竟从何而来，我们也无从得知；

10012603.Content: 只知道，昔日宁和的村庄，一夜之间变成了这副模样。

10012701.Content: 你回来了。{nickname}……我的半身、我的倒影、我的回声。
10012701.Subtitle: You're back, ... My other half, my reflection, and my echo.

10012702.Content: 你听到了我的声音。你找回了那份属于你的力量。“和鸣”。
10012702.Subtitle: You heard my voice and retrieved the power that belongs to you. The "Resonance."

10012703.Content: 这份力量什么都没能改变。我掉进了海里，不会再醒来，都结束了。
10012703.Subtitle: This power didn't change anything. I fell into the sea and I'll never wake up again. It's all over.

10012704.Content: 不。我能看见，你的未来、我们的未来……绝非止步于此。
10012704.Subtitle: No, I can see it — your future, our future... it doesn't end here.

10012705.Content: 会有人将你从苦涩的海水中打捞出来，带向一片苦寒的荒原，命运将在那里降下真正的淬炼。
10012705.Subtitle: Someone will pluck you from the briny waters and lead you to a frozen wilderness, where destiny will pose the ultimate test.

10012706.Subtitle: Are you saying... I'm still alive?

10012707.Content: ……时间到了。让我给你最后一份助力吧。
10012707.Subtitle: ...The time has come. Let me offer you one last gift.

10012709.Content: 这些砂砾是你我二人的，连接着过去、现在、与未来的“记忆”。
10012709.Subtitle: These sands are our shared memories, bridging the past, present, and future.

10012710.Content: 从中寻觅吧……寻觅那些我们或许已经熟悉，或许将在未来相遇的身影。
10012710.Subtitle: Sift through them... and seek out those we may have known, or those we are destined to meet.

10012711.Content: 愿他们成为你此行的助力。
10012711.Subtitle: May they be your strength on your journey.

10012713.Content: ……{nickname}。生命是航行在无尽长夜里的孤船。河流泪水满溢，夹岸荆棘丛生。
10012713.Subtitle: ...Phoxhunter. Life is like a lonely cruise through the boundless darkness of the night. The river weeps, overflowing its banks, while the thorny thickets on either side stand as a testament to its sorrow.

10012714.Content: 我会一直注视着……彼岸的你，将驶向何方。
10012714.Subtitle: I'll keep watching over you, The One Across the Shore... to see where you're going.

10012801.Content: 这是我第一次来科赛托斯省。看来这里的待客之道，颇为独特啊。
10012801.Subtitle: This is my first time in Cocytus Province. Is this how the people here show their hospitality?

10012802.Content: 我没有任何恶意，只是想同你做一笔……小小的交易。
10012802.Subtitle: I don't want to bother you, I just want to... strike a small "bargain."

10012803.Content: 我会付给你无法拒绝的报酬，而你要做的，非常简单。
10012803.Subtitle: I'll pay you whatever you want, and all you have to do, well, it will be a piece of cake.

10017901.Content: 飞艇在山顶。稍微修整一下，就继续往上走吧。
10017901.Subtitle: The ship is at the mountaintop. After a short break, we'll push on.

10017902.Content: ……这么快，就要和净界岛告别了。
10017902.Subtitle: ...Can't believe we'll be saying goodbye to Purgatorio Island soon.

10017903.Subtitle: ...You creatures just can't give us a break, can you?

10018201.Content: 那天，在毁灭之前，我睁开双眼。瞳孔所见之景，是“无限”。

10018202.Content: 第一次，我感受到了，我是如此真实地活着。

10018301.Content: 下坠。我本应朝着漆黑的深渊下坠。

10018302.Content: 但，我却感觉自己在晨雾的怀抱里飘浮。

10018303.Content: 周身被冰冷的触感包围，但意外的是，那种冰冷并不令人恐惧。

10018304.Content: 而是一种，奇特的触感……亲切，甚至令人怀念。

10018401.Content: 回答我的，只有不尽流泻的无垠白沙；以及……
10018401.Subtitle: But up until now, there has been no answer. Only endless flowing quicksand covering my vision, and...

10018901.Content: 出海指望不上了。看来只能试试那个……
10018901.Subtitle: No chance we're leaving by sea. Guess we'll have to count on that thing...

10018902.Content: 听我说，这座岛上其实还有一艘“船”，就在山上的遗迹里。
10018902.Subtitle: Listen, there's actually another "ship" on this island, up in the mountain ruins.

10018904.Content: 嗯，可以飞在天上的“船”。跟我来。
10018904.Subtitle: Yes, a "ship" that flies. Now follow me.

10019001.Content: 村子里什么人声都没有，恐怕他们已经……
10019001.Subtitle: The village is in dead silence. I'm afraid they've probably...

10019003.Content: ……我的意思是，他们大多应该乘船逃走了。
10019003.Subtitle: ...I mean, they've probably scarpered off by boat.

10019004.Content: 抓紧回家拿到武器，然后去码头吧。这里现在还很危险。
10019004.Subtitle: We should hurry home and get the weapons, and then get to the wharf. It's still dangerous here.

10019005.Content: （……我们现在赤手空拳，得尽量避开秽兽。）
10019005.Subtitle: (We're unarmed right now. We have to avoid those Filthoids as much as possible.)

10019006.Content: 还差一点……家就在前面了。
10019006.Subtitle: Almost there. It's up ahead.

10019201.Content: 关于那柄剑……除了它从小就在身边之外，我一无所知。

10019202.Content: 正如我不知道自己从何而来——我没有与贝蕾相遇之前的任何记忆。

10019301.Subtitle: How many of them are there...

10019302.Subtitle: Let's get to the top to shake them off.

10019401.Content: 这是我第一次来科赛托斯省。看来，这里的待客之道颇为独特啊。

10019402.Content: 我没有任何恶意，只是想同你做一笔……小小的交易。

10019403.Content: 我会付给你无法拒绝的报酬，而你要做的，非常简单。

10019502.Content: ？？？：{性别：他|她}和您一样，拥有决定历史轨迹的力量。不要忘记，您的使命。

10019503.Content: ？？？：我会处理。但，现在还不是时候。

10019506.Content: ？？？：“生命是航行在无尽长夜里的孤船。”

10019507.Content: ？？？：“河流泪水满溢，夹岸荆棘丛生。”

10019509.Content: ？？？：“来自彼岸之人，你将驶向何方。”

10025701.Content: 这场逃亡，是从那场奇异的梦开始的；从小到大，我一直重复着相似的梦。
10025701.Subtitle:
This escape was heralded by that odd dream.\
I've been plagued by similar ones all my life.

10025702.Content: 但不容回想，我知道此刻有更急迫的事——
10025702.Subtitle:
But now's not the time for reflection...\
There's something more pressing at the moment—

10025703.Content: 必须和贝蕾妮卡一起逃离这座叫做“净界岛”的小岛，即使这是我们一起长大的地方。
10025703.Subtitle:
Berry and I must flee from this isle known as "Purgatorio Island",\
where we spent our childhoods together.

10025704.Content: 因为我们平静的生活，早已被秽兽的利爪撕碎……
10025704.Subtitle: For the peace we once knew has been torn asunder by the vile claws of Filthoids...

10025802.Content: 看来在我们之前，这里就有人和秽兽战斗过。而且，还没过去太久。
10025802.Subtitle: It seems someone had a fight here with these Filthoids just before we came.

10025803.Content: 难道有村民逃到了这里……不，那扇门是我们打开的才对。
10025803.Subtitle: Could it be one of the villagers... No, we were the first to open that door.

10025804.Content: 不过好在有他帮忙清理，否则秽兽就更难对付了。
10025804.Subtitle: Anyway, thanks to that person, we don't have to deal with these Filthoids ourselves.

10025805.Content: 无论是谁，他的实力都不容小觑。我们也要留心。
10025805.Subtitle: Whoever it was, they're not to be underestimated. We must be vigilant.

10029301.Content: 无数次，螺旋般往复的梦中，我一遍又一遍地问着。
10029301.Subtitle: In my dreams that unfold like a double helix, I've asked myself that question countless times.

10100201.Content: 嗯。活着，能动弹，看起来骨头没断。
10100201.Subtitle: Mmm. Alive and not incapacitated, no broken bones then.

10100202.Content: 你们是……为什么知道我的名字？贝蕾，我们这是在哪——
10100202.Subtitle: Who are you...? How do you know my name? Berry, where are we—

10100204.Content: （得去找贝蕾。如果不用顾虑我的话，她也许能摆脱那些士兵逃走……）
10100204.Subtitle: (I must find Berry. If it weren't for me, she would've managed to escape from those soldiers...)

10100206.Content: 哎，你在发什么呆？<H>白</>和卡米拉可是专门跑了大老远来救你的！先乖乖跟我们进城，不然就要被闲逛的秽兽啪嚓啪嚓吃掉了！
10100206.Subtitle: Hey, are you even listening? Camilla and Snow have come all this way to save you! You better come with us to the city right now, or else you'll soon become a snack for some wandering Filthoids!

10100208.Content: 吓坏了吧？没关系，等下就安全了——<H>冰湖城</>可是海伯利亚北方最大的城市！
10100208.Subtitle: Got a fright, huh? No worries, you'll be safe in a jiffy — Icelake is the largest city in northern Hyperborea!

10100209.Content: 海伯利亚……这里是海伯利亚帝国……？！
10100209.Subtitle: Hyperborea... I'm in the Hyperborean Empire...?!

10100210.Content: 是啊，怎么啦，突然大惊小怪的？
10100210.Subtitle: Well, yeah... What's the big deal?

10100211.Content: 那你们知道一个叫西比尔的女人吗？其他人叫她“军团长”，她应该就在这个国家……我想去找她。
10100211.Subtitle: Do you know this woman called Sibylle? Others refer to her as the "Chief," and she's supposed to be in this country... I need to find her.

10100212.Content: 叫西比尔的人遍地都是，但是被称作“军团长”的只能是那一位。找她？卡戎之民无惧严寒，你是怎么把脑子冻坏的？
10100212.Subtitle: Sibylle is a common name, but there's only one that's linked with the title "Chief." You want to find her? How did you lose your mind to the blizzard? I thought Charons are supposed to be resistant to cold temperatures.

10100213.Content: 我没在开玩笑。我有一个重要的……东西，可能落在了她手上，所以我一定要搞清楚。
10100213.Subtitle: I'm serious. She might've taken some...thing that's very important to me, so I must find her and get to the bottom of it.

10100214.Content: 间谍，刺客，反抗者——单是凭你刚刚这句话，帝国士兵就能找出三种由头逮捕你。如果真的想要找大军团长，我奉劝你先不要这么着急。
10100214.Subtitle: Espionage, assassination, defiance... With what you've just said, the Imperial soldiers could just arrest you for these three reasons alone. If you really want to find the Chief, I'd advise you not to rush into it.

10100215.Content: 最后一遍，不想留在这儿给秽兽当口粮，就跟上来。
10100215.Subtitle: For the last time, if you don't want to end up as Filthoid fodder, come with us.

10100216.Subtitle: Thanks for saving my life. But—

10100217.Content: 你在担忧，在犹疑，“这两个陌生人非亲非故，一定对我别有所图”。
10100217.Subtitle: You're worried, and suspicious — "These two strangers must be up to something."

10100219.Content: 那就一个人留在这儿想吧，如果你觉得自己还有什么值得人图谋。
10100219.Subtitle: Then stay here and mull it over by yourself, if you think there's anything about you that's worth anyone else's time.

10100221.Content: （是的……现在的我一无所有，她们又能从我这里夺走什么呢？）
10100221.Subtitle: (Right... I have nothing to lose now, what more could they possibly take from me?)

10100301.Content: 你看起来全身都是伤，不要紧吗？
10100301.Subtitle: You seem to be all bruises and cuts, are you alright?

10100302.Subtitle: I'm fine. The pain's gone now.

10100303.Content: 你是不是遇到了很倒霉的事……不过不用怕！
10100303.Subtitle: Something really bad must've happened to you... But no worries!

10100304.Content: 现在有我罩着你啦！毕竟白可是——
10100304.Subtitle: You're under my wing now! Snow will protect you! After all, Snow is—

10100305.Content: 呜哇——！！那边是是是是是什么？！
10100305.Subtitle: Woooaaah—!! What is that over there?!

10100401.Content: 好像是哪个司机翻车了，竟然还引来了野兽……真是坏东西！
10100401.Subtitle: Seems like someone's had a bit of a mishap, and it's even attracted some beasts... Those nasty monsters!

10100402.Content: 还好还好，揍扁了，揍扁了……
10100402.Subtitle: Phew, thank goodness we took them down...

10100403.Content: 谁怕了，我……我只是在关心那个倒霉司机！
10100403.Subtitle: I'm not afraid! I... I was just worried about that poor driver!

10100404.Content: 这……这不是看你天赋异禀，所以给你一个简单的试炼嘛！
10100404.Subtitle: Well... that was because you seemed so talented, so I decided to give you a simple test...

10100405.Content: ……不说这些了，我还有一件事想问。
10100405.Subtitle: ...Anyway, I have another question.

10100406.Content: 既然这里是“海伯利亚北方最大的城市”，那么你知不知道，这里离净界岛多远？
10100406.Subtitle: Do you know how far it is from this "largest city in northern Hyperborea" to Purgatorio Island?

10100407.Content: 那是一座小岛……应该是在——
10100407.Subtitle: It's a small island... should be in—

10100408.Content: 海伯利亚的南边，一棵巨大的天之树下？离这里好远好远，超过一千五百公里！
10100408.Subtitle: The south of Hyperborea, under a huge Heaventree? It's far, far away, over 1,500 kilometres from here.

10100410.Content: 怎么，你是从那儿来还是想到那里去？先别想这些啦，先去安全的地方歇歇脚！
10100410.Subtitle: What, did you come from there or are you trying to get there? Eh, don't worry about that now, let's find a safe spot to take a breather first.

10100411.Content: （那么远……那么我并不是漂流过来的。）
10100411.Subtitle: (That far away... so I didn't just drift here.)

10100412.Content: （但是究竟……是什么人，又为什么要带我来这种地方？）
10100412.Subtitle: (But who... and why would they bring me here?)

10100501.Content: 前面就是城门了，等下你就跟在我和卡米拉身后，悄悄混进去吧！
10100501.Subtitle: The city gate is just up ahead. Follow behind us, we'll get you in!

10100502.Content: 千万不要多说话哦，有什么事，万能的卡米拉会摆平的！
10100502.Subtitle: And keep your mouth shut. If anything comes up, our almighty Camilla will take care of it!

10100602.Content: 好麻烦，又要盘查吗？连白和卡米拉都不记得，哼哼，你的眼睛和脑袋不太灵光！
10100602.Subtitle: Ugh, not another check! Don't even remember Camilla and Snow, huh? Looks like your eyes and your brain aren't working very well.

10100603.Content: 谁问你了，皎皎之民。我是说——
10100603.Subtitle: Not you, Luno. I was talking to—

10100604.Content: 听不见吗，一只眼的？跑那么快，是想赶着去治安署坐坐？
10100604.Subtitle: Oi, one-eye! In such a hurry to visit the Security Bureau for tea, eh?

10100606.Content: 不是本地人吧，哪来的？通行证呢？
10100606.Subtitle: You're not from here, are you? Where are you from? Got your travel permit?

10100607.Content: 哪个岛，说明白些，南边大了去了。
10100607.Subtitle: Which island? Be specific, there are like a million islands in the South.

10100608.Subtitle: Never mind, show me your travel permit.

10100610.Content: 嗯，这孩子是我表兄的遗孤。他们从玛尔伯格省过来的路上被秽兽袭击，行李全丢了，只剩下{性别：他|她}一个逃出生天……
10100610.Subtitle: Ah, yes, this is my cousin's child. They were attacked by Filthoids on their way from Marberg. My cousin died... But this kid miraculously survived.

10100611.Content: ……{性别：他|她}是南方的维瓦尔酒庄派来送货的，可怜大桥上路滑翻了车，货和行李都被秽兽撕咬一空。
10100611.Subtitle: ...{性别:He|She}'s from the south, sent by the Vivar Winery to deliver goods. The bridge was slippery, so the cart overturned, and some Filthoids destroyed this poor thing's cargo and luggage.

10100612.Content: 通行证我马上申请补办，但这孩子吓坏了，您先可怜可怜，放这孩子进去吃口热饭吧。
10100612.Subtitle: I'll reapply for the travel permit soon, but the child is quite shaken. Please, have mercy on this poor thing, let {性别:him|her} in for a warm meal.

10100613.Content: {性别：喂、喂……兄弟你也老大不小了，别哭啊！|喂喂，你怎么哭了？见鬼，长官没说过怎么对付掉眼泪的小姑娘啊！}
10100613.Subtitle: {性别:Whoa... aren't you a bit old to be a crybaby, mate? Stop it...|Whoa... why are you crying? Darn it, Chief never told us how to deal with tearful young ladies!}

10100614.Content: 要是放在以前也不是不行。只是……唉，卡米拉女士，您知道的，最近全国上下都在通缉那什么，“神奇的同盟”，所以长官特别吩咐了，各城镇都得严查。
10100614.Subtitle: This would've been a simple matter in the past, Ms Camilla, but... you know, recently that "Fork Shakens" or something is wanted nationwide, so the Chief specifically asked for strict security checks across towns.

10100615.Content: ……是“神弃者同盟”。我以我本人，卡米拉·斯卡雷特的信誉担保，{性别：他|她}和神弃者同盟绝无关系。
10100615.Subtitle: ...It's the Forsakens. I tell you what — I, Camilla Scarlet, on my honour, assure you that {性别:he|she} has nothing to do with the Forsakens.

10100616.Content: 行吧。您的人我放心。但千万记住，一定要看好{性别：他|她}，千万别在城里惹是生非，不然长官怪罪下来，咱俩就都有大麻烦了。
10100616.Subtitle: Alright, I trust you, Ms Camilla. But remember, keep a close eye on this kid and don't let {性别:him|her} stir up any trouble in town. If the Chief finds out about this, we'll both be in for it.

10100617.Content: 多谢通融。呵……下次来“水仙平原”的时候，给您免单。
10100617.Subtitle: Thank you very much. Next time you come to The Asphodel, it's on the house.

10100701.Subtitle: Don't cause any trouble in town, you hear me?

10100801.Subtitle: An excellent performance, I must say.

10100802.Content: 要我说呀，你一定是没怎么说过谎的好孩子。看，手还在抖。
10100802.Subtitle: I'd say you are normally an honest kid. Look, your hands are still shaking.

10100803.Content: 没关系，在这种地方待久了，这种生活伎俩，很快就会变得熟练的。
10100803.Subtitle: It's alright. You'll get used to these tricks of survival in no time in a place like this.

10100804.Content: 好了，带你进来，<H>交易</>就已经达成，我也该回去做我的生意了。你不会给我惹什么麻烦的——对吧？
10100804.Subtitle: Alright, now that I've brought you in, the deal is fulfilled — I should go back to my tavern. Stay out of trouble for me, alright?

10100805.Content: 请等一下！我还没太搞明白。
10100805.Subtitle: Wait a minute! I'm still quite confused.

10100806.Content: 那就问快些。生意人的时间很宝贵。
10100806.Subtitle: Then make it quick. Time is money for a merchant.

10100807.Content: 没错！就在昨天这个月黑风高的夜晚，有只一身白光的恶魔，潜入了卡米拉的酒馆，威胁她——
10100807.Subtitle: Yep! Just yesterday, in a pitch-black windy evening, a fiend cloaked in white light infiltrated Camilla's tavern and threatened her—

10100809.Content: 好吧……有个穿白斗篷的家伙和卡米拉谈了一笔交易，要她找到你，带你进城。
10100809.Subtitle: Fine... a hooded man in a white cloak struck a deal with Camilla to find you and bring you into town.

10100810.Content: 你还记得那个人的长相吗？
10100810.Subtitle: Do you remember what this man looked like?

10100811.Content: 他裹得严严实实，神秘得很——你也不知道？
10100811.Subtitle: He was covered head to toe, quite a mysterious figure — you don't know him either?

10100813.Content: 真是稀奇。不知哪儿冒出来的大慈善家花一笔巨款雇人救一个陌生人，却不愿露面，也没有说救了你之后要做什么。
10100813.Subtitle: How curious. Some enigmatic benefactor from nowhere is willing to spend a fortune to save a stranger but doesn't want to reveal his identity or intention.

10100814.Content: 会有人将你从苦涩的海水中打捞出来，带向一片苦寒的荒原，命运将在那里降下真正的淬炼。
10100814.Subtitle: Fate has arranged for a pair of hands to pluck you from the brinish water and guide you to the next desolate land. There, you shall awaken anew.

10100815.Content: （……是梦中的那个人派人救了我吗？但是，送我来这里，究竟是为什么？）
10100815.Subtitle: (...Could it have been the person from my dreams who orchestrated my rescue? But to what end have I been brought here?)

10100816.Content: 白刚才告诉过你吧？那个地方远在千里之外。通往南方的列车需要一笔不菲的票钱，旅费……至少也得攒上几千银币吧。
10100816.Subtitle: Snow just told you, didn't she? It's leagues away. The southbound train requires a hefty fare, not to mention travel costs... you'd need several thousand silver coins.

10100817.Content: 就算你宁愿一路乞讨穿越海伯利亚大平原，也要想方设法应付沿途各城镇的盘查。下一次，可就不一定这么好运——
10100817.Subtitle: Even if you'd rather beg your way across the Hyperborean plains, you'd still need to somehow deal with the inspections in every town you pass. Next time, you might not be so lucky—

10100818.Content: 说不定，你就要在不知道哪个城市的牢狱里度过一大把好时光了。
10100818.Subtitle: For all you know, you might well find yourself languishing in a prison of some city.

10100819.Content: （嗯……果然，回去并不是件容易事。要先想办法准备一笔钱，以及，刚才那位士兵提到的“通行证”。）
10100819.Subtitle: (Hmm... right, going all the way back is no picnic. I must first get some money and, as that soldier mentioned, a "travel permit.")

10100820.Content: 十三军团直属于皇帝陛下，每个行省都有他们的踪迹。西比尔可能在海伯利亚任何一座要塞现身。
10100820.Subtitle: The 13th Legion is directly under the Emperor's command, with bases in every province, so Sibylle could be in any part of Hyperborea.

10100821.Content: 而其中可能性最大的是，皇都迪斯玛尼亚那座巨大钢铁堡垒。全帝国最训练有素的士兵、一切你想象得到和想象不到的武器，都汇聚在那里。
10100821.Subtitle: The most likely place, though, is the colossal steel bastion in the imperial capital, aka Dismania, where you can find the Empire's finest soldiers and an arsenal of every type of conceivable and inconceivable armaments.

10100822.Content: 海伯利亚是一座轰鸣的战车，那里就是它的引擎，它的炉芯——如果你想去试试，那就尽管去吧。我见过很多疯子，你不是第一个，也不是最后一个。
10100822.Subtitle: Hyperborea is a roaring chariot, and that place is its engine, its fiery core — if you want to give it a try, go ahead. You're neither the first nor the last madcap I've seen.

10100823.Content: （所以说，我要面对的并非只是西比尔，而是她背后的帝国。有胜算吗？至少现在没有……需要想想其他办法。）
10100823.Subtitle: (So, what I'm facing isn't just Sibylle but the Empire behind her. Do I stand a chance? Not for now, at least... I need a plan b.)

10100824.Content: 到此为止吧。我出去这么久，水仙平原怕不是又多了好些乱子。
10100824.Subtitle: Let's call it a day. I've been out so long, The Asphodel might be in quite disarray by now.

10100826.Subtitle: Try and survive on your own.

10100827.Content: 如果这都做不到，就再也别提什么管西比尔要东西之类的疯话。
10100827.Subtitle: If you can't even do that, then don't ever again mention any mad talk about confronting Sibylle to get your stuff back.

10100828.Content: ……北边最高处有一间叫“修普诺斯之家”的旅馆，也许愿意收留你这种来路不明的人借宿。
10100828.Subtitle: ...There's an inn up north called the Hypnos' House that might take in someone with a sketchy backstory like you.

10100829.Content: 你是说——那幢阴森森的“鬼宅”？
10100829.Subtitle: You mean... that spooky "haunted house"?

10100830.Content: 除了那栋连士兵都懒得搜查嫌晦气的宅子，还有哪儿能收留一个没有通行证的卡戎之民？
10100830.Subtitle: Where else but the place that is so creepy even the soldiers didn't want to search would take in a Charon without a travel permit?

10100832.Content: ……嗯……好吧！看你一个人可怜兮兮的，就让我来带你去那个修普诺斯之家一探究竟！
10100832.Subtitle: Umm... Alright! Seeing you so lonely and lost, I'll take you to this Hypnos' House to see what's what!

10100901.Content: 你刚才说的“鬼宅”，是什么意思？
10100901.Subtitle: What exactly did you mean by "haunted house"?

10100902.Content: 是水仙平原的客人说的，时不时就会有人抱怨——
10100902.Subtitle: I heard about it from the guests at The Asphodel. There's always someone complaining—

10100903.Content: 比如说明明那么大的旅馆，但是门每天都关得紧紧的，所有去投宿的外乡旅客都被赶走……
10100903.Subtitle: Like, even though it's such a big inn, the doors are always shut tight every day, turning away any travellers from outside the town...

10100904.Content: 比如说旅馆的住客从不出门，里面还偶尔会飘出奇奇怪怪、说不上来的味道……
10100904.Subtitle: Or how the lodgers seem to never ever leave, and sometimes, there's this really weird smell drifting from the inside of the house...

10100905.Content: 比如说那个店主的脸比泪湖的水还要冰，好像他开的不是旅馆，是棺材店！
10100905.Subtitle: And how the innkeeper's face is colder than the waters of Lamenting Lake... It's as if he's not running an inn, but a coffin shop!

10100906.Content: 听起来也算不上太坏。我还以为里面塞满了秽兽和西比尔。
10100906.Subtitle: Oh, it doesn't sound too bad. I thought it was crammed with Filthoids and Sibylles.

10100907.Content: 但是，既然他们不接待外乡人，那我恐怕也……
10100907.Subtitle: But, if they don't welcome outsiders, I doubt if I can...

10100908.Content: 不过，看起来卡米拉·斯卡雷特女士在这里颇有些声望。嗯……或许可以借一下她的名头。
10100908.Subtitle: Still, it seems Ms Camilla Scarlet holds some sway here. Hmm... perhaps I could leverage her influence a little bit.

10100909.Content: 不用不用，白的名头借给你用就好了。从今以后你就是我关照的人了，小仆从！
10100909.Subtitle: Nah, you can use Snow's name. From now on, you're under my wing, my little minion!

10100910.Content: 谢谢你，但是，“仆从”是什么？
10100910.Subtitle: Thank you, but what's a "minion"?

10100911.Content: 是流行小说中受魔王大人眷顾的跟班！
10100911.Subtitle: It's what they call someone in those stories who's the favourite lackey of the awesome Demon King!

10100912.Content: 世界上有那么多皎皎之民，为什么偏偏是白长了角呢？显然我命中注定会成为魔王大人！
10100912.Subtitle: Among all the Luno in the world, why else would little ol' Snow have these nifty horns, if not to be a Demon King one day? It's totally my destiny!

10100913.Content: 而我是听到了神秘声音的指引找到了你，所以你一定是上天安排给我的仆从！
10100913.Subtitle: And it was those mysterious voices that brought me to you, so you must be the minion sent by destiny!

10100914.Content: 所以所以，我决定了——要以我的智慧，指引你走上正确的道路！
10100914.Subtitle: Soooo~ I've made up my mind — with all my wisdom, I'm gonna guide you down the right path!

10100916.Content: （“<H>皎皎之民</>大多对人抱有亲近感”……书本没有骗我。）
10100916.Subtitle: ("The Lunarians are generally friendly towards humans"... the books weren't lying.)

10100917.Content: 那间旅馆就在北边！不要发呆啦，快~跟~上！
10100917.Subtitle: The inn's just up north! C'mon, fol—low—me!

10100918.Content: （……就、就是这位似乎有点亲近过头了。）
10100918.Subtitle: (...It's just that this one seems a tad too friendly.)

10101001.Subtitle: Here we are! You wait here!

10101102.Content: 嗯，咳！我乃纯白的救赎☆光之魔王大人。听好了，这个人……
10101102.Subtitle: Um, ahem! I am the Pure-White Redeemer ☆ Demon King of Light. Listen well, this person...

10101201.Content: 是卡米拉·斯卡雷特女士推荐我来的。我想在您这里借宿几天，不知是否方便？
10101201.Subtitle: Ms Camilla Scarlet told me to come to this place. I was hoping to stay here for a few days, would that be possible?

10101205.Subtitle: ...That woman's misplaced compassion knows no bounds.

10101208.Subtitle: The price you're willing to pay.

10101213.Content: 你、你这人好没礼貌，真给咱们冰湖城丢脸！
10101213.Subtitle: Yo-You're so rude! A real disgrace to Icelake!

10101303.Content: 那间宅子我又整理了一遍，已经可以——唔！
10101303.Subtitle: I just tidied up the house again, and it's all set... Oopsie!

10101305.Content: 嗯！我刚刚有些头晕，没看清台阶，多谢啦。
10101305.Subtitle: Uh! I got a little dizzy and didn't see the step, thank you.

10101402.Content: 没钱还想借宿的外乡人而已，我正要赶出去。
10101402.Subtitle: Just a penniless outsider looking for a place to stay, I was about to kick {性别:him|her} out.

10101403.Content: 外乡人？那……赶出去的话，{性别：他|她}不就无家可归了吗？
10101403.Subtitle: An outsider? But... if you kick {性别:him|her} out, won't {性别:he|she} be homeless?

10101405.Content: 可是……反正那间宅邸暂时还没有卖掉，借给{性别：他|她}住一晚也没关系吧？等{性别：他|她}有了旅费再还您，我们不是白赚一份租金？
10101405.Subtitle: But... the house is still unsold anyway, lending it to {性别:him|her} for one night wouldn't hurt, right? {性别:He|She} can pay you back when {性别:he|she} can, that way we get a little extra cash for basically nothing.

10101406.Content: 您要是一直这样，对谁都冷冰冰的，宅子就真的卖不掉啦。
10101406.Subtitle: If you keep being so cold to everyone, you'll never find a buyer for that place.

10101409.Content: 只有今晚。过了今晚，该去哪去哪。
10101409.Subtitle: But just for one night. Come morning, you must go wherever you're supposed to.

10101501.Content: 那座宅子就在南边，跟我走吧！
10101501.Subtitle: The house is up south, follow me!

10101601.Content: 这间刚刚打扫出来，今晚你就住这里吧。
10101601.Subtitle: This room has just been cleaned up. You can stay here tonight.

10101603.Content: 你不要生气，其实恩里克叔叔并没有那么贪财。只是我们最近实在拮据，不然他也不会打算卖掉老宅补贴家用。
10101603.Subtitle: Don't be upset, Mr Henrik isn't really that greedy. It's just we've been quite strapped for cash lately, otherwise he wouldn't consider selling his old house to make ends meet.

10101604.Content: 这里虽然荒废了几年，但打扫完之后还不错，至少能挡住外面的寒风，对吧！
10101604.Subtitle: It's been neglected for years, but after a good clean, it's not half bad, right? At least it keeps out the chill!

10101605.Content: 哦对了，还没告诉你们我的名字。我叫赛琪，是“修普诺斯之家”的住客，有时也会帮忙打打下手。
10101605.Subtitle: Oh, I haven't introduced myself. I'm Psyche, a lodger at the Hypnos' House. And sometimes I help Mr Henrik around.

10101606.Content: {nickname}……这个名字在这座城市很少见呢。
10101606.Subtitle: ... That's quite an uncommon name in this city.

10101607.Content: 叔叔说你不是本地人，那你是从哪儿来的？你的装扮，我也没怎么见过。
10101607.Subtitle: Mr Henrik mentioned you're not a local. Where are you from? Your outfit is quite unfamiliar to me.

10101608.Content: 一座小岛，在很远很远的南方。
10101608.Subtitle: A small island, far, far to the south.

10101609.Content: 南方——我知道的，是有四季，有春天的地方！还有小岛，你一定也见过“大海”。听说它比一百片泪湖连起来还……
10101609.Subtitle: The South — I know it! It's a place with four seasons, including spring! And an island... you must have seen the "ocean." I've heard it's even bigger than a hundred Lamenting Lakes put together...

10101611.Content: 才、才不是我！皎皎之民才没你们这么脆弱，动不动就饿肚子。
10101611.Subtitle: O-Of course not! We luno folks aren't as fragile as you... We don't get hungry so easily.

10101612.Content: ……你们饿了吗？那我去帮你找点吃的，稍等一会儿！
10101612.Subtitle: ...Are you hungry? I'll get you something to eat. Be right back!

10101613.Content: 真没想到，那个又粗鲁又阴沉的店主，手底下居然有这么勤奋又热心肠的好孩子……
10101613.Subtitle: Who'd have thought such a rude and gloomy innkeeper would have such a nice and helpful kid working for him...

10101614.Content: 多亏了她，总算找到了住的地方，先休息一会儿吧，我也站累啦！
10101614.Subtitle: Thanks to her, we've finally found a place to stay. Let's rest a bit — I'm quite tired too!

10101701.Content: （太多事，发生了太多事……奇怪的梦、神秘的白斗篷、西比尔和“零号”……它们似乎有着某种关联，但我无法理清它们的头绪。）
10101701.Subtitle: (So much has happened... Weird dreams, that mysterious man in a white cloak, Sibylle, and "No. 0"... They all seem to be connected somehow, but I can't figure it out.)

10101702.Content: （唯一确定的只有，我已经和贝蕾失散了……)
10101702.Subtitle: (The only thing I'm certain of is that I've lost touch with Berry...)

10101703.Content: （……如果她那时逃脱了，应该也会想尽办法找我……当然，不能排除最坏的可能性，也就是她被西比尔带去了军团。）
10101703.Subtitle: (...If she's managed to escape, she'd surely try everything to find me... Of course, I can't rule out the worst-case scenario that Sibylle has taken her to the Legion.)

10101704.Content: （不幸中的万幸是，西比尔似乎出于某种原因<H>需要</>贝蕾，应该不会加害于她。）
10101704.Subtitle: (The silver lining is, it seemed that Sibylle needed Berry for some reason, so she probably wouldn't harm her.)

10101705.Content: （……总之，要想办法在冰湖城攒一笔钱，想办法弄到通行证，再做下一步打算。）
10101705.Subtitle: (...Anyway, I need to scrape together some money in Icelake, get a travel permit, and then plan for my next move.)

10101802.Content: 饿坏了吧？这是刚烤好的面包。
10101802.Subtitle: You must be starving. Here's some freshly baked bread.

10101807.Content: 没事。太饿了，不小心咬到了舌头。很疼，所以……
10101807.Subtitle: I'm fine. Just so hungry that I accidentally bit my tongue. It hurts, so...

10101808.Content: 那你快把这个吃掉，再喝点热乎乎的牛奶，就舒服多了——当心，别再咬到舌头啦。
10101808.Subtitle: Then you better eat some bread and wash it down with some warm milk, that'll make you feel better — be careful, don't bite your tongue again.

10101812.Content: 我感觉得到。虽然在努力挤出笑脸，但你并不快乐。
10101812.Subtitle: I can feel it. Even though you're trying to put on a smile, you're not happy.

10101813.Content: 虽然有点好奇你到底遭遇过什么，但是恩里克叔叔告诉过我，不要追问客人的过去。
10101813.Subtitle: I'm a bit curious about what you've been through, but Mr Henrik told me not to pry into our guests' pasts.

10101814.Content: 嗯……先在这里歇息一下，想想接下来做些什么吧。
10101814.Subtitle: Anyway... you can take a good rest here, and think about what to do next.

10101901.Subtitle: Psyche, I need to ask you something.

10101902.Content: 我需要一笔钱。这座城市有没有什么地方，有可以交给外乡人的工作——我是说，不会被过问身份来历的地方？
10101902.Subtitle: I need some money. Is there any place in the city where an outsider might find work without too many questions asked about their past?

10101904.Content: 这里的人们大多是在工厂……唔，所有工厂都是需要通行证的……唔，实在不行可以试试那里？
10101904.Subtitle: Most people here work in the factories... um, but they all ask to see a travel permit... Well, there's perhaps one place you could try—

10101905.Content: 卡米拉·斯卡雷特女士的酒馆“<H>水仙平原</>”。在那里接取委托，完成后可以得到一笔酬金。
10101905.Subtitle: Ms Camilla Scarlet's tavern, The Asphodel. You can take up commissions with handsome rewards there.

10101906.Content: 不过那些委托大多有些危险，去一些卫戍部队都不愿意去的地方，如果遇到游荡的秽兽……
10101906.Subtitle: But, those commissions are often quite dangerous... you might have to go to places even the local Escort would avoid, and you might encounter some wandering Filthoids...

10101907.Content: 卡米拉·斯卡雷特？我与这位女士有过一面之缘，原来她的酒馆还经营这个。
10101907.Subtitle: Camilla Scarlet? I've met this lady once. Though I had no idea that her tavern also runs this sort of business.

10101908.Content: 没关系，我做得到。带我去吧。
10101908.Subtitle: It's okay, I can handle it. Can you take me there?

10102001.Content: 咦，你们兜兜转转，居然打算去找卡米拉了？
10102001.Subtitle: Huh? After all this running around, you're going back to Camilla?

10102002.Content: 那白可太熟了，白也来带路！
10102002.Subtitle: Then count Snow in! Snow's more than familiar with that place.

10102102.Content: 听不懂人话吗？给老子看你的……通行证！
10102102.Subtitle: Are you deaf? Show me your... travel permit!

10102103.Content: 长官，我手脚不太好，请您稍等一下，我在找，在找……
10102103.Subtitle: Sorry, sir, I'm a bit slow at this age, please bear with me for a moment...

10102105.Content: 哦……？哦，照片上……是你这老东西？
10102105.Subtitle: Huh...? Oh, is this you in the photo... you old codger?

10102107.Content: 我怎么看怎么像条狗呢，哈哈，哈哈哈哈哈！
10102107.Subtitle: How come it looks more like a mongrel to me, haha, hahaha!

10102108.Content: 哎，要不你学几声狗叫，给咱们听听？
10102108.Subtitle: Oi, why don't you give us a bark, huh?

10102202.Subtitle: What are you looking at, you little twerp?

10102203.Content: 你不会给我惹什么麻烦的——对吧？
10102203.Subtitle: Stay out of trouble for me, alright?

10102206.Subtitle: What do you think you're doing?!

10102402.Content: 有一件重要的事，我不知道你是否清楚。
10102402.Subtitle: There's something important you should know.

10102403.Content: 如果你们是从海伯利亚以外的地方来的，请记住，千万不要触怒“<H>人类</>”。
10102403.Subtitle: If you're from outside Hyperborea, remember, never anger the humans.

10102404.Content: “人类”？你是说没有长角的那些……他们有什么特别之处吗？
10102404.Subtitle: The "humans"...? What's so special about them?

10102405.Subtitle: Or is it that, WE are the special ones?

10102406.Content: 嗯。在海伯利亚，我们这样长着特别的角和脊椎的<H>卡戎之民</>，和人类是不一样的。他们还把我们叫做……
10102406.Subtitle: Yes. Here in Hyperborea, we, the Charons, with our unique looks, are different from humans. They even call us...

10102408.Content: 唉，说到这个，白可——生气了！
10102408.Subtitle: Ugh, speaking of which, Snow is super mad!

10102409.Content: 那群人说到“恶魔的孩子”和“魔法”就摆上一张难看的臭脸……就像卡米拉看到有人在水仙平原斗殴！可是明明是“恶魔”被他们欺负才对！
10102409.Subtitle: Whenever those humans talk about stuff like "demon's children" and "magic," they always give such dirty looks... just like when Camilla sees a drunken brawl in The Asphodel. But it's actually the "demon's children" who are being bullied by them!

10102412.Content: 但是，我们在这里不受欢迎也是事实。你与人类打交道的时候，务必小心。
10102412.Subtitle: But the fact remains, we are unwelcome here. So, be extra careful when you deal with humans.

10102413.Content: 刚才那个士兵……即使做出那样残忍的事，也只不过会被罚几天禁闭。
10102413.Subtitle: That soldier back there, even for such a cruel crime, will only be locked up for a few days.

10102414.Content: 同样的事情，我们见过很多、很多次……到最后，所有人都习惯了。在这里，这些事情是最平常不过的——
10102414.Subtitle: We've seen stuff like this many, many times... until everyone gets so used to it. Such things are commonplace in this place—

10102415.Content: 就像卡戎之民不能进入冰湖城的内城，也不得离开帝国一样平常，就像花会凋谢，湖会冻结，雪落在炉火里会融化一样平常。
10102415.Subtitle: They are just as ordinary as the fact that Charons aren't allowed to enter the inner city of Icelake or leave the Empire, that flowers would wither, lakes would freeze, and snow would melt in the hearth.

10102416.Content: （……这么说来，回净界岛的困难又多了一件。）
10102416.Subtitle: (...This makes returning to Purgatorio Island even more challenging.)

10102418.Content: 海伯利亚的人类认为，掌握“魔法”的卡戎之民是邪恶的施术者，是人类安宁最大的威胁。
10102418.Subtitle: The humans of Hyperborea believe that the Charons who wield "magic" are evil sorcerers, the greatest threat to their peaceful life.

10102419.Content: 那你们也不能总是默默忍受一切呀！为什么不用你们的魔法“轰”地一下，打得他们哇哇叫！……真是的，气死我了。
10102419.Subtitle: But you can't always just suck it! Why not use your magic on them, and BOOM! Make them cry like babies! ...Ugh, seriously, it makes me so mad!

10102420.Content: 对大部分人来说，一生唯一一件重要的事情就是活下去。我们惧怕站着死去，所以只能选择在地上丑陋地挣扎求生。
10102420.Subtitle: For most people, the only important thing in life is to survive. We fear a dignified death, so we have to struggle disgracefully to live.

10102421.Content: 刚才阻止了你们，确实是我懦弱，但……我不能看你们来这里第一天，就稀里糊涂赔上性命。
10102421.Subtitle: Stopping you back there was indeed out of my cowardice, but... I can't let you get killed like that on your first day here.

10102422.Content: 不，你没有错……我是卡米拉女士担保进城的，不能在城里招惹不该惹的人，牵连到她。
10102422.Subtitle: You did the right thing... Ms Camilla vouched for me so I could get into the city. I can't just go mess with the wrong people and get her in trouble.

10102424.Content: 前面就是“水仙平原”了，我们走吧。
10102424.Subtitle: The Asphodel is just up ahead, let's go.

10102501.Content: ……然后，他趁我没防备袭击了我，抢走了刚到手的钱。狗东西，连卖废品的都不放过！那可是给贫民窟几家子筹措的生活费！
10102501.Subtitle:
...And then, out of nowhere, he ambushed me and pinched the cash I'd just gotten. That rotter, doesn't even spare us scavengers!\
That money was for several families' upkeep in the slums!

10102502.Content: 没了那袋子铜币，那群老老少少下个月都要喝西北风了。唉，小贼不知道跑哪儿去了，我得找个人帮我一起堵他。
10102502.Subtitle: Without that bag of coins, all the young and old will have to tighten their belts even more next month. Ugh... I've no idea where the thief has run off to, I need someone to help me nab him.

10102503.Content: 这是治安署分内的事吧？
10102503.Subtitle: Shouldn't this be something for the Security Bureau to handle?

10102504.Content: 哎呀等治安署腾出手来管咱们卡戎的事，泪湖的冰都要化干净啦！
10102504.Subtitle: Well, by the time the Security Bureau bothers with us Charons, the ice in Lamenting Lake would've melted away!

10102505.Content: 我说最最善良美丽的卡米拉大姐，能不能麻烦您这里的狩月人帮个小忙……嗯，就一个小忙！我知道您人最好了。
10102505.Subtitle:
Please, Ms Camilla, the kindest and most beautiful lady in Icelake, could you maybe ask some of the Phoxhunters here to\
lend a hand... Just one tiny favour! Pretty please!

10102506.Content: 别撒娇。你应该知道，在这里讨要的东西，从来都不是免费的。
10102506.Subtitle: Save it. You should know that nothing asked for here comes without a price.

10102507.Content: 那能不能稍微……那个，便宜点……或者用其他的东西交换也可以！我想想，那句话怎么说来着——
10102507.Subtitle: Well then, can you maybe... give me a discount... or I could offer you something else! How does it go again—

10102508.Content: “情报就是金钱”！对对对，全冰湖城的垃圾桶都归我管，如果我以后翻到什么好玩的消息，第一时间告诉您，可以吧？
10102508.Subtitle:
"Information is as good as gold"! Right, I deal with all the rubbish bins in Icelake, so how about this —\
if I stumble upon any useful info, you'll be the first to know.

10102601.Content: 是你。还有你是那个……弗莱伊家的女儿？是叫……赛琪吧？
10102601.Subtitle: Oh, it's you. And you're... the little girl from the Frey's? Psyche, isn't it?

10102602.Content: 是的，卡米拉女士。我现在借住在修普诺斯之家。
10102602.Subtitle: Yes, Ms Camilla. I'm staying at the Hypnos' House for now.

10102604.Content: ……我是带这位朋友来的。{性别：他|她}想找一份狩月人的工作。
10102604.Subtitle: ...I'm here with a friend. {性别:He|She} is looking for a job and wants to become a Phoxhunter.

10102605.Content: 狩月人！那你们是找对地方了，正巧，现在这里就有一份委托——
10102605.Subtitle: Then you came to the right place! There's a commission for Phoxhunters right now—

10102608.Content: 这么快就交上了朋友……你还挺受欢迎。至于狩月人——
10102608.Subtitle:
Already made friends... you're quite a charmer, aren't you?\
As for Phoxhunters—

10102609.Content: 丑话说在前头，这不是小孩子玩闹，更不是什么轻松活计。这里是不问来历、不问出身，但你得到的每一枚回报，都伴随着相应的危险。
10102609.Subtitle:
Let's get one thing straight — this isn't child's play, nor an easy gig. It's false that in this place,\
no one would probe into your past or background, but the rewards always come with risks.

10102610.Content: 模样不算硬朗，想法倒是坚决。
10102610.Subtitle: You don't look tough, though your courage is admirable.

10102611.Content: 你身手确实比一般的卡戎强些，我见过。但想要成为狩月人的话，只有蛮力是不够的——你还得证明自己能够应付突发事件与各种各样的雇主。
10102611.Subtitle:
You're indeed stronger than the average Charons — I've seen you in a fight. But brute strength isn't enough to\
qualify you to be a Phoxhunter. You need to prove that you're capable of dealing with\
all possible contingencies and a very mixed group of clients.

10102612.Content: 比如，这里就有一个证明的机会。
10102612.Subtitle: It just so happens that a chance for that came just now.

10102614.Content: 诶，白刚才听着好像是，这位大姐姐的钱包被抢走了？
10102614.Subtitle: Snow heard that someone swiped this lady's money bag.

10102701.Content: 那位小姐这么着急，我也一起去帮忙吧。
10102701.Subtitle: She seems quite distressed; I can lend a hand too so we can get it back sooner.

10102702.Content: 不要插手，这是对我们未来狩月人的简单考验。要是没有吃这碗饭的实力，做狩月人只会害了自己。
10102702.Subtitle: No, this is a simple test just for a prospective Phoxhunter. If you don't have the chops for it, becoming a Phoxhunter would kill you.

10102801.Content: 你、你真的愿意帮我吗！呜……谢谢你，陌生人！你就是我异父异母的{性别：亲兄弟|亲姐妹}！
10102801.Subtitle: You'd really help me out? Aww... thank you! You're like the {性别:brother|sister} I never had!

10102802.Content: 小贼刚才是往西边去了。但是冰湖城嘛，四通八达，谁知道他到底会窜到哪儿去。等下咱俩先找找线索！
10102802.Subtitle:
That scoundrel headed toward the north. But, you know, Icelake is like a huge maze, so I'm not sure where he's got to.\
Let's split up and have a look around.

10103001.Content: 原来井盖下面这么大、这么宽敞呀！还比上面暖和好多！就像一个秘密的小王国一样。
10103001.Subtitle: It's pretty roomy down here, even a bit warmer than above the ground...

10103002.Content: 把这些小动物请走，再把异味儿清理干净，搬个帐篷就能住人啦！
10103002.Subtitle: Wow, it's reeeaaally big, like a secret little kingdom! One could live here without paying a penny!

10103003.Content: 对啊对啊！而且，诶{nickname}你看，住在这儿还不用付房租！

10103004.Content: 让我们一起来打跑这些家伙，抢走他们的国土，我做魔王，册封你为……
10103004.Subtitle: Let's turf these people out, seize their land, and I'll be the demon king here! I'll appoint you as...

10103005.Content: “骁勇的独目勇者，冷酷的冰湖之主，第一代下水道公爵”！
10103005.Subtitle: "The Valiant Cyclopean Warrior, the Cold Lord of Icelake, the Inaugural Duke of the Sewers"!

10103006.Content: （好像称呼有点太长了，缩短一些比较好……）
10103006.Subtitle: (That title's a bit of a mouthful, could use a polish. And dealing with the stench here should be no picnic...)

10103007.Content: （等等，怎么我真的在一本正经思考了。）
10103007.Subtitle: (Hold on, why am I even seriously thinking this through?)

10103103.Content: 捡垃圾的丫头看着怪老实的，居然还找帮手……
10103103.Subtitle: I thought that scavenger girl was a pushover, didn't expect she's got backup...

10103104.Subtitle: But to think just the two of you can actually get me?

10103201.Content: 让你小瞧白的仆从，知道错了吧！
10103201.Subtitle: That's for underestimating Snow's minion! Now you know what we've got!

10103203.Content: 停手停手，钱袋还你！我也是好几天没吃顿饱饭了，一时糊涂才……唉，我错了我错了！
10103203.Subtitle: Tsk... If I hadn't been starved all day, I'd never have touched this bloody thing, let alone lost to you!

10103204.Content: 你要吃饭，别人就不要吃吗！而且你刚才抢劫的时候可嚣张得很！
10103204.Subtitle: Hunger doesn't justify preying on others.

10103205.Content: 嗯……这样吧，你之前揍了我几拳，现在就吃我几铲！咱们把这笔账扯平，就放你走。
10103205.Subtitle: What you stole wasn't just a money bag, it was a lifeline for many.

10103206.Subtitle: Ms Camilla? Did you follow us here to help...

10103207.Subtitle: You've come all this way to Icelake, it'd be a shame to meet your maker in this sorry spot on your first day.

10103208.Content: 玛尔洁小心！他手上还有东西！
10103208.Subtitle: Tsk, who's this then, some big shot? Ah, just a tavern-keeping old hen. What're you gonna do about it? Hand me over to the Security Bureau? Do you really think those high-ups give a d*mn about Charons...

10103211.Content: （刚才有什么击落了匕首……这是……餐刀？）

10103212.Content: 很多时候野兽向你摇尾乞怜并非真的在示弱，而是另一种困兽之斗。当你卸下防备，它就伺机咬你一口。

10103213.Content: 和野外一样，城市里也有很多“野兽”。玛尔洁，你得牢记，永远不要向它们交付多余的怜悯和信任。{nickname}，你也是。

10103215.Content: 卡米拉女士？你跟到这儿，是来帮我们的？

10103216.Content: 你那么大老远来了冰湖城，要是第一天就在这种臭烘烘的地方闹出个三长两短，未免过于凄惨。

10103217.Content: 嘁，我当是哪个人模狗样的，原来是开酒馆的大婶。你又能拿老子怎么样？叫士兵来抓？你不会真以为那些老爷会管卡戎的破事——

10103301.Content: 自然是用“我们的”方式，帮你也许不存在的母亲教你一些生活小常识。
10103301.Subtitle: We'll handle you "our way" — teach you a few life lessons your presumably absent mother never did.

10103302.Content: 不许提我妈……！凶婆娘你他*的松手！！
10103302.Subtitle: Don't you dare bring my mum into this...! Let go of me! You nasty hag!

10103303.Content: 卡米拉一把握住青年的手。她的力道很大，你甚至能听到小臂骨头咔嚓折断的响声。
10103303.Subtitle: Camilla grips the young man's wrist with surprising strength — you can even hear the bones of his forearm cracking.

10103304.Content: 突然，卡米拉倒吸一口冷气，些微踉跄了一步。她睁大眼睛，直直盯着青年的手腕处。
10103304.Subtitle: But then, Camilla gasps sharply and stumbles back, her eyes fixed on the young man's wrist.

10103305.Content: 青年袖口的绷带似乎在刚才的打斗中被扯开了。你看到他手腕处横亘着一道深入骨髓的黑色印记——它看起来如此不祥，让你不由得想起一个词：“恶魔”。
10103305.Subtitle: His sleeve, torn in the scuffle, reveals a deep, black mark etched into his skin. The mark looks so sinister that one word comes to mind — "demon."

10103401.Content: 送他去治安署，直接找达米安署长。这情况我们处理不了。
10103401.Subtitle: Take him to the Security Bureau. This has escalated beyond our control.

10103403.Content: 老……我、我知道了，知错了，这次是真的知错了！你们怎么惩罚我都行，千万别送我去那儿！
10103403.Subtitle: Please, I, I surrender, p—please don't take me there!

10103404.Content: 我、我可以离开冰湖城，再也不回来！放了我吧，求求你们！

10103405.Content: 卡米拉大姐，他这是……怎么了？

10103406.Subtitle: Are you playing dumb or you really don't know? If you're not pretending, I almost envy such ignorance.

10103407.Content: 他很危险，比你们想象中更危险。
10103407.Subtitle: It's an incurable blight, the root of the suffering of all Charons in Hyperborea.

10103408.Content: ……总之，玛尔洁事儿办成了，{nickname}也证明了自己。
10103408.Subtitle: I don't quite follow.

10103409.Content: 如果你依旧决意成为狩月人，就回“水仙平原”找我吧。
10103409.Subtitle: I'll hand the money bag over to the client. If you're still set on becoming a Phoxhunter, find me in The Asphodel.

10103501.Content: 奇怪，卡米拉大姐什么人没见过，这次怎么反应这么大……
10103501.Subtitle: No, please... I'm begging you! Don't send me there—

10103502.Content: 那个小偷也是，突然就吓得浑身哆嗦，原来治安署是这么恐怖的地方吗！
10103502.Subtitle: He seemed terrified. I wonder what's in store for him at the Security Bureau.

10103503.Content: 看来他应该会被好好教训一番了。唉，我本来只是想追回钱袋，再敲他几下脑壳就行，没想闹那么大的……
10103503.Subtitle: Mmm, they'll probably give him a really harsh telling-off. But more importantly, I must commend you.

10103504.Content: 啊，差点忘了，报酬报酬！给你！
10103504.Subtitle: Heehee, you were on fire, my little minion! That brash thing, and yet we put him in his place!

10103505.Content: 嘿嘿，真是谢谢你啦，我的大恩人，我的异父异母的{性别：亲兄弟|亲姐妹}！
10103505.Subtitle: A little correction — it wasn't "we", you were hiding behind me the whole time.

10103506.Content: 我先赶紧回去把铜币分给大伙儿了。我呀，平常就在冰湖城到处“进货”，你跟贫民窟的人报我玛尔洁的名号，准能找到我。

10103507.Content: 小仆从，我们也快点回去找卡米拉吧！

10103601.Subtitle: The Asphodel is just to the south.

10103602.Content: 快来快来！白在广场等你们！
10103602.Subtitle: Come on! Snow will be waiting for you in the square!

10103701.Content: 这边，狩月人所有的委托都在这边的告示板上！
10103701.Subtitle: Over here, all the commissions for Phoxhunters are listed on this board!

10103801.Content: 哟，这不是白嘛，又在给狩月人帮忙？是不是又抓了几百个大盗，挫败了十几起惊天大阴谋呀？
10103801.Subtitle:
Ah, hi Snow! Lending a hand to the Phoxhunters again? What is it this time —\
Nabbed a few hundred bandits, thwarted a dozen dastardly schemes?

10103802.Content: 今天我比较低调，只抓了一个小偷。
10103802.Subtitle: Today I'm keeping it low-key, just nabbed a petty thief.

10103803.Content: 抓了一个？这听起来倒跟真的似的，我得见识见识。
10103803.Subtitle: Just one? That sounds almost believable, I've got to see this.

10103804.Content: 之前也没说过假话！快来快来，我的小仆从，这是威尔斯大叔，这里最勤快的狩月人啦。
10103804.Subtitle: I've never fibbed before! Come here, my little minion. This is Mr Wells, the most hard-working Phoxhunter around here.

10103806.Content: 就是你？长得白白净净，看不出来还真有点“本事”啊？
10103806.Subtitle: So it was you? Looking all neat and tidy, who'd have thought you had it in you?

10103807.Subtitle: Thanks, it was just a small thing.

10103808.Content: 小事？我跟你说，就是你们这些干小事的人太多，冰湖城才是现在这副样子。要是干什么大事，那冰湖城还不得翻了天去。
10103808.Subtitle:
A small thing? Let me tell you, it's all these small things that have turned Icelake into what it is now. If it was something big,\
Icelake would be turned upside down.

10103809.Content: 那我努努力，多向前辈学习——
10103809.Subtitle: Then I should try harder, learn from professionals like you—

10103810.Content: 学习？先消停会儿吧！好好思考，想想清楚，自己为什么会走上这条路。
10103810.Subtitle: Learn from me? You flatter me! Take a good long think and figure out why you ended up on this path, this is what you should do.

10103812.Content: 钱？谁不缺，别人还欠着我钱呢！缺就缺，我也没去偷，没去抢。
10103812.Subtitle: Who doesn't? I've got folks owing me a fortune! Being short's one thing, but I've never stooped to thieving or robbing.

10103813.Content: {nickname}，你回来了！刚才的委托还顺利吗？
10103813.Subtitle: ! You're back.

10103814.Content: 当然当然，我和小仆从可是把那个嚣张的小偷揍得哇哇乱叫，哭着求饶呢！

10103815.Content: 呃，搞了半天，原来你是捉小偷的那个？我还以为白管你叫仆从，一定是因为把你给抓住了，仔细想想，正常人怎么可能被白给抓住，我糊涂了。
10103815.Subtitle:
Huh, so you're the one who nabbed the thief? I thought Snow was calling you "minion" 'cause you were pinched by her...\
But then, who in their right mind would get caught by Snow... What was I thinking!

10103816.Content: 我是让{性别：他|她}来给我作证的！谁叫大叔你整天想着说教别人，这下闹笑话了吧？
10103816.Subtitle:
{性别:He|She} was the witness of my deeds! You had it all wrong! Made a fool of yourself this time, haven't you?\
Serves you right for being so preachy all the time!

10103817.Content: 抱歉抱歉，想喝点什么？去跟卡米拉说一声，我请你，就当作赔礼。
10103817.Subtitle: Sorry, sorry... fancy a drink? Just let Camilla know, it's on me. Consider it an apology.

10103901.Content: 太好了，你的第一个委托比我想象中还要顺利呢。
10103901.Subtitle: That's great! Your first commission went smoother than I expected.

10103902.Content: 和卡米拉说一声吧，我请客。
10103902.Subtitle: Go tell Camilla what drink you want, it's on me.

10104001.Content: 第一个任务还算利落，和威尔斯也聊的不错，你的狩月人生涯开场挺顺利的。
10104001.Subtitle: Your first gig was quite slick, and you got on with Wells. Your career as a Phoxhunter is off to a good start.

10104002.Content: 来吧，喝口热饮。本来还想请你一杯，但既然威尔斯开了口，那就记他账上吧。
10104002.Subtitle: Here, a hot drink to warm you up. I was going to treat you to one, but since Wells has offered, we'll put it on his tab.

10104003.Content: 哎，刚刚确实是我误会了这位{性别：小兄弟|小姑娘}，应该的。
10104003.Subtitle: Right, I did mistake this {性别:lad|lass} for a thief, it's the least I can do.

10104004.Content: 正好我也跟{性别：他|她}讲一讲现在的行情，老实说，最近咱们这行可不太好过，稍微值点钱的委托都得用抢的。
10104004.Subtitle:
Oh, and I can also catch {性别:him|her} up on our line of work. To be honest, it's been pretty tough lately,\
any commission worth a jot has to be fought for.

10104005.Content: 今天的委托我刚看过，净是吃力不讨好的小活。除了那个烫手山芋……
10104005.Subtitle: I just had a gander at today's jobs, and they're all thankless. Except for that hot potato...

10104006.Content: 一个麻烦委托，找一块见鬼的石头——唉，跟你说也没用，这活连我们这些老手都没人接，何况是你这样新来的。
10104006.Subtitle:
A right bother of a job, finding some daft stone — eh, no point in telling you, even us old hands don't dare touch it,\
let alone a newbie like you.

10104007.Content: 去格雷姆废矿，找一种叫做<H>“群星绮晶”</>的罕见矿石。委托人是<H>恩里克·埃塞尔莱德</>——没错，就是你见过的那个恩里克。
10104007.Subtitle:
It's looking for a rare mineral called Crystallo of Stella in the old Glevum Pit. The client is Henrik Ethelred—\
Yes, the very same Henrik you know.

10104008.Content: 格雷姆废矿现在已经是秽兽的巢穴了。曾有几个狩月人冒险去那儿，想去碰碰运气看还有没有月石剩下，他们都没能回来。
10104008.Subtitle:
Glevum Pit is now a den for Filthoids. A few Phoxhunters tried their luck, hoping to find some Phoxene scraps there,\
but not a soul came back.

10104009.Content: 所以虽然恩里克悬赏了五千银币，不过一天下来还是没有狩月人接手。
10104009.Subtitle: So, even with Henrik dangling 5,000 silver coins, no Phoxhunter's bitten by the end of the day.

10104010.Content: 狩月人是天生的冒险家，但不是来者不拒的莽夫！且不说废矿到底有没有他要的那石头，天知道恩里克到底能不能拿出来那笔钱？
10104010.Subtitle:
Phoxhunters are born adventurers, but we're not reckless fools! The stone's very existence aside...\
Who knows if Henrik can even cough up the cash?

10104011.Content: 你看他最近不是破产了，连家族房产都准备卖了吗？莫非他是准备靠倒卖群星绮晶赌一把？……不对啊，绮晶交易禁止这么多年了，他能找到门路卖出去？
10104011.Subtitle: Everyone knows he's recently gone bankrupt, even looking to sell off the family house. Is he planning to gamble it all on trading Crystallo? ...Wait a minute, Crystallo trading's been banned for years, how's he planning to unload it?

10104013.Content: 卡米拉女士，您之前提到过的，前往南方的车票是多少钱？
10104013.Subtitle: Ms Camilla, how much are those tickets to the South you mentioned earlier?

10104014.Content: 也是差不多的价格。怎么，你对这委托有兴趣？
10104014.Subtitle: About the same price. Interested in taking on the commission?

10104016.Content: 真要去？{性别：小老弟|小姑娘}，大叔我没跟你说笑——这可不是过家家！
10104016.Subtitle: You serious? Kid, I'm not joking with you — this isn't child's play!

10104017.Content: 谢谢你，我明白的。但是，卡米拉女士……
10104017.Subtitle: Thank you, I get it. But Ms Camilla...

10104018.Content: 你说过的。如果连这点事都做不到，那我靠什么去找我……弄丢的宝物。
10104018.Subtitle: You once told me — if I can't handle this, how am I supposed to find my family?

10104019.Content: 水仙平原对委托人和狩月人的委托内容不做干涉。你心意已决，我自然不会阻拦。
10104019.Subtitle: The Asphodel doesn't interfere with the choices of clients or Phoxhunters. If you're set on it, I won't stand in your way.

10104020.Content: 这是刚才追回钱包的报酬，拿好了。还有，带上这个。
10104020.Subtitle: Here's your due for getting Margie's money back. And take this with you as well.

10104021.Subtitle: Make it back in one piece.

10104201.Content: 悠着点啊，{性别：小老弟|小姑娘}。要是看到情况不对就赶紧跑。
10104201.Subtitle: Don't be a hero, kid. Run for your life if things get dicey.

10104301.Content: 回来了？怎么，是打算喝一杯？
10104301.Subtitle: Back for a drink already?

10104302.Content: 从哪儿聊起呢……呃，历史很长，八百年前的“大迁徙”之后，由帝国的初代皇帝建立，是帝国最早的几座城市之一。
10104302.Subtitle: Where to begin... well, it's got a long history. Built by the Empire's first ruler after the Great Migration 800 years ago, it's among the first few cities of the empire.

10104303.Content: 这里也是帝国最北的大城市。再往北一百多公里，过了维德弗尼尔山脉，就到了埃斯加特的地界。
10104303.Subtitle: It's also the northernmost major city of the Empire. Just over a hundred kilometres further north, past the Vidofnir Mountains, and you're on Askard's turf.

10104304.Content: 冰湖城曾经以出产月石闻名，比如几十年前格雷姆矿坑就是海伯利亚最大的月石矿场之一，但现在矿脉枯竭，只有当年的工厂勉强运行。
10104304.Subtitle: Icelake used to be known for its Phoxene veins. Take Glevum Pit for example — one of Hyperborea's largest Phoxene mines back in the day. But now, the veins are spent, only the old factories are barely chugging along.

10104305.Content: 不过嘛，这些都是你能够在书上看到，每个人都能说给你听的事情。我建议你还是自己用眼睛去看，用心去听，这座城市的冰雪之下到底覆盖着什么。
10104305.Subtitle: But then, this is all stuff you can read about in books, things anyone could tell you. I'd suggest you look with your own eyes and listen with your heart, to find out what truly lurks beneath this city's snow and ice.

10104306.Content: 一群热衷于说大话又斤斤计较的吵闹家伙。他们有的为生计所迫，有的只是单纯喜欢闹事与冒险——共同点是，他们经常把自己闹出一身伤。
10104306.Subtitle: A bunch of cheap, noisy blighters keen on spinning yarns. Some of them became Phoxhunters to eke a living, some just fancy a bit of ruckus and adventure. One thing they have in common is they often end up more battered and bruised than not.

10104307.Content: 说实话很多时候我想把他们统统赶走，让他们在门口吃脏雪喝北风。
10104307.Subtitle: Truth be told, I've often wanted to give them the boot, let them munch on dirty snow and gulp the north wind outside.

10104308.Content: 不过嘛，他们确实干了许多本应该是治安署干的活，没有他们，可能这座城里就没几个人有心思到水仙平原坐着来上一杯。
10104308.Subtitle: But then, they do manage a fair bit that ought to be the Security Bureau's job. Without them, likely not many in this city would have the luxury to kick back in my tavern.

10104309.Content: 所以嘛，我也允许他们在这边集聚谈天，互惠互利罢了。虽然我还是希望他们有时候说话小点声，少打几架。
10104309.Subtitle: So I let them gather and natter here, a bit of quid pro quo. Still, I do wish they'd keep it down a little and get into fewer brawls.

10104310.Content: 没有人告诉过你，无端打听一位女士的秘密是很没礼貌的？
10104310.Subtitle: Hasn't anyone told you it's rather rude to pry into a lady's secrets for no reason?

10104311.Content: 想听也可以——只要你支付得起足够的价码……呵呵。
10104311.Subtitle: Of course, I can share my stories with you — provided you can pay the right price... hehe.

10104402.Subtitle: Psyche? What are you doing here?

10104403.Content: 我来帮你们带路吧。我指的是……去格雷姆废矿的路。
10104403.Subtitle: I thought I'd help show you the way. I mean... to Glevum Pit.

10104404.Content: 白认识路！不过……嗯，如果有人一起的话更好了，毕竟这可是出城。
10104404.Subtitle: Snow knows the way! But... it's nice to have some company, especially when we're heading out of town.

10104405.Content: 是啊，外乡人在城外很容易迷路的。我看到你接了恩里克叔叔……我们的委托，所以我想我还是帮下忙为好。
10104405.Subtitle: Yeah, outsiders can easily lose their way out there. I saw you accepted Mr Henrik's... our request, so I thought I should help out.

10104406.Content: 刚好，我也想出来走走。我们出发吧？
10104406.Subtitle: Actually, I was looking forward to a little walk myself, too. Shall we get going?

10104501.Subtitle: Whoo... It's been a while since I've stepped out of the city.

10104502.Content: 落满雪的针叶林，望不到边的冰湖……高个子山峰被天空按住了脑袋……很喜欢。
10104502.Subtitle: The snow-draped conifers, the boundless lake... mountains with their peaks in the clouds... I love all this.

10104503.Content: 白还是更喜欢城里面！如果郊外没有那些到处巡逻的秽兽就好啦。
10104503.Subtitle: Snow's more a city soul! If only the outskirts were free of those roaming Filthoids.

10104504.Content: 里面更安全些。但是，我喜欢这里的……空气。
10104504.Subtitle: It's safer inside, indeed. But there's something about the... air out here.

10104505.Content: 有区别吗？我闻起来都差不多耶……
10104505.Subtitle: Is there a difference? All smells the same to me...

10104506.Content: 嗯……冰湖城的空气总是带着腥味，带着哭声。
10104506.Subtitle: Mmm... The air in Icelake is always tinged with a scent of blood and echoes of weeping.

10104507.Content: 而这里是森林的味道，浮冰的味道，还有驶向远方的汽笛。这里偶尔能看到雪白的鹿从林间窜出——
10104507.Subtitle: Out here, it's the scent of the forest and drifting ice, and the distant sound of steam whistles. Occasionally, you might catch a glimpse of snow-white deer darting through the trees—

10104508.Content: 而冰湖城街道的角落窜出来的，是小偷、强盗……或者呜咽的乞丐。
10104508.Subtitle: While around Icelake's alleys, what darts out are thieves, bandits... or whimpering beggars.

10104509.Content: {nickname}，你呢？讲讲你的故乡吧！那座海岛是怎样的？
10104509.Subtitle: What about your hometown, ? Tell us about it! What's that island like?

10104510.Content: 那里的“空气”是金色的砂砾，海岸的迷迭香……
10104510.Subtitle: The "air" there is golden gravel and white rue flowers...

10104511.Content: 是深夜朦胧的海雾，是我和贝……和家人每天眺望的巨大天之树。
10104511.Subtitle: It's misty sea fogs at midnight, and the massive Heaventree that Ber... my family and I used to gaze upon every day.

10104512.Content: 嗯……那如果你什么时候回去故乡，请代我向它们问候~
10104512.Subtitle: Mmm... if you ever make it back to your homeland, please send them my regards.

10104513.Content: ……唔唔，你们两个的话好难懂哦……
10104513.Subtitle: ...Umm, you two are talking over my head...

10104514.Content: 等你再长大一些就明白啦。
10104514.Subtitle: You'll get it when you're older.

10104515.Content: ……不过，皎皎之民似乎是长不大的？
10104515.Subtitle: ...But then again, Lunos never really grow older, do you?

10104601.Content: 前面就是格雷姆废矿的入口了，你们一定要小心。
10104601.Subtitle: The entrance to Glevum Pit is up ahead. Please be extra careful.

10104602.Subtitle: Thanks, you've been a tremendous help.

10104603.Content: 你们俩回去吧。接下来，我一个人就好。
10104603.Subtitle: You two should head back now. I can take it from here on my own.

10104605.Content: 魔王大人才不能临阵脱逃，让小仆从看扁。赛琪，你也跟上！
10104605.Subtitle: This Demon King can't just scarper from the battle and let the little minion think less of her. Psyche, you should also come with us!

10104607.Content: 对呀——和本魔王一起扫清这个怪物巢穴！赛琪，我猜你长这么大还没探险过吧？真可惜，你的人生一定是不完整的！
10104607.Subtitle:
Yup — come with the Demon King to clear out this monster's den!\
I bet you've never been on such an adventure, right? What a pity! Your life is certainly incomplete!

10104610.Content: 不，“没有经历过冒险，人生一定是不完整的”……我觉得，她说的没有错。
10104610.Subtitle: No, "a life without adventure is certainly incomplete"... I think she's right.

10104611.Content: 所以，可以带我一起去吗？
10104611.Subtitle: So, may I join you on this adventure?

10104612.Content: 走吧走吧！冰湖城天黑得早，咱们得抓紧时间。
10104612.Subtitle: Let's go, let's go! It gets dark early in Icelake, we gotta hurry.

10104614.Subtitle: ...Alright then. Be careful, both of you.

10104701.Subtitle: It's locked? Watch me bash it open!

10104704.Content: 这种厚度的门应该是无法用蛮力打开的。
10104704.Subtitle: A door this thick is probably impervious to brute force.

10104705.Content: 那我们在周围转转，看看有没有其它入口吧。
10104705.Subtitle: Then let's look around to see if there's another way in.

10104706.Content: 白，你的脑袋痛吗？我来帮你——
10104706.Subtitle: Snow, does your head hurt? Let me help you—

10104707.Subtitle: ...There, a little puff to ease the pain.

10104708.Content: 呜呜……你真是个大好人。等本魔王大人彻底占领这里，就封你——
10104708.Subtitle: Awww... you're such a nice person. When this Demon King conquers this place, I'll appoint you—

10104709.Content: “温柔的绿衣法师，睿智的月石主宰，第一代格雷姆矿场大公”！
10104709.Subtitle: "The Gentle Green-Cloaked Mage, the Wise Master of Phoxene, the Inaugural Grand Duke of Glevum Pit"!

10104710.Content: （之前我是下水道公爵……大公是不是比公爵还要高级一点的爵位啊？）
10104710.Subtitle: (I was the Duke of the Sewers... is a grand duke a higher rank than a duke?)

10104711.Content: （为什么赛琪的爵位比我高？等等，怎么我又在一本正经思考了。）
10104711.Subtitle: (How come Psyche gets a higher title than me? Hold on, why am I seriously mulling this over again?)

10104801.Content: “在魔王大人白的指引下，刚刚从远方抵达冰湖城的小仆从，只一天功夫就成为了出色的‘狩月人’。”
10104801.Subtitle: "Guided by Snow the Demon King, the little minion who just arrived in Icelake from afar has become a brilliant Phoxhunter in a mere day."

10104802.Content: 本魔王的传说又可以添上新的篇章啦。
10104802.Subtitle: A new chapter of the legend of this Demon King!

10104803.Content: “狩月人”这个名字还挺特别的……狩猎月亮？
10104803.Subtitle: "Phoxhunter" is a cool name... Do they all hunt something called Phox?

10104804.Content: 错了错了！狩月人这个名字和月亮没什么关系，它最早的意思其实是——“月石猎人”！
10104804.Subtitle: Nah! Phoxhunters nowadays are actually bounty hunters. It has something to do with Phoxene a long time ago.

10104805.Content: 嗯，我听说这个职业就是起源于冰湖城。
10104805.Subtitle: Right, I heard it used to refer to a profession that originated right here in Icelake.

10104806.Content: 似乎是因为，维德弗尼尔山一带有丰富的天之树矿脉，上面的月石可以卖出好价钱……
10104806.Subtitle: It seemed to all start with the rich Heaventree veins in the Vidofnir Mountains, and the Phoxene on them could be sold for a good price...

10104807.Content: 没错！所以很久很久以前，就有很多人冒险接受委托去采月石了。
10104807.Subtitle: Exactly! So, a long, long time ago, many people braved the risks of collecting Phoxene for money.

10104808.Content: 不过大商人和帝国先后接管了这附近的矿区，普通人就没什么机会碰到月石了……
10104808.Subtitle: But then the big merchants and the Empire took over the mines around here, and ordinary folk hardly had a chance with Phoxene anymore... After that, the local veins gradually ran dry.

10104809.Content: 不过呢，靠接取委托为生的狩月人，还是作为一种特色职业保留了下来，只是委托的种类呢就五花八门啦。
10104809.Subtitle: While Phoxhunters, who lived off commissions, remained as a profession. It's just that the types of commissions changed a lot since then.

10104810.Content: 大到从秽兽的魔爪下保护城市，小到从狗嘴里抢刚出炉的面包……
10104810.Subtitle: There are big ones like protecting the city from the claws of Filthoids, and little ones like getting freshly baked bread back from a dog's mouth...

10104812.Content: 还有一些更可怕的，比如让自己讨厌的家伙再也不会出现……
10104812.Subtitle: And some even more terrifying commissions like making sure a certain someone you don't like never shows up again...

10104813.Content: 可是，跑一趟水仙平原的功夫，面包不是早就被狗吃掉了吗？
10104813.Subtitle: But by the time you make a trip down to The Asphodel, wouldn't the bread have been gobbled up by the dog already?

10104814.Content: 你们两个能不能别再关心狗啦！
10104814.Subtitle: You're both missing the point here!

10104815.Content: 再后来，这附近的矿脉也渐渐枯竭掉了，比如现在这座格雷姆废矿……
10104815.Subtitle: After that, the local veins gradually ran dry, including this Glevum Pit...

10104816.Content: 对呀，好可惜哦！否则小仆从就能靠卖月石大赚一笔了。
10104816.Subtitle: Yeah, what a pity! Otherwise my little minion could have made a fortune selling Phoxene.

10104903.Content: 我刚刚突然看不清东西，没想到竟然惊动了它……抱歉！
10104903.Subtitle: I suddenly couldn't see clearly back there and ended up startling that monster... I'm so sorry!

10104906.Content: 好。可以战斗的话，一起来对付这个大块头。
10104906.Subtitle: Great. If you're in the condition to fight, let's take on this monster together.

10104907.Content: 明白了！我会尽我所能支援你。
10104907.Subtitle: Sure! I'll do my best to support you.

10105001.Content: 我听说多凶猛的野兽，只要能找到<H>弱点</>，就能打败……
10105001.Subtitle: They say even the fiercest beasts can be brought down by targeting their weaknesses...

10105002.Content: 秽兽一定也是这样！我们冷静下来……想办法找找它的弱点吧。
10105002.Subtitle: It must be the same with this Filthoid! Let's take a breath and find its weakness.

10105101.Content: 它变迟钝了。{nickname}，<H>看起来像肩膀的位置</>就是它的弱点！
10105101.Subtitle: It's become slow. , those gems must be its weak points!

10105201.Content: 它停下来了——趁这个机会！
10105201.Subtitle: It's stopped — now's our chance!

10105301.Content: 群星绮晶……真漂亮！难怪大家都喜欢。
10105301.Subtitle: Crystallo of Stella... Look at its beauty! No wonder everyone wants a piece of it.

10105302.Content: 刚刚这边好大的动静——该不会是你们搞定了那个大家伙？有两下子嘛。
10105302.Subtitle: What a commotion I just heard. So it was you guys that took out that giant thing? Impressive.

10105401.Content: 奥特赛德？！你装什么傻，绮晶怎么会在你手里？是我家小仆从先——
10105401.Subtitle: Outsider?! What are you doing here? How could you take the Crystallo?! Give it back, it's ours!

10105402.Content: 它就在这儿，也没长嘴喊谁“主人”。咱们狩月人干活又不是排队买面包，哪有什么先来后到。
10105402.Subtitle: It was just lying there with no one's name tag on it, wasn't it? Come on, in our line of work, there's no such thing as dibs.

10105403.Content: 你看着面生，新来的吧？这个道理总会有人教给你们，而我只是凑巧成为了你们的老师。要不，这颗绮晶就当交学费喽？
10105403.Subtitle: And you, you're new here, right? Someone has to teach you this lesson, and that someone just happened to be me today. Consider this Crystallo as tuition, shall we?

10105404.Content: 请还给我们！这颗绮晶对{nickname}、对我们都很重要！
10105404.Subtitle: Please give it back! That Crystallo is important to , and to all of us!

10105406.Content: 既然你不讲道理，那我们没什么好说的。
10105406.Subtitle: Since you refused to be a reasonable person, this conversation is over.

10105407.Content: 怎么直接动手的，真生气啦？
10105407.Subtitle: Whoa! Easy, kiddo. Don't get mad.

10105408.Subtitle: That's the spirit! Come on, , beat him up!

10105409.Content: 喂喂喂，动口不动手，动口不动手。要不这样，一人一半，你看行不行？
10105409.Subtitle: Come on, I did put in some effort too. Look, how about this? We split it 50/50, sounds fair?

10105410.Content: 火气这么大？小姑娘，要不你帮我劝劝你的同伴。
10105410.Subtitle: Got a bit of a temper, have we? Perhaps you could talk some sense into your friend, young lady?

10105411.Content: ……嗯，我知道了。不过，我不是很懂你们狩月人的规矩……
10105411.Subtitle: ...Sure. But I'm not really familiar with the way you Phoxhunters handle things...

10105412.Content: 没关系，你很有礼貌，我可以原谅——
10105412.Subtitle: No worries, you're a polite girl, I forgive y—

10105413.Content: 不懂规矩确实是我们的错……所以，为了表示歉意，奥特赛德先生，请你先动手吧。
10105413.Subtitle: We're sorry for not understanding the rules... So, as an apology, Mr Outsider, we'll let you make the first strike.

10105414.Content: 什——你们先等一下！别看你们这二对一，真打起来还不知道谁胜算大呢。你说是不是？
10105414.Subtitle: Wha—hold on! Even if it's two-on-one, there's no guarantee you can beat me, am I right?

10105415.Content: 等，等等！我跟你说，我很强的啊，整个冰湖城的狩月人没谁能打过我。听说过大军团长西比尔没？我啊，能跟她打个五五开。
10105415.Subtitle: Wait a sec! I'm telling you, I'm really strong. No Phoxhunter around Icelake can best me. Ever heard of Chief Sibylle? I'm a match for her.

10105416.Content: 你这人怎么比我还能吹牛啊！
10105416.Subtitle: ...You are a match for me at big talk, that's for sure.

10105417.Content: 好了好了，开个玩笑，别绷那么紧嘛。
10105417.Subtitle: Alright, alright, I was joking around, trying to lighten the mood, you know.

10105418.Content: 啊，狗耳朵角的坏东西又在耍人！
10105418.Subtitle: Hmph, this crafty Mutt Ears is trying to pull more tricks!

10105419.Content: 你们几个……是你说了算吧？你们费这么大功夫找这绮晶，是为什么？
10105419.Subtitle: You call the shots in your little crew, right? Tell me — why did you guys go to all this trouble for this Crystallo?

10105420.Content: 果然。那就好办多了。虽然因为某些缘由，这枚绮晶我现在必须带走，但如果你的目的是赏金，我可以还你同样的数目。
10105420.Subtitle: That's false, everyone might hide away, but Outsider certainly can't.

10105421.Content: 如果可以，我想请你听一听我的理由——今晚有空的话。
10105421.Subtitle: If you've got a moment, I'd like to explain — Are you free tonight?

10105422.Content: 啊，这倒是很简单，有白当证人，他赖不掉！还有，卡米拉说过，奥特赛德家里有个凶神恶煞的亲戚，他怕得要命。
10105422.Subtitle: Oh, that's easy. With Snow as a witness, he won't be able to weasel out! Besides, Camilla mentioned he's got a terrifying relative at home he's really scared of.

10105423.Content: 只要你用“去他家门口大声宣读罪状”来威胁奥特赛德，他就会向你拼命求饶的。
10105423.Subtitle: Just threaten to air his dirty laundry right on his doorstep, and he'll be begging for mercy in no time.

10105425.Content: “水仙平原”所有人都认识我奥特赛德，跑不了的。你们先回去吧，我还得留在这里忙上一阵。
10105425.Subtitle: You can rest assured — everyone at The Asphodel knows me. Well, I've still got things to take care of here. You kids can go ahead without me.

10105426.Subtitle: Er, how come you are as clueless as a newly hatched quail? I bet even that white little button mushroom beside you is even more informed.

10105427.Subtitle: Of course, Snow's really smart—wait, what did you just call me? How rude!

10105428.Content: 要不是碰上这怪物，它们的主人没准还好端端地坐在水仙平原，喝着酒，吹着牛。
10105428.Subtitle: If it hadn't been for this monster, their owners might be chilling at The Asphodel, sipping drinks and swapping stories.

10105429.Content: 我想看看能不能辨认出他们的身份，把遗物交还给他们家人……既然到这儿了，总不能就这么放着不管。
10105429.Subtitle: I want to see if I can identify them and return their belongings to their families… Now that I'm here, I can't just leave it be.

10105430.Content: 今天算是幸运，贸然闯进来的是你这样的“骸”。要是换成普通人，肯定也和他们一个下场了。
10105430.Subtitle: Simply put, "Awakening" is a stage of growth every Charon goes through, usually around adulthood. During Awakening, their body emits a very bright light — you must have some memory of it!

10105431.Subtitle: After Awakening, some Charons become much stronger — like you, and gain the ability to use special magic! They are called "Daimons".

10105432.Content: 就是像我们这样的，经历过<H>“觉醒”</>之后，获得特殊力量的卡戎。
10105432.Subtitle: (It was that moment... No wonder I felt lighter than before, and my wounds must've healed around that time too.)

10105433.Content: 唉，我说，你怎么茫然得像只刚出壳的鹌鹑。恐怕旁边那个白色小矮子都比你清楚。
10105433.Subtitle: (...As for my magic ability... could it be "Resonance"?)

10105434.Content: 当然，白知道得可多——等等，你叫我什么？好过分！
10105434.Subtitle: "Daimons" are rare, so you guys are lucky ducks!

10105435.Content: 哪里过分了，这叫“诚实”。我真诚的心和这颗绮晶一样晶莹剔透。
10105435.Subtitle:
Most Charons aren't so lucky. At best, they get a bit sturdier. There are even some that might turn into scary monsters!\
Though I've never seen it myself.

10105436.Content: 哼，我才不和你这种小角色计较！小仆从，来，本魔王讲给你听。
10105436.Subtitle: The button mushroom covers about most of it. Ordinary Charons might be able to handle small Filthoids if they give it their best shot, but huge ones like the one we just fought are deadly for them.

10105437.Content: 简单来说呢，“觉醒”是每个卡戎之民都会经历的成长阶段，大多都发生在成年前后。觉醒的瞬间，身上会发出很亮很亮的光——你肯定有印象的！
10105437.Subtitle: They were just trying to complete a commission...

10105438.Content: 在觉醒之后呢，有些卡戎会变强大许多——就像你们一样，还会使用特别的魔法！他们就是“骸”。
10105438.Subtitle: After Awakening, some Charons become much stronger — like you, and gain the ability to use special magic! They are called "Daimons."

10105439.Content: （是那个时候……难怪我会觉得身体比以前轻盈多了，身上的伤口也是那时痊愈的吧。）
10105439.Subtitle:
I'll be back a bit late. Come find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city,\
the one with a little bird drawn on the door.

10105440.Subtitle: And come alone — don't bring anyone unrelated.

10105441.Content: “骸”的数量很稀少，所以，你们是百里挑一的幸运儿哦！
10105441.Subtitle:
Most Charons aren't so lucky. At best, they get a bit sturdier. There are even some that might turn into scary monsters!\
Though I've never seen it myself.

10105442.Content: 大部分卡戎之民就没那么幸运了，最多就是身体变得结实一些。据说还有少数人会变得很可怕，不过我没有亲眼见过！
10105442.Subtitle: The button mushroom covers about most of it. Ordinary Charons might be able to handle small Filthoids if they give it their best shot, but huge ones like the one we just fought are deadly for them.

10105443.Content: 总之，事实大概和白色小矮子说的差不多。普通的卡戎也许能勉强应付小型秽兽，但刚才这种巨型秽兽，对他们来说是致命的。
10105443.Subtitle: They were just trying to complete a commission...

10105444.Content: 他们都是为了一份委托……
10105444.Subtitle: No, they were just trying to survive. Well, off you go. I'll handle the rest here.

10105445.Content: 没那么高尚，为了活下去而已。好了，快走吧。接下来的事，我自己来就行。
10105445.Subtitle:
I'll be back a bit late. Come find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city,\
the one with a little bird drawn on the door.

10105446.Content: 我会回去晚一些，到时候水仙平原可能已经打烊了。去我家找我吧，我家在城南的那堆破房子那儿，门上画着一只小鸟那个。
10105446.Subtitle: I'll be back a bit late, might miss The Asphodel's closing time. Come and find me at my place — it's among those shabby houses south of the city, the one with a little bird drawn on the door.

10105447.Content: 还有，一个人来——别带无关的家伙。
10105447.Subtitle: And come alone — don't bring anyone unrelated.

10105501.Content: 那边好像有条路！我们快上去，这里站久了老觉得阴森森的……
10105501.Subtitle: "Anyone unrelated"... Wait, he wasn't talking about me, was he?

10105502.Content: ……等等，刚才他那句“无关的家伙”，说的不会是我吧？
10105502.Subtitle: ...Wait, when he said "anyone unrelated," he wasn't talking about me, was he?

10105601.Content: 这条小路和之前的矿道好像不太一样，像是什么人自己挖出来的。
10105601.Subtitle: This trail feels different from the one we passed through earlier, almost as if it's been hand-dug by someone.

10105602.Content: 还真是耶，这里还有好几把镐子……看来早有冒险家来过这儿了！
10105602.Subtitle: Yeah, there are even shovels lying around here... Looks like other adventurers have been here before us!

10105603.Content: 诶，赛琪你怎么脸色那么差？从刚才开始就没见你说话了。
10105603.Subtitle: Are you alright, Psyche? You look pale, and you've been so quiet since a while ago.

10105605.Content: 可能是想到刚才那只怪物，还有些后怕吧。那只怪物会不会曾经也……
10105605.Subtitle: I'm probably still a bit shaken from that monster we met back there.

10105606.Content: 这有什么好怕的！不是有我们在吗？
10105606.Subtitle: Relax! We're right here with you!

10105607.Content: 刚才那家伙说过，小仆从是很厉害的“骸”吧？就算再来十只秽兽，肯定也不是{性别：他|她}的对手。
10105607.Subtitle: That Outsider said that my little minion is a strong "Daimon," right? So even if ten more Filthoids came at us, they'd be no match for {性别:him|her}.

10105608.Content: 少起哄，我已经快用光力气了，赛琪刚刚也是在虚张声势吧。
10105608.Subtitle: Rubbish. I'm nearly spent, and Psyche was just bluffing.

10105609.Content: 还好你们都平安无事……也许我当时不该让你们一起涉险。
10105609.Subtitle: I'm just relieved you're both safe... Maybe I shouldn't have involved you two in such a dangerous event.

10105610.Content: 不是的！这一次的“冒险”，我很满足。
10105610.Subtitle: No, not at all! I'm really happy that I took part in such an adventure.

10105611.Content: 我从未想过能和伙伴们一起逃离熟悉的城市，去未曾去过的地方，一起闯祸，一起战胜险恶的敌人。
10105611.Subtitle: I never thought I'd get out of town with friends, explore unknown places, get in trouble, and fight evil enemies together.

10105612.Content: ……现在想想，还有些晕乎乎的，就像是大白天做了一场梦一样。
10105612.Subtitle: Now that I think about it, it all feels so unreal, like living a daydream.

10105613.Content: 你看，赛琪都这么说了吧！
10105613.Subtitle: See? Psyche agrees with me!

10105701.Content: 那边那个不是……恩里克吗？他怎么跑这里来了？
10105701.Subtitle: Isn't that... Henrik over there? What's he doing here?

10105803.Content: 你应该留在修普诺斯之家，而不是跟在这个来路不明的小鬼后面。你不知道{性别：他|她}是什么底细，同样地，{性别：他|她}也没{性别：他|她}想象地那么了解你。
10105803.Subtitle:
You should've stayed at the Hypnos' House instead of fooling around with this sketchy brat.\
You don't know {性别:his|her} backstory, and {性别:he|she} doesn't really know you that well.

10105805.Content: 格雷姆矿坑。我……想一起帮忙找群星绮晶。
10105805.Subtitle: Glevum Pit. I... wanted to help find the Crystallo of Stella.

10105806.Content: 先别管绮晶。进修普诺斯之家的第一天，我跟你说过什么，还记得吗？
10105806.Subtitle: Forget the Crystallo. Remember what I said on your first day at the Hypnos' House?

10105807.Content: “不要随便走动，如果一定要去什么地方，先和您说。”
10105807.Subtitle: "Don't wander off, and inform me first if you need to go somewhere."

10105808.Content: 还记得就好。在做出决定之前，想想我跟你说的话，想想你父母为什么把你托付给我。
10105808.Subtitle:
Good that you remember. Before making any decisions, think about what I told you, and why your parents left you in my care.\
