If anything had happened and gotten in the way of our work, you know the consequences.

10105809.Content: 如果耽误了正事，或者被旁人看出来什么……你知道后果。

10105811.Content: 好孩子，不要再有下次了。
10105811.Subtitle: You're a good kid, just don't let this ever happen again.

10105813.Content: 管好你自己的事，少和无关的人牵扯。这对谁都好。
10105813.Subtitle: Tend your own garden and don't drag irrelevant people into your business. It's better for everyone.

10105814.Content: 她不是你的女儿。就算是，你也不该连这点自由都不给她。你知道出一趟门她有多开心吗？
10105814.Subtitle: She is not your daughter. Even if she were, you shouldn't deprive her of such simple freedoms. Do you know how happy she was during our little trip?

10105815.Content: 要不我们聊聊别的，比如，你对所有人都这么礼貌吗？难怪你那栋宅子会一直卖不出去。
10105815.Subtitle: Let's talk about something else then. For example, are you this polite and friendly to everyone? No wonder that house of yours never sells.

10105816.Content: 少自以为是。与其操别人的心，不如想想怎么过好你在屋檐下的最后一晚。
10105816.Subtitle: That's my problem. For you, the thing to worry about should be where to crash after tonight.

10105817.Content: 等天亮了，就给我搬出去。
10105817.Subtitle: By morning, I expect you to move out.

10105901.Content: 恩里克这家伙，一开口还是这么让人火大……
10105901.Subtitle: That Henrik always knows how to rile people...

10105902.Subtitle: I just hope he won't be too harsh on Psyche.

10105903.Content: 至于是不是住在宅子里的最后一晚，得要去找奥特赛德了。
10105903.Subtitle: As for whether this is my last night in that house, I need to talk to Outsider.

10105904.Content: 要绕开我说悄悄话对吧？奥特赛德事儿真多。
10105904.Subtitle: You two are gonna have that secret little talk without me, huh? That Outsider is such a pest.

10105905.Content: 哼，我还不稀罕听呢！你走吧，我要去水仙平原玩了。
10105905.Subtitle: Hmph, like I care! Off you go, I'm gonna go chill out at the Asphodel.

10106001.Subtitle: ♪ "Little nightingale with ripped wings, do not let tears dampen your feathers..."

10106002.Subtitle: ♪ "Sweet nightingale with a brave heart, do not fall into endless slumber..."

10106003.Content: 小夜莺，你听！大魔法师回来了。
10106003.Subtitle: Little nightingale, your magician has returned.

10106004.Content: 奥特赛德！你今天回来得好晚，又去了哪里冒险吗？
10106004.Subtitle: Outsider! You're home so late today, *coughs* ...Where have you been adventuring?

10106005.Content: 雪狼出没的密林，还是沼泽女巫的塔楼？
10106005.Subtitle: Was it in the dense woods where snow wolves prowl, or the swamp witch's tower?

10106006.Content: 我哪里都没去。今天可是菲娜小姐的生日啊，我一直待在冰湖城。
10106006.Subtitle: I didn't go anywhere. Today is Miss Fina's birthday, so I stayed in Icelake.

10106007.Content: 不，每次你都这样说，但手臂上总是会多出新的伤痕，咳、咳……
10106007.Subtitle: You always say so, yet new scars keep appearing on your arms. *coughs*

10106008.Content: 哎呀，那都是之前的事了，这次是真的没有。看，我这次出门啊，是为了给菲娜带这个。
10106008.Subtitle: But this time it's false. Look, I went out today to get this for you.

10106009.Content: 这是……蛋糕？可是，我们家附近买不到蛋糕吧。
10106009.Subtitle: Is this... a cake? But there aren't any cake shops in the neighbourhood.

10106010.Content: 我自有办法。要知道，我可是智慧超绝的魔法师啊。别管它了，我还有一个东西给你看。
10106010.Subtitle: I have my ways. You know, I am a magician of extraordinary wisdom. Don't overthink it; I have something else to show you.

10106011.Content: 你闭上眼睛，从五默数到一。
10106011.Subtitle: Close your eyes, and count down from five to one.

10106014.Content: 你看了我写的故事，对不对？
10106014.Subtitle: You read the story I wrote, didn't you?

10106015.Content: “夜莺喜欢看天空，但那里除了一片漆黑什么也没有。‘如果能看见星星就好了。’她悄悄许愿：‘哪怕只有一眼。’”
10106015.Subtitle:
"The nightingale yearned for the sky, but it was ever so dark. 'If only I could see the stars once,'\
she wished silently, 'even but for a fleeting moment.'"

10106016.Content: 冰湖城的晚上很少放晴，所以你……变出了星空。
10106016.Subtitle: Nights in Icelake are always so misty, so you... conjured up a starry sky.

10106018.Content: 谢谢你，奥特赛德。你是最棒的魔法师。
10106018.Subtitle: Thank you, Outsider. You are the greatest magician.

10106019.Content: 咳，你的“城堡”有客人来了。我去看看。
10106019.Subtitle: Ahem, it seems your "garden" has a visitor. I'll go have a look.

10106101.Subtitle:
What are you doing standing here? Are you spying on me? I'm a decent citizen\
with no scandalous secret for you to see.

10106102.Content: 这位{性别：大哥哥|大姐姐}是……
10106102.Subtitle: Who is this {性别:gentleman|lady}...

10106103.Subtitle: This is... a new friend of mine, sort of.

10106105.Content: 你好！我是菲娜，奥特赛德的妹妹……咳、咳！
10106105.Subtitle: Pleased to meet you. I'm Fina, Outsider's sister... *coughs*

10106106.Content: 我叫{nickname}。你该不会就是那个……凶神恶煞的亲戚……？

10106107.Content: ……别听水仙平原的小矮子瞎说，那皎皎嘴里没句好话。

10106108.Content: 凶神……恶煞？我不太明白……我是菲娜，奥特赛德的妹妹——咳、咳！

10106109.Content: 没事吧，我给你倒点热水。
10106109.Subtitle: Are you alright? I'll get you some warm water.

10106110.Content: 不用，我没事的！只是，难得有奥特赛德的朋友来，我很开心。你也一起来参加茶会吧？我会分给你甜甜的蛋糕。
10106110.Subtitle: It's okay, I'm fine! Just happy to have a friend of Outsider's over. Would you like to join our tea party? I'll treat you to cake.

10106112.Content: 咳，就是喝水……你就听她的，别在意细节。
10106112.Subtitle: Ahem, it's actually water. Just play along, don't get hung up on the tiny details.

10106203.Content: 没什么。只是味道很甜，让我想起了一个人……我的家人。她总是会在饭菜里放很多很多糖。
10106203.Subtitle: Nothing. It's just that, the cake is quite sweet, which reminds me of my family... She used to season food with lots of sugar.

10106204.Content: 我们长大的那座小岛，最不缺鱼和盐，但是糖的价格却有些昂贵。所以小的时候，我们是从来都吃不到糖的。
10106204.Subtitle:
The small island we grew up on had plenty of fish and salt, but sugar was a rarity. So, when we were little,\
we never really got to have any.

10106205.Content: 她只是个比我年长几岁的女孩子，很小的时候，她就去隔壁的渔夫那里做帮工了。
10106205.Subtitle: She's only a few years older than me, but from a young age, she began working as a helper for the neighbouring fisherman.

10106206.Content: 有一次，那个渔夫不知从哪儿搞来了一些帝国物资，其中就有两罐糖，她便用半个月的工钱换了那么一小罐。
10106206.Subtitle:
One time, that fisherman somehow got his hands on some imperial supplies, including two jars of sugar,\
and she traded half a month's wages for one small jar.

10106207.Content: 那是她第一次拿到糖，她自己也不知道要怎么用，只知道那是很好很好的东西。所以，她就在炖鱼的时候，一股脑地全都倒了进去。
10106207.Subtitle:
It was the first time she got hold of any sugar, and she didn't know how to use it.\
Simply knowing that it was something valuable and delicious, she poured it all into the fish stew.

10106208.Content: 等到我们都长大，到了开始能够赚更多工钱的年纪，糖就不再是那么奢侈的东西了。但是轮到她下厨的时候，她还是会习惯性地放很多糖进去。
10106208.Subtitle:
By the time we grew up and started earning more, sugar wasn't such a luxury anymore. But whenever she cooked,\
she'd still add a lot of sugar out of habit.

10106209.Content: 天呐，我感觉我已经闻到了那股腥甜的味儿，太可怕了。她应该向你道歉，或者至少向糖和鱼道歉。
10106209.Subtitle: Goodness, that sounds horrible... I can almost smell that fishy, sickly-sweet odour. She owes you an apology; or at the very least, she owes the sugar and the fish an apology.

10106210.Content: 不，奥特赛德，你没有听懂这个故事。
10106210.Subtitle: No, Outsider, you've missed the point of the story.

10106211.Content: 那位总是放许多糖的小姐一定有着强大的魔法。所以在{性别：大哥哥|大姐姐}眼里，和她有关的一切都是好的，哪怕是甜到无法下咽的饭菜。
10106211.Subtitle:
I believe that lady who always used a lot of sugar when cooking was also a great magician. In our guest's eyes,\
everything related to her was good, even if the food was unbearably sweet.

10106212.Content: 好吧，菲娜说的都对。所以那个女孩儿现在在哪儿呢？要不你给她打包一份，让她品尝一下正常的甜食。
10106212.Subtitle: Okay, whatever Fina says. So where is that girl now? Perhaps you can bring her some cake, let her know what normal sweets taste like.

10106213.Content: 我们失散了。昨天……也许是更久之前。我不知道。
10106213.Subtitle: We got separated and lost touch yesterday... or maybe longer ago. I'm not sure.

10106215.Content: 那你……要去找她！因为家人是像花和树、雪和风那样，拼尽全力也要依靠在一起的人，你一定要找到她。
10106215.Subtitle:
Then you must find her...! Because family is like flowers and trees, snow and wind — they should be together no matter what.\
You have to find her.

10106216.Subtitle: Yeah, I will. I WILL find her.

10106217.Content: 所以，奥特赛德，我需要钱，一笔钱用来住下来，打探消息，还要另一笔钱，随时出发，找到我的家人。
10106217.Subtitle:
So, Outsider, I need money — for accommodation, information gathering, and some extra set apart\
in case I need to set off right away to find my family.

10106218.Content: ……菲娜，准备休息吧。我和{nickname}还有其他事要聊——狩月人的杂事。
10106218.Subtitle: ...Time for bed, Fina.  and I have other matters to discuss — Phoxhunter stuff.

10106219.Content: 嗯，晚安。你们两个都晚安。
10106219.Subtitle: Okay, I'm going to bed now.

10106301.Content: 该谈谈正事了。我是说，今天在废矿带走群星绮晶的事。
10106301.Subtitle: Time for a serious talk — about what happened at the pit earlier. I get where you're coming from, but I hope you'll hear me out too.

10106302.Content: 不好意思啊，当时为了支开旁人和你单独谈谈，用了一些非常手段。
10106302.Subtitle: I'll get straight to the point: I don't trust Henrik Ethelred. Not one bit.

10106304.Content: 不关她事。小矮子虽然大话张口就来，但人还算有分寸，听到什么也不大要紧。我担心的是旁边那个绿衣服小姑娘。
10106304.Subtitle: And even if he's got the cash, his reasons for seeking the Crystallo of Stella are quite fishy. I suspect he's up to some shady business.

10106305.Content: 如果你指的是绿衣服小姑娘，那没错。
10106305.Subtitle:
Do you know what Crystallo of Stella is? Nice-looking rocks that used to be popular for their looks — but that's not the whole story.\
In some countries, they're used for... medicinal purposes.

10106306.Content: 我见过她出入“修普诺斯之家”。我不知道她到底只是个普通住客，还是恩里克·埃塞尔莱德的帮手。
10106306.Subtitle: I've seen her going in and out of Hypnos' House. I don't know if she's just a regular lodger or some kind of assistant to Henrik Ethelred.

10106307.Content: 我不绕圈子直说了：恩里克这人有问题，我怀疑他在做一些见不得人的勾当。
10106307.Subtitle: I'll cut to the chase: I don't trust Henrik Ethelred — I suspect he's up to something shady.

10106309.Content: 你知道他找的这个群星绮晶是什么吗？这种矿石，一度因为漂亮很受欢迎——但这只是表象。在一些国家，它的用途是……医药。
10106309.Subtitle: Do you know anything about the Crystallo of Stella — the stuff he's after? They're beautiful rocks that were popular for their looks, but that's not the whole story. In some countries, they're used for... medicinal purposes.

10106310.Content: 十八年前，在弗莱格桑省，出过一起群星绮晶用于医药导致的严重事故，大半个城市陷入了混乱。绮晶贸易禁令也是在那个时候颁布的。
10106310.Subtitle:
I've heard about those staying there — all young, not even twenty. The weird part? You see them go in, but never out.\
No one knows where they end up.

10106311.Content: 他违背了禁令。这件事我听说了。
10106311.Subtitle: He's violating the ban. I've heard about it.

10106312.Content: 只是这样也就罢了。冰湖城大街上站着的，有几个人手里真的干干净净？关键在于，另一些关于“修普诺斯之家”的流言。
10106312.Subtitle: That's not the half of it. How many folks on the streets of Icelake can truly claim clean hands? What really gets me are the rumours about the Hypnos' House.

10106313.Content: 附近的人说，恩里克和那里的住客行事怪异，他们向来不与外人交往。虽然打着旅店的名义，但是它所有的住客都是由恩里克<H>挑选</>。
10106313.Subtitle: People in the neighbourhood say that Henrik and his lodgers are a weird bunch. They keep to themselves, and though they call it an inn, Henrik's the one picking who stays.

10106314.Content: 有人偷瞧过几眼，里面都是些不到二十岁的年轻人。更奇怪的是，那里的住客向来只见进去，不见出来。没人知道那些住客最后去了哪里。
10106314.Subtitle: Some have peeked inside — the lodgers there are all young people under twenty. Stranger still, you see them go in but never out. No one knows where those young lodgers end up.

10106315.Content: 我也听说过一些“鬼宅”之类的传言，这么一说就更……
10106315.Subtitle: Yes, I've heard some "haunted house" rumours as well, makes you wonder... But speaking of which—

10106316.Content: 说起来，你为什么会调查到这个？
10106316.Subtitle: D**n it! If it wasn't for Fina, I'd have chucked him into Lamenting Lake to feed the fish.

10106317.Content: 我有个搭过几次伙的年轻狩月人，叫亨特的小兄弟。一个月前他失踪了，城里的拾荒小妹是最后一个见过他的人——在“修普诺斯之家”门口。
10106317.Subtitle: ...But you're starting to suspect he's after Fina, aren't you?

10106318.Content: 前几天我去了那个旅馆，和恩里克大吵了一架。结果呢，匕首都架在那家伙脖子上了，他还是不肯说出亨特的下落。
10106318.Subtitle: Exactly. That's why I need to get to the bottom of Henrik's deal.

10106319.Content: 他只是在那儿冷笑，“卡戎之民谋害人类是什么下场，你比我更懂。我知道你有个妹妹。为了她，少管闲事。”
10106319.Subtitle: I'm worried about Psyche...

10106320.Content: 他*的！真想把他扔进泪湖喂鱼。总之，我必须查清楚亨特的下落，还有恩里克的底细。
10106320.Subtitle:
I mean the girl who went to the pit with me. She's a lodger at the Hypnos' House, a really nice girl...\
If Henrik's up to no good, she could be in danger.

10106321.Subtitle: You really care about your friend.

10106322.Content: ……不只是为了亨特，更是为了菲娜。我不想再看见亲人生活在恐惧之中。
10106322.Subtitle: My original plan was to get the Crystallo of Stella from the pit and use them as an excuse to apologise to Henrik and investigate the inn.

10106323.Content: 这么说来，我也有个担心的人……你提到的绿衣服女孩，赛琪。
10106323.Subtitle:
I thought no one would take the job, so I went off to sort out a cake first — didn't expect you newbies to throw a curveball.\
How about we strike a deal?

10106324.Content: 如果恩里克真的有什么阴谋，相比怀疑，我更担心恩里克会对她不利。她不会做坏事……我相信我的直觉。
10106324.Subtitle: So you want me to give up the reward?

10106325.Content: 那更好了，看来我们已经有了共同的目标。
10106325.Subtitle: What's this deal? You know I need the money.

10106326.Content: 我原本是打算去废矿弄来群星绮晶，再借着拿绮晶跟恩里克上门赔罪的由头，进旅馆里面瞧瞧。
10106326.Subtitle:
I'd be pretty stupid to expect you to be some kind of saint. I mean — this is business.\
What I can offer you is another thing you might really need—

10106327.Content: 我本来想着那委托肯定没人会接，就先去找路子买蛋糕了——结果没想到碰上你们这么不按套路出牌的新人。所以，要不要做个交易？
10106327.Subtitle:
An "identity". A pass that allows you to move freely in Hyperborea, except for the high inner city behind the watchtowers —\
that's reserved for the high and mighty.

10106328.Content: 我可以弄到一个你心心念念的东西——
10106328.Subtitle: Many are willing to offer you money, but few would risk their lives to get you this.

10106329.Content: “身份”。一个能让你在海伯利亚畅通无阻的身份。当然，哨塔后面高高的内城除外，它的城门只留给那些大人物。
10106329.Subtitle: How did you know I needed that...

10106330.Content: 很多人会愿意给你银币，但很少有人愿意冒着性命危险给你这个。
10106330.Subtitle: You're talking about a travel permit, right? How can you get one?

10106331.Content: 你怎么知道我需要这个……
10106331.Subtitle: Just a guess. So you really don't have a travel permit, huh? Lucky you ran into me. Without one, you'd be in a world of trouble in Hyperborea, unless you just hide in a shadowy corner all day.

10106332.Content: 当然是——猜的。所以你真没有通行证啊？哎，还好遇到了我，否则你在海伯利亚可有罪受喽，哪儿都去不了。
10106332.Subtitle: (...He's trying to fish for information.)

10106333.Subtitle: Ah, got it. You're talking about getting a fake one, aren't you?

10106334.Content: 通行证是吧。那你能怎么搞到？
10106334.Subtitle: Then I can also find someone to make one for me.

10106335.Content: 你要怎么搞到呢，你和冰湖城的卫兵很熟？
10106335.Subtitle: How can you get one? Are you buddies with the guards in Icelake?

10106336.Content: 熟倒是谈不上，但是狩月人自然有一些自己的小小方式。
10106336.Subtitle: Can't say I am, but we Phoxhunters have our ways.

10106337.Content: 哦，我知道了。办张假的对吧。
10106337.Subtitle: Ah, got it. You're talking about getting a fake one, aren't you?

10106338.Content: 那我自己去找人办一份不就行了？
10106338.Subtitle: Then I can also find someone to make one for me.

10106339.Content: 在这座城市，有些东西是银币和铜币买不到的——尤其是那些可能会引火烧身的东西。能买到它的，是人与人之间那一根“看不见的线”。
10106339.Subtitle:
There are things in this city that money can't buy, especially if they could land you in hot water.\
What you need is that "invisible thread" of connections between people.

10106340.Content: （在海伯利亚……没有通行证的确举步维艰。）
10106340.Subtitle: (Without a travel permit, it's indeed difficult to get around in Hyperborea.)

10106341.Content: 这个交易，你想要我做什么？群星绮晶让给你？
10106341.Subtitle: Alright. So what do I need to do for this deal? Just let go of the Crystallo?

10106342.Content: 不，绮晶当然是你的，用它和恩里克换银币就是。我想要你做的，是想办法进旅馆去，看看里面到底有什么。
10106342.Subtitle: No, you can have it. All I need from you is one thing: while delivering the Crystallo, find a way to investigate the Hypnos' House.

10106343.Content: 你是外乡人，他对你想必不会太警惕，没准真能查出来点东西。
10106343.Subtitle: Is that all?

10106344.Content: 这倒是简单。换通行证……也不算亏。
10106344.Subtitle: Aren't you worried I'll just take the Crystallo and run?

10106345.Content: 嗯，虽说简单，但还是要提防着些。明天中午十二点，我在这里等你消息。
10106345.Subtitle: I trust you.

10106401.Content: 早点休息吧。明天中午十二点，我在这里等你消息。
10106401.Subtitle: Better go get some rest. I'll be here at 12:00 tomorrow waiting for you.

10106501.Content: 贝蕾……今天发生了很多、很多事。
10106501.Subtitle: Berry... so much has happened today.

10106502.Content: 你那里能看得见月亮吗，像我看到的月亮一样？
10106502.Subtitle: Can you see the moon from where you are, the very same moon that I'm looking at?

10106503.Content: ……明天，我们也会一起活下去的。
10106503.Subtitle: ...Tomorrow, we will still survive.

10106601.Content: （……天亮了。该动身去修普诺斯之家了。）
10106601.Subtitle: (...It's dawn. Time to head to the Hypnos' House.)

10106703.Content: 来这里干什么，不是告诉过你天亮就走人吗？
10106703.Subtitle: What are you doing here? Didn't I ask you to leave in the morning?

10106704.Content: 我找到了你要的东西，<H>群星绮晶</>。
10106704.Subtitle: I've got what you were looking for, the Crystallo of Stella.

10106705.Content: 没人要你登门。你去水仙平原，把东西交给卡米拉·斯卡雷特就行。
10106705.Subtitle: No one asked for you to come here. Go to The Asphodel and give it to Camilla Scarlet.

10106706.Content: 我是外乡来的，不太懂冰湖城的规矩。我们那里所谓交易，就是一手交钱一手交货。
10106706.Subtitle: I'm a stranger here, not too familiar with Icelake's ways. In where I come from, a deal means cash in one hand, goods in the other.

10106707.Content: 恩里克先生，您不需要的话，我就找找看有没有其他买主了。
10106707.Subtitle: If you're not interested, Mr Henrik, I might just go looking for another buyer.

10106802.Subtitle: Have you got the Crystallo with you?

10106804.Subtitle: I'll need to check it in my office.

10106805.Content: 在这等着。管好自己的腿，别随意走动。
10106805.Subtitle: You wait here. No snooping around, understood?

10106901.Content: 看，把这朵小花别在头上，是不是精神多了?
10106901.Subtitle: See? A little flower pinned in your hair would really make you look good.

10106903.Content: {nickname}，是你？！你怎么在这里？恩里克叔叔知道吗……？唉，你先跟我来。
10106903.Subtitle: ? What are you doing here? Does Mr Henrik know about this...? Ah, please come with me.

10106904.Content: 艾丽莎，你等一小会儿，我很快就回来。
10106904.Subtitle: Could you wait here for a moment, Elisa? I'll be right back.

10107001.Content: 恩里克叔叔平时不让外面人随便进来，你之前又顶撞过他，要是被他碰见……
10107001.Subtitle: Mr Henrik doesn't allow outsiders to come in, and you two got off on the wrong foot back then. If he sees you...

10107002.Content: 你是为了住处的事情来的吧，别着急，先在这里躲一会儿吧。我再帮你求求恩里克叔叔，他一定会允许你多住上几天的。
10107002.Subtitle: You're here for the lodging stuff, aren't you? Don't worry, just hide here for a bit. I'll talk to Mr Henrik again. He'll surely let you stay for a few more days.

10107003.Content: 啊，真的吗？太好了……！不过，那个人那么……蛮横，你怎么做到的？
10107003.Subtitle: Ah, really? That's great! But that man is so... domineering. How did you make that happen?

10107004.Content: 这样吗？想不到那个奥特赛德先生，竟然也是个多愁善感的人。
10107004.Subtitle: Really? I wouldn't have pegged Mr Outsider as someone so sensitive.

10107005.Content: 他本人……和他那副不着调的样子确实有那么一丁点区别。说起来……
10107005.Subtitle: He's... a bit different than his brash exterior suggests. Anyway...

10107006.Content: 真的假的？需要药吗？我这里有一些，你捎给他？
10107006.Subtitle: Really? Does he need any medicine? I've got some. Can you bring it to him?

10107007.Content: 不用了！他家里有。说起来……
10107007.Subtitle: That's alright! He's got his own supply at home. Anyway...

10107008.Content: 是的。大家身体抱恙，在这里休养……我也是。
10107008.Subtitle: Yes. Everyone's recovering from some conditions here... me included.

10107009.Content: 你还好吗？是哪里不舒服？
10107009.Subtitle: Are you doing okay? You didn't tell me you were sick...

10107011.Content: 没事的，只是微不足道的小病。你看，我昨天不是还跟你去了废矿吗？
10107011.Subtitle: It's nothing serious, just a minor ailment. I was even strong enough to explore the pit with you, remember? Don't worry about me.

10107013.Content: （……所以，修普诺斯之家所有的住客都患有<H>某种疾病</>。）
10107013.Subtitle: (...So, all the lodgers at the Hypnos' House suffer from some kind of illness.)

10107014.Content: 我们之前闹过一些不愉快，所以我想和恩里克先生改善一下关系。如果有时间的话，我以后也想找机会登门拜访。
10107014.Subtitle:
I've got off on the wrong foot with Mr Henrik, so I'm looking to mend fences with him.\
If there's a chance, I'd like to visit him in the future.

10107015.Content: 真的吗？恩里克叔叔几乎每天都在家！如果他同意，随时都可以！
10107015.Subtitle: Really? Mr Henrik is almost always at home! You're welcome to visit anytime if he says it's okay!

10107016.Content: ……如果你愿意时常来这里，和大家讲讲你的故乡——南方啊，大海啊，那些没去过的地方，大家一定会很兴奋的！
10107016.Subtitle: If you'd be willing to come here and share stories about your hometown — the South, the ocean... All those places we've never been... everyone here would be thrilled!

10107017.Content: （……恩里克绝大部分时间都在旅馆……也就是说，这里绝大部分时间都在恩里克的监视之下。）
10107017.Subtitle: (...Henrik is almost always here... which means this place is under his watch most of the time.)

10107018.Content: 昨晚恩里克先生的脸色很差。他没有凶你吧？
10107018.Subtitle: Mr Henrik seemed quite upset last night. He didn't give you a hard time, did he?

10107019.Content: 没有没有。恩里克叔叔只是有些……不善言辞。毕竟他大多数时间都一个人闷在办公室里搞他的研究，很少和别人说话……
10107019.Subtitle:
No, I'm fine. Mr Henrik is just a bit... inarticulate. After all, he spends most of his time alone in his office doing research,\
hardly ever talks to anyone...

10107020.Content: 没有就好。说起来，他那么努力，是在搞一些什么研究？
10107020.Subtitle: Good to hear. Speaking of which, do you know what kind of research he's doing in there all the time?

10107023.Content: 没关系，我只是随口问问。
10107023.Subtitle: That's alright, I was just curious.

10107024.Content: （……赛琪在隐瞒一些事——想必是恩里克不许她说出口。还是不要对她施加压力了。）
10107024.Subtitle: (...Psyche is withholding something — must be on Henrik's demand. Better not push her.)

10107025.Content: 估计恩里克先生快该出来了吧？我下楼看看。
10107025.Subtitle: Mr Henrik should be out any minute. I gotta go downstairs.

10107027.Content: 这几块糕点你拿着，饿肚子的时候可以吃掉……对了，稍等一下！
10107027.Subtitle: Take these pieces of bread with you, for when you're hungry... Oh, just a moment!

10107029.Content: 妈妈说，把花带在身上，就会有好事发生。
10107029.Subtitle: Mum always said, having a flower on you brings good luck.

10107031.Content: （……虽然这里有很多同龄人，但赛琪看起来依旧有些孤独。有机会的话，在离开冰湖城之前，多来陪她说说话吧。）
10107031.Subtitle:
(...Even though there are many of her age here, Psyche still seems a bit lonely. Maybe I should try to make some time for her\
before leaving Icelake.)

10107101.Content: （办公室的门已经有些年头，但光洁锃亮，一丝不染。门把手拧下去纹丝不动。显然，它被反锁了。）
10107101.Subtitle: (The office door is old yet spotless and polished. The doorknob won't budge an inch. Clearly, it's been locked from the inside.)

10107103.Content: 办公室……是禁区。除了恩里克·埃塞尔莱德先生，任何人都不能进去。
10107103.Subtitle: The office... is off-limits. No one but Mr Henrik Ethelred is allowed inside.

10107105.Content: 也没什么有趣的……这个地方只有不幸。
10107105.Subtitle: There's nothing interesting there... only misfortune.

10107106.Content: ……清理。打扫。每天一遍，每一层书架和每一扇门。全部擦干净。
10107106.Subtitle: ...Cleaning, dusting... Every day, every shelf, every door... Everything gets wiped down.

10107107.Content: 你不明白。这是“习惯”……用有规律的活动填满生活，就是“习惯”。
10107107.Subtitle: You don't get it. It's a "habit"... Filling life with regular tasks, that's what "habit" is.

10107108.Content: 就像我每天会把这里全部清理一遍，就像赛琪每天会给她的花浇水两次。习惯会让你空洞的内心变得充实。
10107108.Subtitle: Like how I clean here daily, or how Psyche waters her flowers twice a day. Habit fills the void inside.

10107109.Content: 我觉得他看起来就挺自律的，应该是一个很好的榜样。
10107109.Subtitle: He seems quite disciplined, probably a good role model for me.

10107110.Content: 恩里克先生？自然是有的。我想一下……
10107110.Subtitle: Mr Henrik? He does have some habits. Let me see...

10107111.Content: 削苹果时苹果皮不能断掉。从盥洗室走到办公室的步数必须是偶数。每个月一定会在20日晚8点出门，且离开后一定要再次返回确认门锁三次。
10107111.Subtitle:
When peeling apples, the peel mustn't break; the number of steps from the bathroom to the office has to be even;\
every month, he goes out precisely at 5 PM on the 20th, then returns to double-check the door lock three times.

10107112.Content: ……但我想，这些习惯太私人了，对你来说可能没有什么学习的价值……
10107112.Subtitle: ...These habits are quite personal though, I doubt they'd offer much for you to learn from...

10107113.Content: （……所以，<H>恩里克固定在每个月20日晚8点出门</>。）
10107113.Subtitle: (...So, Henrik regularly gets out of the house at 5 PM on the 20th every month.)

10107201.Content: ……不行，还是不够干净。还得再擦一遍……
10107201.Subtitle: ...No, it's still not clean enough. It needs another wipe...

10107301.Content: ……为什么？不止你离开了我，连你送我的怀表都停摆了……
10107301.Subtitle: ...Why? Not only did you leave me, but even the pocket watch you gave me has stopped...

10107302.Content: ……没关系……很快，我们就可以见面了……亨特……
10107302.Subtitle: ...It's alright... We'll meet again very soon... Hunt...

10107304.Content: 你……你是谁……我没见过你。你是外面来的人？你在偷听？
10107304.Subtitle: ...Who are you...? I haven't seen you before. Are you from the outside? Were you eavesdropping?

10107305.Subtitle: No... no, I wasn't talking to you!!

10107306.Subtitle: I don't know... I don't know anything...

10107307.Content: ……请离我远一点！！不然我要叫人了……！
10107307.Subtitle: ...Please, stay away from me!! Or I'll scream...!

10107308.Content: （……奥特赛德说的没错，<H>失踪的狩月人亨特确实在这里生活过。</>但这里的住客对他的去向讳莫如深。）
10107308.Subtitle: (...Outsider was right. Hunt, the missing Phoxhunter, used to live here. But the lodgers here are tight-lipped about his whereabouts.)

10107401.Content: 离我远一点……我什么都不知道！！
10107401.Subtitle: Stay away from me... I don't know anything!!

10107502.Content: 我分析过了，绮晶成分属实，纯度也和我之前的那一小份样本没有差别——你做得很好。
10107502.Subtitle: I've checked it. The Crystallo is authentic, and its purity matches the small sample I had before. Good job.

10107503.Content: 来，给你。三千银币，还有这封是签过字的收据，交给卡米拉女士，她会给你抵押金，一千银币。
10107503.Subtitle:
Here you go. Three thousand silver coins, and this signed receipt. Bring it to Ms Camilla,\
and she'll give you the guarantee of a thousand silver coins.

10107504.Content: 至于这个是……一条项链，它的价格远不止一千银币。你拿去卖了吧，或者去典当行当了也可以。
10107504.Subtitle: And this... necklace. It's worth far more than a thousand silver coins. You're free to sell it or pawn it.

10107505.Content: 这项链您拿走吧，我可以不要那一千银币，您允许我在您那栋宅子里再多住几天就行。
10107505.Subtitle: You can keep the necklace, Mr Henrik. I'll waive the rest of the commission if you could allow me to stay a bit longer at your place.

10107507.Content: 看得出来，您很重视这条项链，我还是不要夺人所好了。况且您家还蛮宽敞的，风景也很好，我还想多住几天。
10107507.Subtitle:
I can see this necklace means a lot to you, so I'd rather not take it. Besides, your place is roomy and has a great view,\
so I'd like to stay a bit longer.

10107509.Content: 我的字典里本没有“谢”这个字。但是……谢谢。
10107509.Subtitle: I rarely say this, but... thank you.

10107601.Content: （虽然没能进成办公室，但也得到了一些有用的消息。去找奥特赛德吧。）
10107601.Subtitle: (Though I couldn't get into the office, I've managed to gather some useful intel. Time to see Outsider.)

10107802.Content: 没能查清楚他的底细，但是也有一些收获：
10107802.Subtitle: Couldn't get to the bottom of his story, but I did make some discoveries:

10107803.Content: 所以，那里其实是一间疗养院？这有什么值得藏着掖着的……卡戎之民虽然过得不怎么样，但也没听说连求医都不行啊。
10107803.Subtitle: So, it's actually a sanatorium? What's there to hide about that... I mean it's false that Charons lead hard lives, but seeking medical help isn't forbidden.

10107804.Content: ……大概吧。我还打听到那里有人认识你那个失踪的朋友，亨特，他得过什么病吗？
10107804.Subtitle: ...Right. I also learned that someone there knew your missing friend, Hunt. Was he ill?

10107805.Content: 亨特失踪不久前还活蹦乱跳的……那，那些住客，他们是生了什么病？
10107805.Subtitle: Hunt was quite healthy before he disappeared... So, what illnesses do those lodgers have?

10107806.Content: 不知道，他们不愿意说。或者更大的可能是，恩里克不许他们说。
10107806.Subtitle: No idea. They refused to talk. Or more likely, Henrik forbids them to.

10107807.Content: 难道恩里克盯上了“病人”这个群体？……啧，这就更不妙了。我得再加几把锁，嘱咐菲娜每天反锁好。但是亨特到底是怎么回事……
10107807.Subtitle:
Is Henrik targeting the sick? ...Tsk, that's even more disturbing. I'm gonna have to add extra locks\
and remind Fina to lock the door all the time. Anyway, what exactly happened to Hunt...

10107808.Content: 就是恩里克的办公室。住客说那里是禁区，除了恩里克本人谁都不能进。门锁得很紧，还有人监视……而且恩里克本人也在里面，我不想轻举妄动。
10107808.Subtitle:
That's Henrik's office. The lodgers say it's off-limits — nobody but Henrik himself can get in.\
The door is securely locked, and watched... Plus, Henrik himself is in there, I didn't want to be hasty.

10107809.Content: 明智的判断。要是恩里克狗急跳墙，天知道会发生什么。
10107809.Subtitle: Smart decision. If Henrik lost it, who knows what might happen.

10107810.Content: 不过，上锁的房间并非只有一个入口。我走时观察了一下那栋建筑……那个房间好像是和屋顶的<H>烟囱</>连起来的。
10107810.Subtitle:
But the locked door isn't the only entrance to that room. When I left, I scoped out the house...\
It appears the room connects to the chimney on the roof.

10107811.Content: 连这都注意到了，找你合作真是找对人了。那么，我们只需要找一个恩里克不在的时间……
10107811.Subtitle: That's impressive! I'm so glad I found you to team up with. So, we just need to find a time when Henrik isn't around...

10107812.Content: 我跟那里的住客套了话。恩里克有一个特别的习惯，他一定会在每个月20日晚8点出门。
10107812.Subtitle:
I chatted with the lodgers there and dug out some intel: Henrik has a peculiar routine—\
He always leaves the house at 5 PM on the 20th of every month.

10107813.Content: 很好。也就是说，这是我们调查他的好机会。得想办法跟踪他……或者潜入修普诺斯之家……
10107813.Subtitle:
Great! That's our window of opportunity to investigate him. We need to figure out how to secretly follow him...\
or sneak into the Hypnos' House...

10107814.Content: ……所以，我们的计划已经很明确了。本月20日，趁恩里克出门，想办法从烟囱潜入上锁的办公室。那个房间只有恩里克能进，所以不会有人发现我们。
10107814.Subtitle: ...So, here's our plan: On the 20th of this month, while Henrik is out, we'll try and get into the locked office through the chimney. That room is exclusive to Henrik, so we won't be noticed.

10107815.Content: {nickname}，你的脑筋蛮灵光嘛，我都想和你长期搭伙了。说起来，既然你们能打败矿坑那怪物，你本人应该还是挺擅长体术的吧？
10107815.Subtitle:
You're quite sharp, . I'm even considering a long-term partnership with you.\
Speaking of which, since you took down that monster in the pit, you must be quite skilled in physical combat, right?

10107816.Content: 过去体格并不算好，但是最近开始有所长进了。
10107816.Subtitle: Not really. I've never been particularly strong, but I've made some progress lately.

10107817.Content: 好。那么接下来的几天，我也教你一些格斗的技巧吧——有备无患。
10107817.Subtitle: Alright. Over the next few days, lemme teach you some fighting skills — it's always good to be prepared.

10107818.Subtitle: But first, I need to pick up a few more locks... We'll start tomorrow then.

10107819.Content: 对了，下次见到卡米拉的时候也和她知会一声吧，就说我们暂时结成了小队。这样一起行动会方便些。

10107820.Content: （……时候还早，或许我可以看看有没有什么能接的委托……）
10107820.Subtitle: (It's still early. I'm gonna go to The Asphodel and see if there are new commissions to take on.)

10107821.Content: （……还有，赛琪看起来有些孤独。有机会的话，离开冰湖城之前，也去陪她说说话吧。）
10107821.Subtitle: (Also, Psyche seems a bit lonely. Maybe I should try to make some time for her before leaving Icelake.)

10108002.Content: 一个坏消息，和一个——呃，或许应该也算是坏消息。
10108002.Subtitle: There's a piece of bad news, and a — um, might be considered bad as well.

10108003.Subtitle: Let's hear the worse one first.

10108004.Content: 留守在净界岛的分队已经在周边搜索了三天，但始终未发现零号身边那个{性别：少年|女孩}的行踪。
10108004.Subtitle: The unit left on Purgatorio Island has been searching the area for three days, but they've yet to find any trace of that {性别:boy|girl} who was with No. 0.

10108005.Content: 我们在{性别：他|她}坠崖后即刻对附近海域进行了搜索，理论上{性别：他|她}无论是否存活，都不应漂流到更远的地方，除非……
10108005.Subtitle: We searched the nearby waters immediately after {性别:he|she} fell off the cliff. Theoretically speaking, {性别:he|she} shouldn't have drifted far. Unless...

10108008.Content: ……继续调查周边岛屿的居民。任何嫌疑人和目击者都不要放过。
10108008.Subtitle: ...Continue investigating the residents on nearby islands. Leave no suspect or witness unchecked.

10108009.Content: 已经在这么做了。我们还在持续扩大搜索范围。不过我斗胆一问——
10108009.Subtitle: Already on it. And we're expanding the search area. But if I may ask—

10108010.Content: 如果真的得到了{性别：他|她}……也就是和鸣之力的宿体，您打算如何处置？
10108010.Subtitle: If we do find {性别:him|her}... the host of Resonance, what's your plan for it, Chief?

10108011.Content: 据我所知，与零号不同，海伯利亚并不能有效利用这一力量——甚至可能会起到相反的作用……毕竟，理想状态下，和鸣之力可以对一切“骸”施加干预……
10108011.Subtitle: As far as I'm aware, unlike No. 0, Hyperborea can't effectively harness this power — it might even backfire... After all, Resonance is capable of affecting all Daimons in ideal conditions...

10108012.Content: 这份力量可以消失，但绝不能落入帝国之外。好了，另一个坏消息呢？
10108012.Subtitle: This power can vanish, but must never end up outside Imperial control. Now, what's the other bad news?

10108013.Content: 是关于您让我调查的另一件事。
10108013.Subtitle: It's about the other matter you've asked me to investigate, Chief.

10108014.Content: 在搜寻过程中，我在附近的荒岛遇到了乘船逃亡至此的村民——然后，我们发现了一个有趣的“小东西”。
10108014.Subtitle: During the search, on a deserted island, I encountered some villagers who had fled there by boat. And then, we discovered something quite intriguing.

10108015.Content: 就像是您正品尝着司空见惯的浓汤，却发现刚放进去的汤匙突然褪去漂亮的银，变成了可怖的漆黑——
10108015.Subtitle: It's as if you were tasting a bowl of ordinary thick soup, only to find the spoon you just put in turn from shiny silver to a dreadful black—

10108016.Content: 挑重点说，省去那些花里胡哨的。
10108016.Subtitle: Cut the fancy talk. Get to the point.

10108017.Content: 啊……是、是。那个有趣的小东西，便是<H>“时间差”</>。
10108017.Subtitle: Ah... yes, Chief. That intriguing thing is a tiny time discrepancy.

10108018.Content: 村民们告诉我，净界岛的秽兽此前一直住在山里，并没有表现出强烈的攻击性；但在我们抵达的<H>两天前</>，却突然发疯般地攻击村民。
10108018.Subtitle: The villagers told me, that the Filthoids of Purgatorio Island always lived in the mountains without much aggression; but two days before our arrival, they suddenly went berserk and started attacking the villagers.

10108020.Content: ……看来您已经猜到了。这太巧合了，不是吗？因为计划临时有变，我们刚好比原定的登岛时期迟了两天。
10108020.Subtitle: ...It appears you've already figured it out, Chief. Quite a coincidence, isn't it? Due to a last-minute change of plan, we arrived two days later than initially scheduled.

10108021.Content: 而有能力操纵秽兽行刺的，只有<W>神弃者同盟</>。
10108021.Subtitle: The only force capable of manipulating Filthoids is the <W>the Forsakens.

10108022.Content: ……无论是不是同盟，十三军团都混进了不该有的东西。
10108022.Subtitle: ...Whoever it is, the 13th Legion has been compromised by unwelcome elements.

10108023.Content: 这么多年过去，虫子们又开始不安分起来……
10108023.Subtitle: After all these years, those worms have started wriggling again...

10108024.Subtitle: It's time for a thorough extermination.

10108101.Content: 如猎犬终于走出蛰伏的巢穴，十三军团在缄默中展开了漆黑的狩猎。

10108103.Content: 一位新手也在慢慢熟悉如何成为可靠的猎人。

10108201.Content: 我得先调试一下“那玩意儿”。时候还早，你先随便拿路边的野兽练练手吧。小矮子还在城里帮我们放哨，别走太远。
10108201.Subtitle: It's still early, let's use these beasts for some casual practice while we wait for Button Mushroom. Stay close to the city gate, though.

10108202.Content: 我提前布置了些陷阱。别看是废品做的，可好使了。
10108202.Subtitle: I've already set up some traps. They may look like junk — they're made from scrap, after all — but they work quite well.

10108203.Content: 不过你省着点用，毕竟材料不太结实，一不留神踩碎了也是有可能的，哈哈……

10108302.Content: 不错，这几天进步很快！不过，还有提升的空间。
10108302.Subtitle: Not bad, you've improved a lot these past few days. Still, there's more to learn.

10108303.Content: 比如那些大型的野兽啊秽兽啊，跑得快但体格笨重。你就可以找墙壁、树干什么的，站在前面挑衅，它冲过来就马上闪开，让它自己一头撞晕。
10108303.Subtitle: For example, with that Filthoid just now: it's fast but clumsy, so you can stand in front of some solid surface, like a wall or a tree, and provoke it to charge at you, then dodge its charge to let it knock itself out.

10108306.Content: 哈，那当然。这可是我从小到大摸爬滚打锻炼出的妙招。而对付敌人也是类似的道理，暴怒的人，和野兽没多大区别。
10108306.Subtitle: Hah, naturally. It's a trick I picked up growing up tough. It's the same with these enemies — an enraged person isn't much different from a beast.

10108307.Content: 好了，这些本来也不是你的对手。接下来得来个大的……
10108307.Subtitle: Alright, these random critters were mere appetisers. Now, let's get you a worthy opponent...

10108308.Content: 这叫生活常识，你该不会看见别人雨天撑着伞也要说“卑鄙”吧。
10108308.Subtitle: It's just a life hack. You wouldn't call using an umbrella in the rain "underhanded," would you?

10108309.Content: 只是因为是你说出来的所以听起来格外卑鄙一些……
10108309.Subtitle: Maybe it just sounds more underhanded because it's coming from you...

10108310.Content: 好了，没营养的吵架到此为止吧，这些路边野兽都是开胃小菜，本来就不是你的对手，接下来得来个大的……
10108310.Subtitle: Alright, enough with the petty bickering. These random critters were mere appetisers. Now, let's get you a worthy opponent...

10108312.Content: 这是什么？这个声音……怎么像是你在鬼叫？

10108313.Content: 拾荒小妹那里淘来的破铜烂铁。别说，还挺结实的，不花点儿时间还真打不穿。正适合在里面塞个扩音器，把它们引过来——

10108314.Content: 嘿，看那边，小可爱、大可爱们来喽！

10108315.Subtitle: ...There's something I've been curious about for quite a while.

10108316.Content: <H>“和鸣之力”</>……你也会和鸣之力吧？你当心，这力量得谨慎着用。尤其是在军团的家伙面前。
10108316.Subtitle: Resonance... You can wield the power of Resonance, right? Be careful, try to keep it under wraps in public.

10108317.Subtitle: How did you know about Resonance?

10108318.Subtitle: What is Resonance? I'm not following.

10108319.Content: 在废矿的时候，我就感到有什么在试图“引导”我的行动，这和传说中的“和鸣之力”很像……只是那股力量细微很多，没那么容易察觉。

10108320.Content: 在场的另外两个小姑娘都不是“骸”，那就只能是你了。刚刚，我更加确信了这点。
10108320.Subtitle:
Just some rumours I've heard. They say the last person with that power wreaked havoc across the Empire.\
Your power, though much weaker, is very similar to the legendary power of Resonance.

10108321.Subtitle: I felt it back in the pit. You didn't intend to, but I felt a strong force — your effort to impact me with your will.

10108323.Content: 听过一些坊间传闻而已，海伯利亚十几年前就出过一个拥有“和鸣之力”的家伙。你的力量……虽然细微，但和传说中的和鸣之力很像。
10108323.Subtitle: Don't play dumb.

10108324.Content: 你说……和鸣之力是一种“引导”的力量？
10108324.Subtitle: Back in the pit, I felt a strong force — your effort to impact me with your will. What else could it be but the legendary Resonance?

10108325.Content: 嗯，“引导”——或者极端一点说，“操控”。
10108325.Subtitle: ...Where did you hear about it?

10108326.Content: 你没意识到吗？你的魔法会影响身边的“骸”，增幅他们的力量——甚至，极端情况下，让他们按照你的意志行动。

10108327.Content: 当然，你如今的力量很微弱，还远远到不了那种程度。
10108327.Subtitle: Just some rumours I've heard. They say the last person with that power wreaked havoc across the Empire. Your power, though much weaker, is very similar to that legendary power of Resonance.

10108328.Content: （……操控？该不会是那个时候，和贝蕾——）
10108328.Subtitle: If your power was noticed by the wrong people, you could get in trouble.

10108329.Content: 引导和操控他人……听起来很危险。
10108329.Subtitle: Noted. Thanks for the heads-up.

10108330.Content: 嗯。所以我说尽量少在人前显露，以免惹上不必要的麻烦。

10108331.Content: 毕竟……上个拥有这种力量的家伙，可是把整个帝国搅得血雨腥风的，下场也凄惨得很，被吊死在迪斯玛尼亚的广场上。

10108332.Content: 引导和操控他人……听起来很好玩。

10108333.Content: 唉，你这外乡人是真的觉得自己命很大啊。

10108334.Content: 上个拥有这种力量的家伙，可是把整个帝国搅得血雨腥风的，下场也凄惨得很。你也不想被吊死在迪斯玛尼亚的广场上吧？

10108335.Content: 好吧，谢谢你的忠告。我会谨慎使用和鸣之力。

10108336.Content: 好了，太阳也快下山了。回去吧，待会儿还有场“硬仗”要打。

10108401.Content: 说起来，你的父母是什么人？
10108401.Subtitle: By the way, what do your parents do?

10108403.Content: 当然是因为和鸣之力很特别啊。卡戎之民的魔法，大多与血脉有关。没准你就大有来头。
10108403.Subtitle: Well, because the power of Resonance is quite special, isn't it? The magical abilities among Charons often relate to their bloodline. Who knows, you might be from some prestigious background.

10108404.Content: 其实我也不知道……我从记事起就和贝蕾相依为命。其他的，就不太清楚了。
10108404.Subtitle: Truth is, I don't know... It's always been just Berry and me since my earliest memories. I don't remember any other family members.

10108406.Content: 哎，我说，那如果以后你发现自己其实是什么亲王啊公爵啊流落在外的私生子，可别把我这个贫贱之交忘了哦。
10108406.Subtitle: Hey, if you ever find out you're actually some {性别:prince|princess} or duke's secret love child, don't forget about this poor old friend of yours, alright?

10108407.Content: 哈，最好真的像你说的那样。
10108407.Subtitle: Hah, that would be nice, wouldn't it?

10108502.Content: 奥特赛德真是个坏东西，非得让我在这里盯梢。本魔王的一身本事是为了带领你们打猎，才不是为了在这里盯着那个阴沉大叔！
10108502.Subtitle: You're such a pest, Outsider! Making me stand watch here... This Demon King's great talents are meant for leading hunts, not keeping tabs on that gloomy man!

10108503.Content: 这不是看魔王大人您天赋异禀，更方便隐匿行踪嘛。您看我们这么五大三粗的，要是恩里克出来，随便扫一眼不就暴露了。
10108503.Subtitle: That's because, you have a special gift for acting by stealth, "Your Majesty." Look at us, all big and clumsy, we'd be spotted by Henrik in no time.

10108504.Content: 哼，居然知道夸本大人，看来你还是挺聪明——不对！你是在变着法子说我个子矮吧！！
10108504.Subtitle: Hmph, smart of you to have recognised my greatness — wait! That's just a roundabout way of calling me short!!

10108505.Content: 没有没有，怎么会，您最高大威猛了，冰湖城门就是专门为了您才修这么高——
10108505.Subtitle: No, not at all. You're the tallest and mightiest, the towering Icelake gates were practically built for you—

10108507.Content: 居然真的是8点耶！如果他再转行，不如直接去广场专门报时！
10108507.Subtitle: Right on 5 o'clock! If he ever changes careers again, he could offer time-telling services in the town square!

10108508.Content: ……按原计划行事。我和白负责跟踪恩里克，奥特赛德从烟囱潜入恩里克的办公室。事成后，在奥特赛德家门口会面。
10108508.Subtitle:
...Stick to the original plan. Snow and I will tail Henrik, and Outsider, you sneak into Henrik's office through the chimney.\
We'll meet up at your doorstep afterwards.

10108510.Content: 这么快就回来了？不是去跟踪恩里克了吗？

10108603.Content: 你看到了吗？恩里克刚刚丢了什么东西进去……
10108603.Subtitle: Did you see that? Henrik just threw something in there...

10108604.Content: 这一定就是他的惊天大秘密！小仆从，你在这里守着，我来把它捞出来——
10108604.Subtitle: This has gotta be his horrible secret! You stay here, I'll go fish it out—

10108605.Content: 白，你快上来。这个水温，即使是卡戎之民也受不了的。
10108605.Subtitle: Snow, get back here. This water is freezing, even for a Charon.

10108606.Content: 这点小冷对皎皎之民可不在话下……等我潜下去！
10108606.Subtitle: Nah, this is nothing for us Luno... I'm going in!

10108701.Content: 找到了，是个<H>匣子</>！难道恩里克在里面偷偷放了什么宝藏？
10108701.Subtitle: Got it! It's a box! Could Henrik be hiding some treasure inside?

10108702.Content: 接下来就是最惊心动魄的环节了……
10108702.Subtitle: Now comes the most exciting moment...

10108703.Content: “魔王大人和她的仆从历尽千辛万苦，终于在深潭中打捞到了珍贵的宝物。于是{性别：他们|她们}怀着期盼的心，忐忑地打开了匣子。只见里面埋藏着——”
10108703.Subtitle: "Through great trials and hardships, the Demon king and her minion finally retrieved a precious treasure from the deep waters. With hopeful hearts and anxious breaths, they opened the box, only to find—"

10108705.Content: （这是一个漂亮的雕花匣子，拿在手中沉甸甸的。但正如白所言，里面空无一物。）
10108705.Subtitle: (It's an intricately carved box, feeling surprisingly heavy in your hands. But as Snow said, it's empty inside.)

10108706.Content: （不，并不是空无一物！而是还残留着什么。那似乎是<H>一些湿滑的粉末</>——像未溶解的盐粒，大部分已经散入水中，但还留了一小部分残留在匣底。）
10108706.Subtitle: (Not completely empty, though! There's some sort of residue. Seems to be some slimy powder resembling salt. Most of it has dissolved into the water, but a small amount remains at the bottom of the box.)

10108707.Content: 不……不是空的。它之前装了东西，应该是……一种粉末。
10108707.Subtitle: No... it's not really empty. It previously held something... some sort of powder, perhaps.

10108708.Content: 啊，粉末……为什么恩里克要跑那么远，把一盒粉末放水里？这也太奇怪了。
10108708.Subtitle: Powder... Why would Henrik bother to put a box of powder in the water? That's so strange.

10108709.Content: 不知道……但是，我总觉得有些不舒服。我们先回去，看看奥特赛德那边的情况吧。
10108709.Subtitle: No idea... but something feels really off. Let's go back and see how Outsider is doing.

10108801.Content: 与此同时，修普诺斯之家——
10108801.Subtitle: Meanwhile, inside the Hypnos' House—

10108902.Content: 真麻烦，蹭了一身灰……回去菲娜又要大惊小怪了。
10108902.Subtitle: Ugh, got all covered in soot... Fina's going to make a fuss about it when I get home.

10108903.Content: 不过还好，总算是顺利进来了。
10108903.Subtitle: Anyway, finally made it in.

10108904.Content: （炉火早已熄灭，但里面的炉灰似乎证明了它近期被使用过。）
10108904.Subtitle: (The stove fire is out, but the ashes inside suggest recent usage.)

10108906.Content: “……9月3日，卡罗琳娜·布朗……10月29日，亨特·克拉克……”
10108906.Subtitle: "...September 3, Carolina Brown... October 29, Hunt Clark..."

10108909.Content: （炉火早已熄灭，但里面的炉灰似乎证明了它近期被使用过。）
10108909.Subtitle: (The stove fire is out, but the ashes inside suggest recent usage.)

10108911.Content: “……9月3日，卡罗琳娜·布朗……10月29日，亨特·克拉克……”
10108911.Subtitle: "...September 3, Carolina Brown... October 29, Hunt Clark..."

10108914.Content: 恩里克叔叔，您回来了。我已经倒好了热水，请您喝了，暖暖身子……
10108914.Subtitle: Mr Henrik, you're back. Here's a cup of hot water for you to warm up a bit...

10109002.Content: 失踪的亨特就出现在了那份名单上……我猜他的下场多半不太妙。而且，你那个叫赛琪的朋友很可能是下一个。
10109002.Subtitle: If that list means "go missing", your friend Psyche might be next.

10109003.Content: 啧，恩里克回来的真不是时候，如果能再多几分钟……怪我，撬烟囱锁浪费了太长时间。这**养的！我就知道他不是什么好东西。
10109003.Subtitle:
Ugh, Henrik came back at an inconvenient time. If I had a few more minutes... It's my fault, I wasted a lot of time with that chimney.\
That piece of ****! I knew he was up to no good.

10109004.Content: 这可怎么办呀？{nickname}，赛琪是个好孩子，我们得想办法救她！
10109004.Subtitle: What do we do now? , Psyche is a good kid, we have to find a way to save her!

10109005.Subtitle: ...I'm going to the Hypnos' House right now.

10109006.Content: 不要冲动。我们还有五天时间，先回去做好准备吧。
10109006.Subtitle: Don't rush into it. We still have five days, let's go back and get well-prepared first.

10109007.Content: 不，救人早去总比晚去好。我不能再一次……看着……
10109007.Subtitle: No, it's always better to act sooner rather than later to save someone. I can't just...

10109009.Content: “一个人离我而去，而我什么都做不到”。是吗？
10109009.Subtitle: "Just stand there, helplessly watching her leave", right?

10109011.Content: 猜的。你这反应也太大了吧，突然一下子就把所有的权衡啊、顾虑啊，都抛到脑后了。那个小姑娘对你挺重要的？
10109011.Subtitle: I can see it. When it comes to things you truly care about, you toss all caution and reservations to the wind.

10109012.Content: 如果你忽然一天被丢到举目无亲的他乡，你觉得自己就像一只皮球，人人都能踢一脚……而这时，有个人向你伸出手，告诉你，活着就会有好事发生。

10109013.Content: 若她遇到危险，你也会不顾一切去帮她的。

10109014.Content: 也许你是对的。尝试过而后败北的不甘，总好过无数个日日夜夜悔恨“为什么我当时不能再勇敢一些”。
10109014.Subtitle: Maybe you're right. The bitterness of failure after trying beats the endless regret of "why wasn't I braver back then".

10109015.Content: 但你也要记住，“勇敢”并不等同于“冲动”。勇敢是……“我知晓这条路所有可能的终点，并坦然接受所有可能的终点。”
10109015.Subtitle:
But remember, being brave doesn't mean acting recklessly. Being brave is...\
"I'm aware of all the possible endings of this path and I accept them all."

10109016.Content: “然后，我坚定不移地走上了这条路，没有什么能使我动摇。”
10109016.Subtitle: "Then, I tread this path with no regret, and nothing will change my mind."

10109018.Content: 谢谢你，我冷静下来了。我先做一些准备……不过明天，我还是要去找一趟赛琪。
10109018.Subtitle: Thank you, I've calmed down. I'll make some preparations... But tomorrow, I still need to go see Psyche.

10109019.Content: ……放心，我和恩里克的关系之前缓和了一些，装作什么都不知道就行。
10109019.Subtitle: ...Don't worry, I've eased things with Henrik. I'll just pretend I know nothing.

10109020.Content: 嗯，还得想想人救出来之后怎么办……你对冰湖城不熟，这事就交给我来办吧。
10109020.Subtitle: Okay. We also need a plan after we rescue those lodgers... You're not familiar with Icelake, so l'll handle that.

10109101.Content: （不要打草惊蛇，若无其事地去找赛琪吧。）
10109101.Subtitle: (Gotta act casually when I see Psyche to avoid suspicion.)

10109302.Content: 发生了什么事？赛琪怎么了？
10109302.Subtitle: What's going on? What happened to Psyche?

10109303.Content: 她身体抱恙，要早日治疗。
10109303.Subtitle: She's sick and needs prompt treatment.

10109304.Content: 赛琪需要一段时间休息。没什么要紧事，你这几天就不要来打扰她了。
10109304.Subtitle: And she needs some time to rest. It's nothing serious, but please leave her alone for the next few days.

10109305.Content: 赛琪，你要和我……一起走走吗？
10109305.Subtitle: Psyche, would you like to... go out for a walk with me?

10109306.Content: 我们一起去外面散散心。不要怕。
10109306.Subtitle: Let's go outside for some fresh air. Don't be afraid.

10109308.Subtitle: I want to go to Lamenting Lake.

10109310.Content: 恩里克叔叔，请允许我出去一会儿。请放心，我一定会回来，不会花太长时间。
10109310.Subtitle: Mr Henrik, may I go out for a walk? Don't worry, it won't take long. I promise to come back shortly.

10109312.Content: 去吧。记住我嘱咐过你的。否则……你知道后果。
10109312.Subtitle: Go ahead. But remember what I've told you. Otherwise... you know what would happen.

10109314.Content: 放老实些。如果赛琪出了什么事，你没有第二条命离开冰湖城。
10109314.Subtitle: Watch it. If anything happens to Psyche, you won't have a second chance to leave Icelake.

10109401.Content: 我好像听到了汽笛声，有列车开过去了吗？
10109401.Subtitle: It sounds like a steam whistle. Is there a train passing by?

10109404.Content: 真好啊。你看，旅客们是不是点起了灯？那些车窗是不是很漂亮，很温暖，像炉子里的小火苗一样？
10109404.Subtitle: That's nice. Do the passengers have lights on? Are the windows looking pretty and warm, like tiny flames in a fireplace?

10109407.Content: 你的眼睛……是什么时候看不见的？
10109407.Subtitle: Your eyes... When did you lose your sight?

10109409.Content: 不说这个了。我有一个想去的地方，你可以陪我一起吗？
10109409.Subtitle: Let's not talk about that. There's a place I'd like to visit, will you come with me?

10109501.Content: 是泪湖畔，那附近有一截老树根。小时候，爸爸曾带我去过那儿。
10109501.Subtitle: It's a cave... My dad once took me there when I was little.

10109602.Content: 树根附近……埋着一个小盒子。{nickname}，你可以帮我找找那个盒子吗？
10109602.Subtitle: There should be a small box buried under that tree.

10109705.Content: 它叫“照相机”，是很了不起的宝物。
10109705.Subtitle: It's called a "camera," an amazing treasure.

10109706.Content: 这是四岁那年爸爸送我的。那年他培育出了很漂亮的泪湖铃兰，内城的大富豪很高兴，就随手送了这个给他，他又当做礼物送给了我。
10109706.Subtitle: Dad gave it to me when I was four. That year, he had managed to grow beautiful Lamenting Lake Bellflowers. A wealthy man from the inner city loved the flowers and gave this camera to Dad, which he then gave to me as a birthday gift.

10109707.Content: 可我舍不得用。我想，既然是珍贵的宝物，如果埋在土里，等到收获的时节，就能长出好多个相机了。那时家里就会富有起来，爸爸妈妈也就不用那么辛苦。
10109707.Subtitle: But I cherished it too much to actually play with it. I thought, if I buried this precious treasure in the ground, it would sprout many more cameras by harvest time. Then our family would become rich, and my parents wouldn't have to work so hard.

10109708.Content: 所以我悄悄把它“种”在了这里。……那个时候的我，真是傻乎乎的。
10109708.Subtitle: So I came here alone and "sowed" it. I was quite silly back then.

10109709.Content: 不过爸爸妈妈后来并没有责怪我，而是对我说，“那就等你成年那天再把它挖出来吧，就当是给未来自己的礼物。”
10109709.Subtitle: When Mum and Dad found out about this later, they didn't get mad at me. Instead, they said, "Let's dig it up on your coming of age, as a gift to your future self."

10109711.Content: 大家小时候都做过傻事。

10109712.Content: {nickname}，谢谢你这些天陪我，但我没有什么值钱的东西。这个相机，就当做送给你的礼物吧。
10109712.Subtitle: , thank you for keeping me company these days, but I don't have anything valuable to give to you. Please take this camera as a gift from me.

10109713.Content: 这不是你的宝物吗？太贵重了。

10109714.Content: 你给过我礼物了——那朵花。它是无价之宝。

10109715.Content: 我的眼睛已经不再需要它，但你的旅途还很漫长。
10109715.Subtitle: I no longer need it because of my eyes, but your journey is still long.

10109716.Content: 用你的眼睛，替我继续看看这个世界吧。
10109716.Subtitle: Please see the world for me with your eyes.

10109718.Content: 难得出来一趟，我们就在湖上随便走走吧？
10109718.Subtitle: Since we're already here, how about a little stroll around the lake?

10109801.Content: 在我很小的时候，爸爸偶尔会带我来湖边散步。
10109801.Subtitle: When I was little, Dad would sometimes bring me here for walks.

10109802.Content: 虽然时不时要和秽兽捉迷藏，但我总是很期待来这里。
10109802.Subtitle: Despite the occasional hide-and-seek with the Filthoids, I always looked forward to coming here.

10109803.Content: 因为我喜欢这里的浮冰和山峰，更因为，我喜欢看列车呼啸而过。
10109803.Subtitle: Because I loved the floating ice and mountains here, and more so, I loved watching the trains roar by.

10109805.Content: 嗯。我喜欢它开去的地方……“南方”。
10109805.Subtitle: Yeah. I'm fascinated by their destination... the "South".

10109806.Content: 书上写，南方和冰湖城不一样。
10109806.Subtitle: I've read that it's nothing like Icelake.

10109807.Content: 那里的太阳更加温暖，那里有四季变换。
10109807.Subtitle: The sun's warmer there, and you get to see seasons change.

10109808.Content: 当春天来临，冰雪就会融去，即使在旷野，也会有大片繁花盛开。
10109808.Subtitle: When spring comes, the ice and snow melt away, and there are flowers everywhere, even in the wilds.

10109809.Content: 当时我就想，如果我也能乘上列车，就可以抵达那里了。
10109809.Subtitle: I always dreamed that if I could catch a train, I could actually get there.

10109810.Content: 但是爸爸告诉我，这个心愿太奢侈了。
10109810.Subtitle: But Dad told me, it was not a dream we could afford.

10109812.Content: 是的。而且爸爸和妈妈只是最普通的花匠，我们很清贫，没有乘上那辆列车的资格。
10109812.Subtitle: Yes. And also because Mum and Dad are just ordinary gardeners. We were poor and didn't have the means to board that train.

10109901.Content: 所以，你敲开“修普诺斯之家”大门的那一天，我是那么惊喜……因为我几乎从未和冰湖城之外的人打过交道。
10109901.Subtitle: So, the day you showed up at the door of the Hypnos' House, I was thrilled... I've never met anyone outside Icelake.

10109902.Content: 我一直在悄悄想，你口中的故乡究竟是一个怎样的地方？你是不是亲眼见过大海？它是不是像一百片湖连起来那样一望无际？
10109902.Subtitle: I've always secretly wondered what your homeland is like. Have you seen the ocean with your own eyes? Is it as large as a hundred lakes put together?

10109903.Content: 如果我也能到那里看看的话——
10109903.Subtitle: If only I could also see it for myself...

10109904.Content: 唉，我都快十八岁了，还在像一个小孩子一样做梦。
10109904.Subtitle: ...Look at me, almost eighteen and still daydreaming like a child.

10109905.Content: 听我说，赛琪。那并不是梦。
10109905.Subtitle: Listen, Psyche. It can be more than just a dream.

10109906.Content: 你是贝蕾之外第一个对我那么好的人。我也一直希望能帮上你什么忙。
10109906.Subtitle: Besides Berenica, you were the first person to be so kind to me. I've always wanted to do something for you.

10109907.Content: 这里只有我们两个人，告诉我，你有没有受到什么人的<W>胁迫</>？你可以信任我。无论多凶恶的家伙，你都不用惧怕。
10109907.Subtitle: There's no one else here, so tell me, have you been <W>under threat? You can trust me. No matter how scary the enemy may be, I'll protect you.

10109908.Content: 我本就是流浪至此的异乡人，我可以带你一起逃离——就像那天一起去废矿那样。
10109908.Subtitle: I'm a stranger here, I can take you away — just like the day we went to the pit together.

10109909.Content: 等我找到贝蕾，我们可以一起到南方去，在故乡的海边盖几间小小的房子，在房子旁边种满花。春暖花开的时候，你的眼睛就一定能康复了。
10109909.Subtitle: Once I find Berenica, we can go to the South together, build little houses by the sea in my homeland, and grow white rue flowers around them. Come spring, when the flowers bloom, your eyes will heal.

10109910.Content: 到时候天天大太阳晒着，说不定你还会怀念起冰湖城的雪……对了，可能会稍微打破一下你的梦想，你怕虫子吗，南方的虫子会比这边更大、更吵闹。
10109910.Subtitle: Every day, the sun will shine so brightly that you might even find yourself missing Icelake's snow... Oh, it might be a slight damper on your dream, but are you scared of bugs? The ones in the South are bigger and noisier.

10109911.Content: 谢谢你。我没有受到胁迫，只是……
10109911.Subtitle: Thank you. I'm not under threat, it's just that...

10109912.Content: <W>我无法离开冰湖城，无论如何。</>
10109912.Subtitle: <W>I simply can't leave Icelake, no matter what.

10109915.Content: 城外不安全，你在外面待太久了。
10109915.Subtitle: It's not safe outside the city. You've been out too long.

10109916.Content: 对不起！我知道了。我这就回去。
10109916.Subtitle: Sorry! I'll head back now.

10109917.Content: 赛琪，记住我和你说的。如果你愿意相信我……
10109917.Subtitle: Psyche, keep in mind what I said. If you decide to trust me...

10109918.Content: 凌晨两点，修普诺斯之家南边，告示牌附近见。
10109918.Subtitle: Meet me at Icelake Square at 2 AM.

10110001.Content: （“无法离开冰湖城”……是什么意思？）
10110001.Subtitle: ("Can't leave Icelake"... What does she mean by that?)

10110002.Content: （……想不明白。只能回去等赛琪的消息了。）
10110002.Subtitle: (...Not a clue. Just have to go back and see what happens.)

10110102.Content: 别、别过来……不然我开枪了！
10110102.Subtitle: Stay back... or I'll shoot!

10110201.Content: 啊啊……别打了，我投降！但真的不是我干的！！
10110201.Subtitle: Alright, alright, I surrender! But it wasn't me, I swear!

10110203.Content: 行吧。您的人我放心。但千万记住，一定要看好{性别：他|她}，千万别在城里惹是生非，不然长官怪罪下来，咱俩就都有大麻烦了。
10110203.Subtitle: Alright, I trust you, Ms Camilla. But remember, keep a close eye on this kid and don't let {性别:him|her} stir up any trouble in town. If the Chief finds out about this, we'll both be in for it.

10110204.Content: 怎么刚好被你给逮到了……唉，{性别：大哥|大姐}你行行好，千万别说出去啊。
10110204.Subtitle: Drat! Didn't expect to run into you... Do me a favour, {性别:mate|miss}, keep this between us, will you?

10110206.Content: 停手停手，钱袋还你！我也是好几天没吃顿饱饭了，一时糊涂才……唉，我错了我错了！
10110206.Subtitle: Alright, alright, here's your money bag! I haven't had a decent meal in days, so I got desperate... I'm sorry!

10110207.Content: 你处决了他？他……还罪不至死吧。
10110207.Subtitle: ...He may be a thief, but he doesn't deserve to be killed for this!

10110208.Content: 你小点声！都说了不是我干的，我只是把他的遗体悄悄运出来而已。
10110208.Subtitle: Keep it down! I told you, it wasn't me. I was just trying to sneak the body out.

10110209.Content: 我叫凯文，你见过的，是冰湖城外围卫戍部队的……这个倒霉蛋是哈尔，我以前的邻居，我们打小就认识了。
10110209.Subtitle: My name's Kevin. We've met before — I'm in the outskirts escort... And this poor soul here is Hal, my old neighbour. We've known each other since we were kids.

10110210.Content: 这家伙母亲去得早，打过的架不比吃过的饭少。虽然家人禁止我和卡戎来往，但我想着好歹也是一起玩到大的，所以偶尔会帮他点忙……
10110210.Subtitle: He lost his mother at an early age and had been getting into countless brawls ever since. My family doesn't allow me to interact with Charons, but he was an old friend from when I was a kid, so I'd sometimes help him out...

10110211.Content: 后来有一天他鬼鬼祟祟地来找我。我以为他又欠了一屁股债，或者又被酒鬼老爹打了，来找我诉苦。但我没想到他告诉我，他出现了“<W>秽蚀</>”的征兆……
10110211.Subtitle: One day, he came to me, acting all weird. I thought he'd racked up debts again, or that he came to moan about being hit again by his drunkard dad. But to my surprise, he said he was showing signs of <W>Deterioration...

10110213.Content: 身为卡戎，不知道“秽蚀”是什么？你到底是不是帝国人啊？
10110213.Subtitle: As a Charon, you don't know about Deterioration? Are you really a native?

10110214.Content: 我是偏远村子来的，消息闭塞……

10110215.Content: 哦对，卡米拉提到过，那也难怪吧。
10110215.Subtitle: Ah right, Camilla did mention something about that. Makes sense then.

10110216.Content: 再多问，小心我把今天的事……

10110217.Content: 啊啊不问了不问了，你千万别说出去啊！
10110217.Subtitle: Alright, alright! I won't ask any more questions! Please don't tell anyone!

10110218.Content: <W>秽蚀</>是一种只在卡戎身上出现的特殊疾病，摊上就无药可救。
10110218.Subtitle: So <W>Deterioration is a peculiar disease that only Charons might suffer from. Once you've got it, there's no cure.

10110219.Content: 你们这群人，差不多十几岁的时候吧，都会觉醒个什么力量，但也不是每个人都那么顺利。
10110219.Subtitle: You folks usually awaken some kind of power around your teens, but not everyone's that lucky.

10110220.Content: 总有几个倒霉蛋不知道哪根筋搭错了，变成<W>秽兽</>——但要说威力啊，外面的普通秽兽连它们一根指头都不如，卫戍部队一整支小队都未必能搞定。
10110220.Subtitle: There are always a few poor wretches who somehow get it wrong and turn into <W>Filthoids — but way stronger than the regular Filthoids out there; a whole escort might not even be able to take one down.

10110221.Content: 要是秽蚀者出现在城里，那附近一大片人都要自求多福喽。
10110221.Subtitle: If a Deteriorator appears in the city... the entire neighbourhood is doomed.

10110222.Content: 所以你明白为什么那么多人类恨卡戎了吧？大家都说是因为卡戎的血管里流淌着邪恶的魔力，所以才会招惹来这种祸端。而秽蚀者，就是所有卡戎中最邪恶的。
10110222.Subtitle: Now you get why so many people hate Charons, right? Everyone says it's the evil magic coursing through Charon veins that brings such disaster. The Deteriorators are considered the most evil among all Charons.

10110223.Content: 这话吧，说实话我也不是那么信，但是……唉！总之，这么稀罕的事，怎么就摊在哈尔头上了呢。
10110223.Subtitle: Honestly, I'm not entirely sold on this, but... sigh! How come such a rare thing had to happen to Hal?

10110224.Content: 半月前那家伙慌慌张张来找我，但我哪敢收留他！包庇秽蚀者跟包庇神奇同盟一样是重罪，一不留神小命就丢了。我只能给点吃的，让他自己想办法去。
10110224.Subtitle: About two weeks ago, he came to me all in a flap, but what could I do? Harbouring a Deteriorator is as severe as sheltering a member of the Forsakens — one wrong move could cost you your life. All I could do was give him some food and tell him to sort himself out.

10110225.Content: 后来听说他偷人家东西被人抓了现行，又被发现是秽蚀者，直接送治安署去了。
10110225.Subtitle: Later I heard he got nabbed for stealing and was found to be a Deteriorator. They took him straight to the Security Bureau.

10110226.Content: 送去治安署会发生什么？

10110227.Content: 都说了秽蚀者是无药可救的，还能发生什么？自然是移交给我们卫戍部队，然后……唉。
10110227.Subtitle: Like I said, there's no cure for Deteriorators. What else could happen? They get handed over to the Escort, and then... well, you know.

10110228.Content: 虽然这家伙也算自作自受……但好歹也当过几年朋友，我不忍心让他躺在冰冷的殓房，就把他偷……带了出来，打算把他葬在泪湖边上，埋他母亲的地方。
10110228.Subtitle: Although he pretty much had it coming... But still, we were friends for a few years. I couldn't bear the thought of him lying in a cold morgue, so I sneaked him out... I was gonna bury him by Lamenting Lake, right next to his mother.

10110229.Content: 等等，我想知道……从秽蚀出现征兆，到秽蚀发生……这期间会有什么症状？
10110229.Subtitle: Hold on, I'm curious — what symptoms would appear between the onset of Deterioration and its full development?

10110230.Content: 我哪知道啊？哦，之前好像听说过有些家伙会变得特别狂躁，也有一些可怜家伙会逐渐失去正常的感知，比如瞎了聋了之类的？
10110230.Subtitle: How should I know? Oh, but I've heard that some would turn extremely violent, and some poor souls would gradually lose their senses, like going blind or deaf or something, perhaps.

10110231.Content: 我只是听说啊，你要对这个感兴趣，自己问医生去。不过我看你已经觉醒成功了，担心这个干吗。
10110231.Subtitle: This is all just hearsay though. If you're curious about it, better ask a doctor. But it seems to me you've already awakened successfully, why do you care?

10110233.Content: 嗯！我刚刚有些头晕，没看清台阶，多谢啦。
10110233.Subtitle: Uh! I got a little dizzy and didn't see the step, thank you.

10110234.Content: 刚刚突然看不清东西，没想到竟然惊动了它……抱歉！
10110234.Subtitle: I suddenly couldn't see clearly back there and ended up startling that monster... I'm so sorry!

10110235.Content: 你的眼睛……是什么时候看不见的？
10110235.Subtitle: Your eyes... When did you lose your sight?

10110237.Content: （……难道赛琪的眼疾是“秽蚀”的症状……难道说，修普诺斯之家的所有“住客”都是秽蚀者？）
10110237.Subtitle: (...Could Psyche's sight loss be a symptom of Deterioration... Could all the "lodgers" at the Hypnos' House be Deteriorators?)

10110238.Content: 长官，我向您打听一个人，希望您如实回答。看到这个照相机了吗？如果您拒绝，我就把它交到治安署，那里的长官想必会喜欢的。
10110238.Subtitle: Sir, I'd like to inquire about someone, and I hope you'll be frank and supportive. See this camera? If you refuse, I might just hand it over to the Security Bureau — they'd surely be interested.

10110239.Content: 天呐，饶了我吧，你就算想打听什么军团机密，也犯不着找我这样的大头兵啊——我就一看门的！
10110239.Subtitle: Good grief! Cut me some slack... If you're digging for some military secrets, you don't need to corner a mere foot soldier like me — I'm basically just a gatekeeper!

10110240.Content: 城北“修普诺斯之家”的店主恩里克·埃塞尔莱德，您知道他些什么？有一件算一件，希望您如实告诉我。
10110240.Subtitle: Do you know anything about Henrik Ethelred, the owner of the Hypnos' House in the north of the city? I mean ANYTHING, and I'd like to hear them all, sir.

10110241.Content: 恩里克·埃塞尔莱德……不就是个开旅馆的吗？我想想，我长官倒是跟他有些交情。这人……虽说有过案底，但这些年也算老老实实的，没犯过什么事儿。
10110241.Subtitle: Henrik Ethelred... isn't he just an inn owner? Oh, my superior does have some connection with him. He's got a bit of a history, but has been a law-abiding citizen these past years.

10110242.Content: 哦，那家伙脾气挺臭的，不止一次把去投宿的外乡人赶跑。不过这个嘛，据说之前他干老本行的时候，脾气也不怎么样，不过那时候至少还有家里人管着。
10110242.Subtitle: Oh, that man's got quite the temper, not a rare occasion he's shut the door on travellers. But that's just how he is — even back in his proper job days, he wasn't a nice guy either, though at least back then he had his family to keep him in check.

10110244.Content: 请详细说一下“他的老本行”。

10110245.Content: 请详细说一下“他的家人”。

10110246.Content: 这个啊……我想想，十几年前来着？大概十四、五年前吧，恩里克·埃塞尔莱德在弗莱格桑省的<H>红溪城</>犯下了一起谋杀案。
10110246.Subtitle: Well, it was... what, some fourteen, fifteen years ago? Henrik Ethelred committed a murder up in Scarletriver, Flagson.

10110247.Content: 被害者是个卡戎，哦对，还是个出现了征兆的<W>秽蚀者</>——就咱们刚才说到的。这不算什么重罪，所以他只坐了几个月牢就放出来了。
10110247.Subtitle: The victim was a Charon, one with signs of <W>Deterioration — like I just said. Not a major crime though, so he only served a few months before getting released.

10110249.Content: ……不知道。不过，是个人类就会害怕、憎恶秽蚀者，这也没什么奇怪的吧？
10110249.Subtitle: ...I don't know. But any Mortalan would fear and despise a Deteriorator, I guess.

10110250.Content: 这件事我也是听长官说起的，毕竟过去那么多年了，又不是发生在本地，所以冰湖城也没几个人知道，要是说错了你不要怪我啊！
10110250.Subtitle: I just heard this from my superior. It's been a long time and it didn't happen locally, so don't hold it against me if I've got some details wrong!

10110251.Content: 冰湖城上了岁数的人都知道，恩里克曾经是冰湖城远近闻名的<H>医生</>。他医术挺高明的，是连内城的贵族老爷都会找他看病的那种。
10110251.Subtitle: The older folks in Icelake all know that Henrik was once a renowned doctor. Quite the skilled medic, he was, even the nobles from the inner city would go to him.

10110252.Content: 但后来不知发生了什么事，他在声名最显赫的时候关了医馆，又过了两年，医馆再次开张，但招牌却变成了“旅馆”。
10110252.Subtitle: But then something happened, and he shut down his clinic at the height of his fame, only to reopen it as an inn a couple of years later.

10110253.Content: 哦，仔细想想，好像刚好就是他在红溪城犯事前后那两年……
10110253.Subtitle: Oh, come to think of it, that was right around the time he got in trouble in Scarletriver...

10110254.Content: 一个妻子，一个女儿，普普通通的三口之家。他妻子很早就过世了，是他自己把女儿拉扯大的。
10110254.Subtitle: He had a wife and a daughter, they were just an ordinary family of three. But then his wife passed away quite early, and he raised his daughter on his own.

10110255.Content: 至于他女儿……叫什么来着？海蒂？海莉？记不清了——总之那姑娘当年和恩里克一起去了红溪城旅行，但并没有跟他一起回来。
10110255.Subtitle: As for his daughter... what's her name? Heidi? Hayley? I don't quite remember — anyway, she went on a trip to Scarletriver with Henrik but never returned with him.

10110256.Content: 他从不提起他的女儿，有一年我长官和他喝酒的时候，问起了那女孩的下落，他当场就摔杯子走了。
10110256.Subtitle: He never talks about his daughter. One year, my superior asked about her over drinks, and Henrik just smashed his glass and stormed off.

10110257.Content: 唉，我发誓，所有我知道的听说过的都告诉你了。你能不能放过我啊，至少把胶片给我——*的，你说你这外乡人长得怪和善的，怎么人就这么卑鄙呢。
10110257.Subtitle: Whew, I swear, I've told you everything I know and have heard about. Can you please let me off now? Just give me the film — darn it, you look nice, how could you be so cunning!

10110258.Content: 刚才多有得罪。其实我是开玩笑的，我并没有真的拍您……

10110259.Content: 胶片我先带走了。等我下次从您这里打听消息的时候再还吧，尊敬的长官。

10110301.Content: 喂，怎么这就走了？你去哪儿啊，喂！
10110301.Subtitle: Hey! You're just gonna leave like that? Where are you going?! Oi!

10110302.Content: 你答应过不会说出去的吧？！你得说话算话——
10110302.Subtitle: You promised not to tell anyone, didn't you? You have to stick to your word...

10110401.Content: ……你你、你怎么还在这儿？！吓死我了。
10110401.Subtitle: You're still here?! Scared me half to death.

10110502.Content: 我和内城的朋友通过气了，今夜他的马车会停在这附近。等赛琪出来，我们先送她到城外避避风头。给恩里克八个胆子，他也不敢去打劫贵族老爷的马车。
10110502.Subtitle: I've squared things with a friend from the inner city, he will send his coach around here tonight. Once Psyche shows up, we'll take her out of town and lay low for a while. Henrik wouldn't dare rob a nob's coach.

10110503.Content: 然后……再想办法看看接下来怎么办吧。
10110503.Subtitle: After that... we'll have to play it by ear.

10110504.Subtitle: You really have a wide network, don't you?

10110505.Content: 哈，总得对得起我这些年经历的**事。不过，你确定她会来？
10110505.Subtitle: Ha, got to make the most of all the cr*p I've been through these years. But are you sure she'll come?

10110506.Content: ……我不知道。总之，她不来的话，就按照第二计划行事。
10110506.Subtitle: ...I'm not sure. Anyway, if she doesn't show up, we'll go with plan B.

10110507.Content: 直接冲进修普诺斯之家，彻底揭露恩里克的罪行——哈，听起来像是流行小说里的侠盗。
10110507.Subtitle: We break into the Hypnos' House and confront Henrik with his crimes — ha, sounds like the story of a hero from some pulp novel.

10110508.Content: 不过，你做好心理准备。即使我们今天救了赛琪，她也……支持不了太久了。我们在废矿里看到的那家伙，就是她最终的归宿。
10110508.Subtitle: But don't get your hopes up. Even if we manage to save Psyche today, she... won't last much longer. Remember the thing we saw in the pit? That's her inevitable fate.

10110510.Content: ……唉，说起来，就算是秽蚀者，不是一直有卫戍部队处置吗？恩里克到底经历过什么，才会做到这种地步……
10110510.Subtitle: ...Right. Speaking of which, aren't the Deteriorators usually handled by the Escort? What on earth has Henrik gone through to end up doing things like this...

10110512.Content: （说出在凯文处打听到的情报。）

10110513.Content: ……恩里克曾是一名医生，但出于某种原因关闭了医馆；恩里克有一个女儿，但她在红溪城下落不明；恩里克在红溪城谋害了一名秽蚀者……
10110513.Subtitle: ...Henrik used to be a doctor, but he shut down his practice for some reason; he had a daughter, but she went missing in Scarletriver; Henrik murdered a Deteriorator in Scarletriver...

10110514.Content: 嗯。更重要的是，这三件事是在同一年发生的，所以它们不会没有关联。
10110514.Subtitle: Right. More importantly, these three events happened in the same year, so they must be correlated.

10110515.Content: ……考虑到修普诺斯之家的住客很有可能都是秽蚀者……嗯，我懂你的意思了。
10110515.Subtitle: And the lodgers at the Hypnos' House are likely all Deteriorators... Hmm, I see what you're getting at.

10110516.Content: 恩里克的女儿大概率在红溪城遭遇了不测，这件事很可能同秽蚀者有关，从而激起了恩里克对秽蚀者的仇恨，即使多年后仍然无法消解……
10110516.Subtitle: Henrik's daughter was likely killed in Scarletriver, possibly by a Deterioration, sparking Henrik's deep-seated hatred towards them, which even after so many years, hasn't faded...

10110517.Content: 所以他不知道用了什么方式将一些秽蚀者控制起来，并动用私刑——你是这么想的吧？
10110517.Subtitle: So, he somehow managed to control some of the Deteriorations and administer his own brand of justice — that's your conclusion, right?

10110518.Content: ……嗯。不过不管他出于什么理由，不管秽蚀者的最终命运是什么……我们都必须——
10110518.Subtitle: ...Yes. But regardless of what he's gone through, or what the Deteriorators would eventually become, we must—

10110521.Content: 尖叫声——修普诺斯之家的方向！
10110521.Subtitle: Screams — from the direction of the Hypnos' House!

10110601.Content: 你们终于来了！！吓死白了！
10110601.Subtitle: You're finally here!! You've no idea how scary it was!

10110602.Content: 刚才不会是你在鬼叫吧？出什么事了？
10110602.Subtitle: Was that you shrieking just now? What happened?

10110603.Content: 我不是按你们说的一直在这里观察情况嘛……然后，真的像你们说的那样，赛琪出来了！我就上去拉住她，准备带她去找你们。
10110603.Subtitle: I was just keeping watch here as you asked me to... And just like you expected, Psyche came out! I ran to her, ready to take her to you.

10110604.Content: 可她突然扑了过来，狠狠地抓向我……还好本大人闪得快！但是……那真的是赛琪吗？那个人一点都不像平时的她，就像是……一头野兽！
10110604.Subtitle: But she suddenly lunged at me, looking all scary... Lucky I was quick on my feet! But... was that really Psyche? She was nothing like her usual self, more like... a wild beast!

10110702.Subtitle: Mr Henrik is... in a really bad condition.

10110802.Content: 他还活着。白，找找附近有没有绷带，布条也可以。
10110802.Subtitle: He's still breathing. Snow, see if you can find any bandages or strips of cloth, anything.

10110803.Content: ……不用救我，这是我应得的。请你，请你……
10110803.Subtitle: ...Don't waste your time on me, I deserve this. Please, you...

10110804.Content: 没用了，他这个伤势已经没救了。让他把话说完吧。
10110804.Subtitle: Don't bother, he's a goner. Let him finish his last words.

10110808.Content: 修普诺斯之家，收留的是……秽蚀者……命运的弃儿……
10110808.Subtitle: The Hypnos' House shelters... Deteriorators... those forsaken by fate...

10110809.Content: 等待他们的……本该是……冰冷的子弹……
10110809.Subtitle: Their destined end... was supposed to be... a cold bullet...

10110810.Content: 是的。海伯利亚的卡戎之民如有任何“秽蚀”的征兆，就会被即刻带走处置，以免他们变成秽兽。等等，难道你是为了——
10110810.Subtitle: Right. In Hyperborea, any Charons showing signs of Deterioration will be taken away immediately to prevent them from turning into Filthoids. Wait, are you saying...

10110811.Content: ……他们的亲人……不忍……心……他们、他们……希望能以体面的方式……温柔地、由我……
10110811.Subtitle: ...Their families... didn't have the heart to see... So they hoped... that I could...

10110812.Subtitle: Help end their misery... in a decent, gentle way...

10110813.Subtitle: Just like... how I... sent away Hayley...

10110814.Content: ……难道……当年红溪城的案子，那个“遇害”的秽蚀者……是恩里克先生的女儿，海莉？
10110814.Subtitle: ...Are you saying... that Deteriorator in Scarletriver... was your daughter Hayley?

10110815.Content: ……连这个都……知道了啊……那起案子只是……一个绝望的父亲……最后的挣扎……
10110815.Subtitle: ...You know about that too... That was merely... the last desperate struggle... of a father in despair...

10110816.Content: 一直以来多有误会，恩里克先生……抱歉。
10110816.Subtitle: We've been wrong about you all along... We're truly sorry, Mr Henrik.

10110818.Content: 我亲手带来……沉眠……这是我的罪，无可饶恕……
10110818.Subtitle: I brought them... to sleep... This is my unforgivable sin...

10110820.Content: 我……群星绮晶……做了……最后的尝试……
10110820.Subtitle: I tried... with the Crystallo of Stella...

10110822.Content: 我本应一如既往地送别她……但那孩子实在是太特别了……
10110822.Subtitle: I was supposed to let her go... like all the others... but that child was so special...

10110823.Content: 她知道自己的结局，但还是努力地……笑着……几个月来，她像一束阳光……照进了这个……被神明抛弃的暗角……就像是……当年的……
10110823.Subtitle: She knew what was coming, yet she's always worn... a smile... For months, she shone like a ray of sunlight... in this... godforsaken place... just like my Hayley...

10110824.Content: 我老了……我无法再次……亲手……
10110824.Subtitle: I'm old... I couldn't... do it again...

10110825.Content: ……所以你在犹豫不忍中错过了最后的时机。赛琪失去理智，袭击了你，逃了出去。
10110825.Subtitle: ...So in your hesitation, you missed the last window. Psyche lost her mind, attacked you, and ran away.

10110827.Content: 你们是“骸”……你们……可以阻止她……
10110827.Subtitle: You're Daimons... you can... stop that child...

10110828.Content: 她那么善良，伤害他人，是她最不愿做的事……
10110828.Subtitle: She has such a gentle soul... hurting others is the last thing she'd want...

10110901.Subtitle: Are you... off to find Psyche?

10110903.Content: 赛琪会经常送花给我们，即使我们有的人已经不太闻得出花的香味，不太看得清花的轮廓，她还是会说，花可以给人带来好运，坚持这么做。
10110903.Subtitle: Psyche often gave us flowers. Even though some of us can barely smell or see them clearly anymore, she kept doing it, saying flowers bring good luck.

10110904.Content: ……但当我想要回应的时候，已经来不及了。
10110904.Subtitle: ...But by the time I wanted to return her kindness, it was already too late.

10110905.Content: 请你们把这朵花带给她吧，这是她最喜欢的花。
10110905.Subtitle: Please bring this flower to her. It's her favourite.

10110906.Content: 请告诉她，修普诺斯之家的每个人，都在等着她……
10110906.Subtitle: And let her know that everyone at the Hypnos' House is waiting for her...

10110907.Content: 我会的。我一定会救下她。
10110907.Subtitle: I will. I'm gonna do everything I can to save her.

10110908.Content: 或者至少……阻止她做出违背自己心愿的事。
10110908.Subtitle: Or at the very least... stop her from doing something she'd regret.

10111005.Content: 和鸣之力也派不上用场……我要怎么做？
10111005.Subtitle: Resonance isn't working... What should I do?

10111006.Content: 不要消耗你的力量了，和鸣之力是无法阻止秽蚀的！
10111006.Subtitle: Don't waste your energy; Resonance can't stop Deterioration!

10111007.Subtitle: She's lost her mind, get ready to fight!

10111101.Content: 赛琪，听得见我的声音吗？
10111101.Subtitle: Psyche, can you hear me?

10111103.Content: 你说过的，你明明还有那么多想做的事……
10111103.Subtitle: You said it yourself, there's so much you want to do...

10111104.Content: 你会离开这里，去那些你前所未见的地方——
10111104.Subtitle: You'll leave Icelake for those unseen places—

10111105.Content: ……你可以去一座小岛，在那里盖几间房子……
10111105.Subtitle: ...You'll go to a small island, where you can build a few houses by the sea...

10111107.Content: ……一边用大大的帽檐遮住太阳，一边和友人说起冰湖城的雪……
10111107.Subtitle: ...Talk about the snow in Icelake with your friends, while shading yourself with a wide-brimmed sunhat...

10111201.Subtitle: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.

10111401.Content: 亲爱的，看，赛琪在对我们笑呢。
10111401.Subtitle: Honey, look, Psyche is smiling at us.

10111402.Content: ……不知道这孩子来到世上，究竟是幸运还是不幸。
10111402.Subtitle: ...I wonder whether this child's birth in this world was a blessing or a curse.

10111403.Content: ……是的，我们并不是带着祝福降生的。
10111403.Subtitle: ...Yes, we weren't born with blessings.

10111501.Content: 妈妈！我答应过赛琪，今天带她来家里堆积木……
10111501.Subtitle: Mum! I promised Psyche I'd bring her home today to play with blocks...

10111502.Content: 谁让你和她玩的？说过多少次，少碰那些不干不净的，你想被邪恶的魔法害死吗？
10111502.Subtitle: Who says you can play with her? How many times have I told you to stay away from these unclean people? Do you want to be killed by dark magic?

10111503.Content: 哎呀，好好的积木都弄脏了，快扔掉！
10111503.Subtitle: Ugh, now these blocks are all dirty. Throw them away now!

10111601.Content: 那天，怀着委屈与不解，我花了一整晚时间洗澡，直到皮肤流出鲜血。
10111601.Subtitle: That day, feeling wronged and confused, I bathed all night until my skin bled.

10111701.Content: 不是的长官，我的女儿一向懂事，她绝不会偷窃顾客的项链，更没有藏在花盆里！
10111701.Subtitle: So what if he hit your daughter? It was all because your daughter's stuff was an eyesore, wasn't it?

10111702.Content: 狡辩什么，卡戎崽子有几个手脚干净的？
10111702.Subtitle: Exactly. And it was just a pot of flowers, so cut the whimper, you little twerp. Don't get your filthy tears on my uniform.

10111703.Content: 这样吧，不是说没偷没藏吗，那就让她自己把店里那些花一盆盆砸了，证明清白。
10111703.Subtitle: What are you still doing here? The Security Bureau isn't a place for your nonsense.

10111704.Content: ……因为，我们生而是“恶魔的孩子”。
10111704.Subtitle: ...It's all because, we are "demon's children."

10111802.Content: 她那么善良，我们一家也本本分分，没做过任何坏事……为什么这种事会落在我们头上？
10111802.Subtitle: She's such a kind child, and we've always been decent, law-abiding people... Why did this happen to us?

10111803.Content: ……事到如今，只能去请求恩里克·埃塞尔莱德医生了。这是我们最后能为她做的。
10111803.Subtitle: ...At this point, there's nothing left but to turn to Dr Henrik Ethelred. It's the last thing we can do for her.

10111902.Content: 你每天送这种东西给我，又能改变什么呢。
10111902.Subtitle: You bring these things to me every day, but what difference do they make?

10111903.Content: 赛琪。你应该知道，来到“修普诺斯之家”意味着什么。
10111903.Subtitle: Psyche, you should know what it means to be sent here.

10111905.Content: ……但我们是为了什么“意义”才活着吗？
10111905.Subtitle: ...But are we just living for some kind of "meaning"?

10112004.Subtitle: Is someone calling out my name...

10112005.Content: 是在告诉我，不要就这样睡着吗……
10112005.Subtitle: Are they trying to tell me not to fall asleep like this...

10112101.Content: 你已经看到了自己的一生。怀抱诅咒的来，毫无意义的去。
10112101.Subtitle: You've witnessed your entire life. A cursed beginning, and a meaningless end.

10112102.Content: 毫无意义——你永远以虚伪的笑脸逢迎他人，你那么无私吗？不，你只是卑怯地乞求他们垂怜你，记住你——记住你还是个人时的模样！
10112102.Subtitle: It's all meaningless — how you've always appeased others with a fake smile. Are you really that selfless? No, you're just cowardly begging for their pity, for them to remember you — as before you turned into a monster!

10112103.Content: 毫无意义——他们的怜悯和记忆如此短暂，很快便会因时间侵蚀而枯萎、衰朽。你会在泥土中腐坏，而后被彻彻底底地遗忘。
10112103.Subtitle: It's all meaningless — their fleeting pity and memories will soon wither and decay with time, leaving you rotting in the ground, utterly forgotten.

10112104.Content: 成为野兽吧……这荒谬的一切再也无法予你苦痛……
10112104.Subtitle: Just be a beast... none of this absurdity can hurt you anymore...

10112201.Content: 成为野兽吧……恶魔的孩子……
10112201.Subtitle: Just be a beast... demon child...

10112305.Content: 不要向这个冷冰冰的世界投降！
10112305.Subtitle: Stand up...

10112404.Content: 不要向这个冷冰冰的世界投降！
10112404.Subtitle: Don't yield to this cold, unfeeling world!

10112502.Content: 侮辱和伤害你的是他们，是他们！你却要选择毁灭我吗？！
10112502.Subtitle: They were the ones who scorned and hurt you! Yet, you choose to destroy me?!

10112503.Content: 秽蚀不可逆转，就算毁灭我，你又能改变什么？
10112503.Subtitle: Deterioration is irreversible. Even in my destruction, what could you possibly alter?

10112601.Content: 赛琪，你还记得，一直以来的愿望是什么吗？
10112601.Subtitle: Psyche, you've always cherished a wish, haven't you?

10112603.Content: 想离开这儿，想去更广阔的世界旅行。
10112603.Subtitle: I want to leave here.

10112604.Content: 想去一个繁花盛开的温暖之地。
10112604.Subtitle: I want to go to a place where flowers bloom in warmth.

10112605.Content: 我想抵达那里。我会——抵达那里。
10112605.Subtitle: I will make it there.

10112701.Subtitle: Psyche, I'm here to take you home.

10112801.Content: 最后，还是……伤害了你们……对不起……
10112801.Subtitle: I've hurt you anyway... I'm so sorry...

10112802.Content: 没关系。我们一起回家。他们要我转告你，他们都在等你。
10112802.Subtitle: It's okay. Let's go home together. They wanted me to tell you, they're all waiting for you.

10112805.Content: ……神通广大的奥特赛德，你不是说你的脑袋比我聪明一万倍吗，你快想想办法啊！
10112805.Subtitle: ...Outsider, aren't you a know-it-all? Didn't you say your brain was a million times smarter than mine? Do something, now!

10112807.Content: 太晚了。她受了致命伤……哪怕是作为秽兽，也活不成了。

10112808.Content: 什么？！小仆从，你下手也太重了——

10112809.Content: ……不、不是{nickname}，是我自己……下的手……因为，这幅样子，并不能算……活着……
10112809.Subtitle: It was her own choice. She destroyed that body of Filthoid herself. She declared to fate in this brutal way that she wouldn't yield.

10112810.Content: 打起精神来，赛琪。你说过要去一个盛开着繁花的温暖之地。
10112810.Subtitle: Chin up, Psyche. You dreamt of going to a place warm and full of blooming flowers.

10112811.Content: 你说过的——有花的地方，就会有好事发生。
10112811.Subtitle: You've said it yourself — flowers bring good luck.

10112812.Subtitle: Yes, it must be... a beautiful place.

10112813.Content: 不，我讲的不算，你得自己去看。
10112813.Subtitle: No, don't take my word for it, you have to see it for yourself.

10112814.Content: 你知道……我为什么喜欢花吗？
10112814.Subtitle: Do you know... why I love flowers?

10112815.Content: 因为它们的种子，会乘着轻柔的风，去向远方……翻越城墙、高山……没有什么能阻挡它们。
10112815.Subtitle: Because their seeds, carried by the gentle wind, travel to distant lands... Over city walls, over mountains... nothing can stop them.

10112903.Subtitle: The Deteriorator is neutralised; the hostages are safe.

10113001.Content: 好在秽蚀者的行动路线朝向城外，未造成大范围人员伤亡，我们运气不错。
10113001.Subtitle: It headed towards the outskirts, no casualties caused. Luck is on our side this time.

10113002.Content: 你好，我是第六军团下属，科赛托斯行省卫戍部队准尉，黎瑟·费西尔。
10113002.Subtitle: Greetings, I am Rhythm Fischer, Warrant Officer of the Cocytus Escort of the 6th Legion.

10113003.Content: 我接到紧急情报，外围北区出现“秽蚀”事件。秽蚀者异常凶险，我们不确定它是真的被击毙了，还是短暂休眠。你们即刻撤离此地，接下来由我们应付。
10113003.Subtitle: I have received an alert of a Deterioration outbreak in the northern periphery. The Deteriorator's a grave threat; it's unclear if it's truly dead or merely in a dormant state. Immediate evacuation is advised; we'll take over from here.

10113005.Content: ……不必了，长官。您出手之前，我们已经解决了。它已经凉了，透了，您也不用再浪费子弹了。
10113005.Subtitle: No need, ma'am. We've taken care of it before you came. It's dead as a doornail now, no need to waste more of your bullets.

10113006.Subtitle: Really? That explains why this target was more stable than the average Filthoids.

10113007.Content: 的确没有生命体征了。难怪这次的目标比大多数秽兽都要稳定。

10113008.Content: 不过……只靠你们两个么？看你们的打扮，是“狩月人”？
10113008.Subtitle: However... was it only you two? Given your outfits, are you Phoxhunters?

10113010.Content: 不对！长官，我看到了！虽然离得很远，但我先前探路的时候看到了，这几个卡戎……他们也会使用<W>魔法</>……
10113010.Subtitle: That's not it! Ma'am, I saw it! Though from a distance, I saw these Charons... they used <W>magic...

10113011.Content: 他们、他们没准就是秽蚀者的同伙！这些低贱的家伙，一个个净是邪恶的魔法师，没有一个好东西！我看全都得……
10113011.Subtitle: They might be accomplices of the Deteriorator! These low-life beings, all wicked sorcerers! They should all be...

10113013.Content: ……呃，不……长官，我、我是说他们。也、也不是所有卡戎之民都……总之我不是意有所指！
