10113013.Subtitle: ...Er, I'm not saying... I was just referring to them, ma'am. It's not that all Charons are... Anyway, I didn't mean anything by it!

10113014.Content: ……惩罚一个有罪者，无需殃及众人。
10113014.Subtitle: ...Punishing the guilty shouldn't affect the innocent.

10113015.Content: 感谢几位对军团的鼎力协助。请随我们前往治安署，我们将给予几位应有的报偿。
10113015.Subtitle: We appreciate your support of the Legion. Please come with us to the Security Bureau; we shall offer you handsome rewards.

10113016.Content: 尽快将秽蚀者处理掉，以免引起行人恐慌。
10113016.Subtitle: Dispose of the Deteriorator ASAP to avert public alarm.

10113019.Content: 她……是为了避开人群，才会拼命往城外逃的。
10113019.Subtitle: She... was trying to keep away from the crowds, that's why she ran towards the outskirts so desperately.

10113020.Content: ……在最后一刻，她还在竭尽全力地……试图为人们做些什么……
10113020.Subtitle: ...Even in her last moments, she was still trying... to do something for others...

10113021.Content: 什么叫“处理掉”……！你们怎么能——
10113021.Subtitle: "Dispose of"... How could you even—

10113023.Subtitle: Are you alright? Injured perhaps? Should I arrange a military medic for you?

10113024.Content: 没有没有没有。我的朋友只是受了小小的惊吓，我们等下去“水仙平原”喝点热饮就好。
10113024.Subtitle: Not at all, ma'am. My friend is just a bit shaken, we'll be fine after a few warm drinks at the Asphodel.

10113025.Content: 报酬下次再说啦。下一份委托快到时限了，得赶时间，我们先走一步啊。
10113025.Subtitle: We'll talk about the reward another time. We're pressed for time with an upcoming task, we'll take our leave now.

10113026.Content: （冷静下来，保持沉默——你不能继续引起军团怀疑了。）
10113026.Subtitle: (Calm down and remain silent — it's unwise to draw more attention from the Legion.)

10113028.Content: （继续说下去——即使面临风险，你也决意为赛琪正名。）
10113028.Subtitle: (Continue the speech despite the risk — you've made up your mind to set the record straight for Psyche.)

10113029.Content: 她不是什么秽兽，不是什么让你们随意收拾的垃圾。
10113029.Subtitle: She was not a Filthoid or some trash for you to dispose of.

10113030.Content: 她的名字叫赛琪，她曾是冰湖城的市民。就在今夜，她从“秽蚀”中保护了冰湖城的所有人。
10113030.Subtitle: Her name was Psyche. She was a citizen of Icelake. Tonight, she protected everyone in the city from Deterioration.

10113031.Content: 我要亲手把她好好埋葬。谁都别过来。
10113031.Subtitle: I will make sure she receives a proper send-off. Stay away from us.

10113032.Content: 你在说什么鬼话，你护着秽兽？黎瑟长官，这独眼龙真的有问题，得抓回去好好审审——
10113032.Subtitle: What are you talking about? You're defending a Filthoid? Ma'am, this one-eyed brat is highly suspicious — might need a thorough interrogation...

10113034.Content: 卡戎之民安葬同胞的方式，不是埋葬，是将他们的遗体置于水中，漂向远方。他们相信水域将载着同胞的灵魂，去向永恒的雾海。
10113034.Subtitle: In Charon tradition, we don't bury the deceased. Instead, we set them adrift on water, believing it carries their souls to the eternal Misty Sea.

10113035.Content: 走吧。这边的事情，我来向长官解释。
10113035.Subtitle: Let's move on. I'll explain the situation to the higher-ups.

10113102.Content: 看你好好制定了计划一计划二，我还以为你不会冲动了。结果你还是那个你——倒也不错，这才像你。
10113102.Subtitle: I thought you wouldn't act so recklessly anymore. Yet, you remain false to yourself, which isn't bad — it suits you.

10113103.Content: 但是，我们已经送别了一个勇敢的朋友……我不能再看你去涉险。
10113103.Subtitle: Still, I have to say something you might not wanna hear: if you defend a Deteriorator, it's bound to raise suspicions. If the Escort decides to probe into your identity, a travel permit wouldn't be enough to protect you.

10113104.Subtitle: We've just said goodbye to a brave young lady. I can't let you risk yourself again. As for that officer... she was just doing her job, there's no point in blaming her.

10113106.Content: 没什么好谢的，在这里摸爬滚打了这么多年，我早就从刺猬变成老鼠了，每天除了活下去不做他想，你可别像我一样。
10113106.Subtitle: There's nothing to thank me for. After all these years, I've gone from a hedgehog to a rat, living only to see another day. Don't end up like me.

10113107.Content: 刺猬有刺猬的骄傲，卑躬屈膝的事还是交给老鼠干吧。
10113107.Subtitle: A hedgehog has its dignity; better leave the grovelling to the rat.

10113109.Content: {性别：难过就哭一场呗，兄弟。|想哭的话就哭一场吧，不用硬撑着。}
10113109.Subtitle: If you wanna cry, go ahead.

10113110.Content: 风这么大，我什么都听不到。就算我听到什么声音，也只是山雀在乱叫而已。
10113110.Subtitle: The wind here is so strong, I can't hear a thing. Even if I do hear some noise, it's just the sparrows chirping.

10113111.Content: ……这种事情啊，我已经见过很多次了。但我告诉自己，”你只有一个晚上可以流泪。”
10113111.Subtitle: ...I've seen this kind of thing countless times. But I tell myself, you've only got one night for tears.

10113113.Content: 没事。我会好起来的……很快就会好起来的。

10113114.Content: 无能的人才会哭泣，我总有一天会让他们付出代价。

10113115.Content: 无论如何，好好活下去。那孩子一定也希望你能笑着迎接明天。
10113115.Subtitle: Anyway, pull yourself together. That girl would surely wish for you to face tomorrow with a smile.

10113116.Content: 即使……我们一度被这个世界所欺瞒。
10113116.Subtitle: ...Even if we were once deceived by this world.

10113202.Content: 也许你已经去了新的地方，结识了新的友人……
10113202.Subtitle: Perhaps you've explored new places, and have met new friends...

10113206.Content: 我做了一个悲伤的梦——不，我也不知道那是不是梦。
10113206.Subtitle: I had a sad dream — well, I'm not sure if it was a dream.

10113207.Content: 我似乎弄丢了很重要的东西。
10113207.Subtitle: I feel like I've lost something important.

10113208.Content: ……竭尽全力想握住什么，它却像流沙一样从我们手中溜走。
10113208.Subtitle: Trying hard to hold onto something, yet it slips away like sand through our fingers.

10113209.Content: 时间，还有生命……都是如此。
10113209.Subtitle: Time, and life... it's all like this.

10113210.Content: 诞生是为了毁灭，相遇是为了离别。这世界唯一永恒的东西，便是“消亡”。
10113210.Subtitle: To be born is to be destroyed; to meet is to part ways. The only thing that ever lasts in this world is "oblivion."

10113212.Content: 和你一样，踏上我的旅途。
10113212.Subtitle: Like you, I'm starting my own journey.

10113215.Content: 也许有一天，我们会在某处相见的。
10113215.Subtitle: Our paths may cross again one day.

10113301.Content: 再一次崩塌的梦里，那个声音从风中传来。
10113301.Subtitle: Once again in the collapsing dream, that voice whispered through the wind.

10113302.Content: 这一次，我终于可以听清。
10113302.Subtitle: Only this time, I finally made it out.

10113303.Content: 像树木的根须汲取着每一滴水，我竭尽全力试图记住那个名字。
10113303.Subtitle: Like tree roots absorbing every drop of water, I tried my best to engrave that name in my mind.

10113401.Content: 我承受过痛苦，体会过憎恨。我曾为之疲惫，也曾为之悲叹——
10113401.Subtitle: Pain and hatred have been my acquaintances. They've wearied and grieved me—

10113402.Content: <H>但，我仍为曾诞生于世感到喜悦。</>
10113402.Subtitle: Yet, I find joy in having existed in this world.

10113502.Content: 你就把这个正在嗷嗷乱叫的破机器当做你想要保护的人，把这些秽兽当做要攻击她的家伙。

10113503.Content: 想办法保护它，别让秽兽把它拆了。

10113505.Content: 我们狩月人就是会遇到很多突发情况嘛。别慌、别慌，我也来帮你一把就是了！

10113702.Content: 废品改装的嘛，能用已经很不错了！。

10113901.Content: 本次技术性测试剧情流程已结束。

10114001.Content: 这么快就回来了？不是去跟踪恩里克了吗？

10114301.Content: 如果恩里克叔叔同意的话，你可以再来找我玩吗？

10114401.Content: 放老实点，别管与你无关的事。

10114701.Content: 这边，恩里克先生的办公室！

10114901.Content: 请一定要找到她，拜托了……

10115001.Content: ……赛琪杀了恩里克……为什么……会这样……

10115002.Content: 赛琪永远都在笑着……恩里克先生虽然话不多，但总是像父亲一样照料我们……他们明明都是那么好的人啊……

10115101.Content: 恩里克先生一直都太累了。或许对他来说，这样的结局……也不错。

10115201.Content: 白，还记得赛琪是往哪个方向跑的吗？

10115202.Content: 当然记得，我的记忆不会出错！她是往城门的方向跑的！

10115301.Content: 好大的风！呜哇，感觉要被吹飞了——

10115401.Content: 这是最近的路，踩着浮冰过去吧。

10115402.Content: 这里水深，仔细点，别掉下去。

10115501.Content: 与此同时，皇都·迪斯玛尼亚——

10115601.Content: 突然，恩里克出现了【待包装】

10115701.Content: 一个熟悉的少女叫住了一行人【待包装】

10115801.Content: （已经和奥特赛德和白交代好了今天发生的所有事。）

10115802.Content: （接下来能做的，就只有在说好的地方……耐心等待。）

10116801.Content: 我们开始狩猎吧！【待包装】

10116901.Content: 地上这些是……奥特赛德布置的陷阱。

10116902.Content: ……还挺厉害的。奥特赛德竟然还会这种手艺。

10117002.Content: 啊哈，真不巧，调试的时候弄了点动静，把这些小家伙引来了……

10117102.Content: 那小贼一头黑发，当时穿的好像是……蓝色的上衣？

10117201.Content: 那是……贫民窟的巴迪爷爷！我去找他打听打听！

10117301.Content: 巴迪爷爷！您这是出来散步？

10117302.Content: 哦哟，这不是咱们的垃圾桶小公主吗？今天带着{性别:小弟小妹|两个小妹}一起捡啊？

10117304.Content: 哦……那就是垃圾桶小魔王？
10117304.Subtitle: Okay, so... you are the "Demon King of Rubbish Bin" then?

10117305.Subtitle: Nuh-uh! It's the "Demon King of Light"!

10117306.Content: 啊哈哈哈……先别管这个了，爷爷啊，您看没看到一个黑头发、蓝衣服的卡戎男人从这里跑过去？
10117306.Subtitle: Hahaha... let's not get hung up on titles for now... Mr Badi, did you happen to see a Charon man in a blue shirt with dark hair just now?

10117307.Content: 刚刚确实有个小伙子跑过去了。年轻人冒冒失失的，走路也不看路，直冲着<H>广场对面</>堆垃圾那块儿去了！呀，他该不会是——要抢你生意？
10117307.Subtitle: I think so... A young man just came barreling down the street — clumsy kid, wasn't even watching where he was going, headed straight for the rubbish bins across the square! Wait, was he trying to poach on your turf?

10117308.Content: 呃……算是吧！谢啦，我这就追他去。
10117308.Subtitle: Um, in a way! Thanks, I'm going after him.

10117402.Content: 他说的是3号大垃圾箱！跟我来！
10117402.Subtitle: He meant Big Bin No. 3! Now come with me!

10117501.Content: 去吧去吧……老话怎么说的来着？“早起的鸟儿有垃圾捡！”
10117501.Subtitle: Go get 'em! As the old saying goes, "Strike while the rubbish is hot!"

10117602.Content: ……没关系！灵敏的“侦探”嗅觉告诉我，这附近一定能找到线索！
10117602.Subtitle: ...No worries! My detective instincts are telling me there's a clue nearby!

10117701.Content: 涂鸦墙边的箱子叠了两层……底层箱子被斜过来了，表面还有凌乱的成年男性脚印——哼哼，被我看穿了！
10117701.Subtitle: Check this out — two layers of crates against the wall. The bottom one is skewed, and there are messy footprints all over it — busted!

10117702.Content: 咳，根据证人玛尔洁的证词，今天早上她来3号大垃圾箱“进货”的时候，才刚把这边的箱子横着摆好。
10117702.Subtitle: Ahem, according to the statement of Margie the Witness, she just straightened these crates when she did her "shopping" at Big Bin No. 3 this morning.

10117703.Content: 所以，“缄默侦探”玛尔洁的推理显而易见——小贼情急之下把这些箱子叠了起来，踩着它们爬上了墙！他很可能藏在天台上！
10117703.Subtitle: Thus, Margie the Reticent Detective deduces — that desperate thief must have stacked these crates to climb the wall! He's likely hiding on the rooftop right now!

10117704.Content: 哦！有道理耶！我们也爬上去看看吧。
10117704.Subtitle: Huh! Smart thinking! Let's get up there and check it out.

10117801.Content: 原来“缄默侦探”就是玛尔洁的称号啊，还挺威风的……只可惜有点短，气势上输了一截！
10117801.Subtitle: So "Reticent Detective"... that's your title, Margie? Sounds cool... A bit short though — could use more punch!

10117802.Content: 有道理！那魔王小妹你有什么主意吗？
10117802.Subtitle: Makes sense! Any suggestions, Demon King?

10117803.Content: 刚才那个老爷爷说的“垃圾桶公主”就挺不错的？
10117803.Subtitle: That old man back there called you "Princess Rubbish Bin"... That's a good one!

10117804.Content: “缄默侦探☆垃圾桶公主”，气势是不是突然就上去啦！
10117804.Subtitle: "Reticent Detective ☆ Princess Rubbish Bin", has a nice ring to it, doesn't it?

10117805.Content: 啊——！不要不要，不要再提那几个字了，丢死人了！
10117805.Subtitle: Argh—! Noooo way! Can we please drop that nickname? It's embarrassing!

10117901.Content: 怎么了，垃圾桶里有什么吗？
10117901.Subtitle: What, something in the bin?

10117902.Content: 我只是想确认一下他有没有藏在——
10117902.Subtitle: Just making sure he wasn't hiding in—

10117903.Content: 啊——！那是……半瓶葡萄酒和一枚古董胸针？！天哪，难道你就是被垃圾桶之神眷顾的天选之人？！
10117903.Subtitle: Whoooa! Is that... half a bottle of wine and an antique pin!? Wow, aren't you the chosen one blessed by the gods of rubbish bins!?

10117904.Content: 可恶，偏偏在这个节骨眼上……你等我一下！
10117904.Subtitle: But this really isn't the best time… just a sec!

10117905.Content: （玛尔洁从废品堆里扯出两张旧报纸，把刚找到的宝贝小心翼翼地包了起来，放在角落里。）
10117905.Subtitle: (Margie fishes out two old newspapers from the rubbish, wraps her newly discovered treasures carefully, and stashes them in a corner.)

10117906.Content: 好嘞，这样就没问题了！等我抓完小贼再回来收货。见者有份，等小贼的事儿搞定，葡萄酒也分你一半！
10117906.Subtitle: There, all set! I'll come back for these later. Finders keepers — I'll share this wine with you once we've caught the thief!

10117907.Subtitle: Um... I think I'll pass, thanks.

10118001.Content: 才刚有个人爬上来，怎么又来三个？

10118101.Content: 最近这是怎么了，总有人在城里飞檐走壁。冰湖城是有什么运动赛吗？爬得快有奖那种？

10118102.Content: 呃……这么说来，好像确实有个皎皎前辈设过类似的挑战？

10118103.Content: 那你们快追吧！刚才那位选手都跑过去半天啦。

10118201.Content: 啊，快看，就是前面屋顶上那家伙！

10118202.Content: 你、你……至于追到这种地方来吗？你说你那钱本来就是拿来分给别人的，那分老子一点怎么了？

10118203.Content: 你有困难我可以帮你，但直接上手抢，那就吃我一铲！
10118203.Subtitle: If you're hard up, I can help you. But you can't just grab money of people — that'll earn you a whack on the head with my shovel!

10118204.Content: （青年似乎找不到反驳的话，气急败坏地跳下了墙。）

10118301.Content: 又、又不见了？他是幽灵吗？

10118302.Content: 不……你们看，这面井盖有被挪动过的痕迹。

10118303.Content: 以我的推测，他一定钻进了下水道！

10118401.Content: 这么深的水……根本就过不去吧！他怎么做到的？

10118402.Content: 别急，这种时候就该动用本“缄默侦探”的情报网了！

10118403.Content: 根据8号小桶产出的《下水道维修手册》，这里的水位是可以人为控制的！机关一定就在附近。

10118501.Content: 哇——真的有排水机关。垃圾桶公主☆缄默侦探，你好有本领！

10118502.Content: 去掉前面那半，拜托了……呜呜。

10118503.Content: 水位下降了一部分，找找还有没有类似的开关吧。

10118602.Content: 对了，《下水道维修手册》里写过，下水道偶尔会招来一些喜欢温暖湿润的秽兽栖身。

10118603.Content: 虽然这些秽兽是体格最弱小的那种，快跟猫猫狗狗差不多了，但如果成群结队行动，还是会有点危险……

10118702.Content: 呼……呼……你们几个腿长的……等等我……

10118901.Content: 听到脚步声了，这边这边！

10119101.Content: 他在高处！哼，这次我不会再被砸到——呜哇！

10119102.Content: 真是的……这么爱扔石头，他是猴子变的吗？

10119201.Content: 这些脚印是刚踩上去的，沿着这些湿漉漉的脚印追上去准没错。

10119301.Content: 这是……新鲜的血迹？他受伤了？

10119302.Content: 他或许被什么袭击了……我们也谨慎一些。

10119401.Content: 果然……他惊扰了这里的秽兽群，以至遭到了围攻。

10119601.Content: 这扇门看起来没坏，只是上了锁……

10119602.Content: 唉，都成废矿了，有必要搞这么多防盗措施吗！

10119603.Content: ……也许是为了防止有人误入此地，被秽兽伤到？

10119604.Content: 让我们碰碰运气吧！看看这附近能不能找到钥匙一类的东西。

10119701.Content: 哇……原来矿坑里还有这种好东西？要是让玛尔洁知道了，她还不得乐开花！

10119702.Content: 但是这矿石很硬吧，玛尔洁小姐的铲子说不定会被磕坏的。

10119802.Content: 不用。赛琪，趁“魔王大人”没看着……我们平分了怎么样？

10119803.Content: 你拿着就好！可以给自己买点漂亮衣服什么的，我……没什么需要用钱的地方。

10120001.Content: 唔……是开门的机关！藏得好严实。

10120102.Content: 从我大腿上下来，白。你这样我动不了了……你先回冰湖城吧，我不会笑话你的。

10120103.Content: 不不不不回去，没没没没有经历过冒冒冒险的人生一定是不不不不不完整的！

10120104.Content: 好呀，那我就陪着{nickname}和魔王大人一起，把人生变“完整”一点吧。

10120105.Content: 刚刚我应该没有拖后腿……所以接下来，我想也不会有问题的！

10120107.Content: （只是一些寻常的秽兽，远不如净界岛那一次来得凶险……）

10120108.Content: （仔细回想贝蕾教过的防身技巧，谨慎地挥出每一次剑——可以做到的。）

11010102.Content: <W>……那只巨兽正拦在你的去路，扼住你的咽喉。</>
11010102.Subtitle: ...That giant beast blocked your path, its grip tightening around your throat.

11010103.Content: <W>你的血肉之躯因窒息而悸动，疼痛叩击着你深处最隐秘的渴望。</>
11010103.Subtitle: Your body shakes as you suffocate, sharp pains triggering the deepest desire within your soul.

11010106.Content: <W>杀了它。聆听它的哀嚎，沐浴它的血。拥抱这甜蜜的死亡。</>
11010106.Subtitle: Kill it. Listen to its death throes, bathe in its blood, and embrace the sweet release of death.

11010107.Content: （捂住耳朵。拼尽全力隔绝这奇怪的声音。）
11010107.Subtitle: (Cover your ears to shut out that strange voice)

11010108.Subtitle: (Find a way to leave this place)

11010115.Content: （这扇门……是什么时候出现在这里的？）
11010115.Subtitle: (This door... When did it show up here?)

11010116.Content: （……总之，我必须逃离这里，逃离这如同附骨之疽的可怕念头。）
11010116.Subtitle: (...Anyway, I must get out of here, and get rid of these terrible thoughts that cling to me like a plague.)

11010203.Subtitle: Captain! You're finally back with us!

11010204.Content: 那秽兽要不行了！干掉它，快！！
11010204.Subtitle: That Filthoid is on its last breath! Keep it up and finish it!

11010205.Content: 尤里安，跟我撤到后方去！您的伤口要裂开了！
11010205.Subtitle: Urien, retreat to the rear with me! Your wound is opening up again!

11010208.Content: <W>湿滑黏腻的污物沾满了你的双手，你分不清那是秽兽的黏液还是内脏。你唯一知道的是，它们令你欣悦，连灵魂都为之震颤。</>
11010208.Subtitle: Your hands are drenched in wet, slimy filth, uncertain whether it's the Filthoid's secretions or its innards. Yet, a sudden joy tingles through your soul, bringing an inexplicable elation.

11010209.Subtitle: (Shut up! That was not how I felt!)

11010210.Content: <W>不要抗拒。因为我是真正的你，是你的死之本能。终有一日你会遵从我的指引，遵从亘古的意志……</>
11010210.Subtitle: Do not resist, because I am what you actually are. I am your instinct for death. One day you shall follow my lead and obey the ancient will...

11010211.Content: （你不愿再听它的胡言乱语，努力维持理智。）
11010211.Subtitle: (You refuse to let the ramblings erode your will and try to stay sane.)

11010215.Content: （……这讨厌的声音终于停下来了。）
11010215.Subtitle: (...That annoying voice has finally stopped.)

11010216.Content: 快去看看其他人的情况吧。
11010216.Subtitle: I should go check on the others.

11010221.Content: 嘶……达芙涅医生，我们这样算是完成任务了吧？
11010221.Subtitle: Hssss... Dr Daphne, we've completed our mission, right?

11010222.Content: ……不，好好活着回去，我们的任务才算完成！
11010222.Subtitle: ...No, not until when we get back alive.

11010223.Content: 没关系的，达芙涅。冷静下来，没关系的。
11010223.Subtitle: It's alright, Daphne. Calm down. Everything's going to be okay. Come down.

11010303.Content: 那就好。您被那只秽兽缠住的时候，我还以为再也……
11010303.Subtitle: Good to hear that. When you got tangled up by that Filthoid, I thought I'd never...

11010304.Subtitle: ...I'm just glad to see you're okay.

11010305.Content: 不过……我们也没剩下多少人了，侥幸活下来的都伤得很重。
11010305.Subtitle: ...There are so few of us left. And those who survived are heavily wounded.

11010306.Content: 如果得空，可以请您陪伤员们说说话吗？
11010306.Subtitle: If you have the time, would you stay and talk to the wounded?

11010307.Content: 谢谢。我要回去找一件东西，就先拜托您照看他们。士兵们都很仰赖您，如果有您鼓励，他们会好受一些的。
11010307.Subtitle: Thank you. I'm heading back to find something, so please take care of them for the time being. The soldiers look up to you. Your encouragement will make them feel better.

11010309.Content: 作战地图标记出我们现在的位置附近有几间仓库。运气好的话，里面说不定会有急救箱。
11010309.Subtitle: The battle map shows several warehouses near our location. We might find some first-aid kits there if we're lucky.

11010310.Content: 我已经用光了所有凝血剂和镇痛剂，但还有几位伤员没有得到救治……他们的伤情已经耽误不得了。
11010310.Subtitle: I'm already out of coagulants and painkillers, but some of the soldiers haven't been treated yet... Their injuries can't afford any more delays.

11010313.Content: 留下。你身手不算好，路上的秽兽未必应付得来。我们就剩你一个医务员了，别死在这儿。
11010313.Subtitle: And the medic stays. You aren't strong enough to deal with the Filthoids out there alone. We can't afford to lose our only medic.

11010315.Content: 明白了……我听从您的安排。
11010315.Subtitle: Understood... I'll follow your orders.

11010316.Content: 对了，您的通讯器还完好吗？
11010316.Subtitle: Is your radio still working?

11010318.Content: 好，那请您保持通讯状态，我们随时联络。
11010318.Subtitle: Then please stay on the channel so we can keep in touch.

11010403.Content: 队长！我没事，还能动弹……嘶——
11010403.Subtitle: Captain! I'm fine, I can still move... HSSSSS—

11010404.Subtitle: I failed to protect you. I'm sorry.

11010405.Subtitle: Please don't say that, Captain! You did your best!

11010407.Content: 除了神弃者那帮畜生，还能有谁？
11010407.Subtitle: Who else could it be? The bastards who call themselves The Forsakens.

11010408.Content: 那帮丧尽天良的东西，竟然把秽兽当兵器用……<W>神弃者同盟</>的人简直和秽兽一样，都是怪物！
11010408.Subtitle: Those despicable cowards are using Filthoids as their weapon... The Forsakens are monsters, just like their Filthoid pets!

11010409.Content: 还有上头那些混蛋也是，一点儿他*的脑子都没有，这么多秽兽，给我们先遣队的作战手册里硬是一个字都没提到！
11010409.Subtitle: And those blasted airheads giving us the orders are just as bad. The mission brief mentioned nothing about the Filthoid hordes down here.

11010410.Content: ……对不住啊，你不太爱出声，还按着你听了这么多牢骚。
11010410.Subtitle: ...Sorry about that. I shouldn't have vented my frustration in front of you, Captain.

11010411.Content: 没事。发这么多牢骚，总比说不出话好。
11010411.Subtitle: It's alright. Letting out emotions is better than being unable to speak at all.

11010412.Content: 哈哈，队长啊，你还是这么会安慰人。
11010412.Subtitle: Hah! You always know how to soothe people, Captain!

11010413.Content: 不过幸好有你在，否则我们剩下这几条命也得扔这儿。
11010413.Subtitle: And thank goodness we have you. We thought we were goners.

11010414.Content: 只可惜咱们还是太年轻了，如果<H>阿瓦尔长官</>在……他是咱们中作战经验最丰富的，肯定能指条明路……
11010414.Subtitle: It's just that we're too green. If only Commander Avar were here... As a veteran, he must have a way to get us out.

11010415.Content: （阿瓦尔老师……暂时还没有消息。）
11010415.Subtitle: (Sir Avar... Still no words from him.)

11010501.Content: 医生……达芙涅医生……唉，咱们现在被困在这里，多半是完了。要是真死在这个鬼地方，能不能你来埋我啊……达芙涅医生……
11010501.Subtitle: Doctor... Dr Daphne... We're stuck in this bloody dump. Please, Dr Daphne, if I don't make it, do me a favour and bury me...

11010502.Subtitle: Don't be discouraged. It'll worsen your wounds.

11010503.Content: 又没有止疼药，只能哼哼两声让自己好受点儿了。
11010503.Subtitle: We're out of painkillers... so I have to grumble a bit to make myself feel better.

11010504.Content: 喊这么大声是要把秽兽引来吗？
11010504.Subtitle: Right, keep raising your voice to attract the Filthoids.

11010505.Content: 不说了，队长你别动气。没有止疼药，只能哼哼两声让自己好受点儿了。
11010505.Subtitle: Sorry, Captain. I'll zip it. With no painkillers left, I can only grumble a little to help distract me from the pain.

11010506.Content: 刚才达芙涅医生和你一起断后的，她怎么样了？
11010506.Subtitle: Dr Daphne and you covered our retreat just then. How is she?

11010507.Content: 她没事，就是她让我来看望你们的。
11010507.Subtitle: She's all right. She told me to come check on all of you.

11010508.Content: 那就好。唉，她也是，一个大小姐，原本在炼金院待着好好的，偏要自请调来十三军团遭这个罪，也不知道她到底在想什么。
11010508.Subtitle: Good to hear that. *sigh* A high-born lady like her could've stayed at the Academy, but no, she chose to serve with the 13th Legion. What was she thinking?

11010509.Content: ……“为陛下献上荣耀与忠诚”？那群贵族嘴上总挂着这些，也不知道他们现在真的到了这鬼地方，会不会后悔当初不该头脑发热。
11010509.Subtitle: ..."Eternal glory and loyalty to our Emperor!" Those aristocrats say that all the time. I wonder if any of them would still be so keen on that when they're actually in a filth pit like this.

11010510.Content: 不过她医术真不错，说话又好听。队长，你可得护着她点，别让她死在这儿了。
11010510.Subtitle: But Dr Daphne has real medical skills and a soft, pretty voice. We gotta keep her safe, Captain. Don't want her to die here.

11010601.Content: 怎么样？他们有没有稍微好一点？

11010603.Content: 那就好。不过大家伤得这么重，也不知道还能撑多久。

11010605.Content: ……嗯，我明白……只是心理安慰远远不够……

11010607.Content: 抱歉，可以再麻烦您一次吗？我要回去一趟，可否请您继续照看一下伤员？

11010609.Content: 是的。来的路上有些军需箱，应该是原本储备在要塞的应急物资。当时我在忙着掩护大家，没来得及……

11010610.Content: 我再回去找找，运气好的话，里面说不定会有急救包……就这么办吧！他们的伤情耽误不得了。

11010613.Content: 所以你更应该留下。你身手没那么好，要是遇到秽兽，应付不来。

11010615.Content: 对了，您的通讯器还完好吗？

11010617.Content: 好，那么我们随时保持联络。

11010618.Content: 仓库的确有一些军需箱。
11010618.Subtitle: The warehouse does have a few military supply crates.

11010619.Content: 好。翻找之前，请先确认箱子周围是否设有陷阱。
11010619.Subtitle: Great. But before your search, make sure the crates are safe to be approached.

11010621.Subtitle: I got it. The medicine appears to be in good condition.

11010622.Content: 谢谢！回来时小心些，这附近恐怕还会有秽兽出没。
11010622.Subtitle: That's great! Thank you! Be careful on your way back. Filthoids are probably lurking around this place.

11010623.Content: 也不知道其他人怎么样了……
11010623.Subtitle: Wonder how the other guys are doing...

11010624.Content: 要让那帮畜生血债血偿。
11010624.Subtitle: Gotta make those rotters pay.

11010625.Content: 该死的秽兽……该死的同盟……
11010625.Subtitle: Damn those Filthoids... Damn The Forsakens...

11010626.Content: 不能睡……不能在这里倒下……
11010626.Subtitle: Can't fall asleep... Can't die here...

11010627.Content: 嘶——我的胳膊好像不听使唤了……
11010627.Subtitle: Hsss— I can't feel my arm...

11010628.Content: 还好队长平安无事，我们有希望了。
11010628.Subtitle: Thank goodness our Captain is all right. We're gonna make it.

11010703.Content: 好，这样多少能让伤员的情况稳定一些。
11010703.Subtitle: Great, this would help stabilise the wounded.

11010704.Subtitle: Any news from the Snow Wolves?

11010705.Content: 还是没有。您不在的时间里，我试着分别向“雪狼”分队的阿瓦尔长官，以及总指挥部的富尔维斯长官联络，但所有的通讯频道都被切断了。
11010705.Subtitle: Not yet. While you were away, I tried reaching out to Commander Avar of the Snow Wolves and Chief Commander Fulvis, but none of the comm channels were working.

11010706.Content: 继续尝试联络。在此期间，先看看能不能找个更安全的地方安置伤员。
11010706.Subtitle: Keep trying. And meanwhile, let's see if we can find a safer place for the wounded.

11010709.Subtitle: Take a look at this map.

11010710.Content: 虽然我们目前所在的仓储区出口已经被封闭，但还有一个地方我们没确认过……那就是<H>地下的路</>。
11010710.Subtitle: We're currently in the storage area where the exit is blocked. However, there are some underground tunnels that we haven't checked yet.

11010711.Content: 帝国大多数城市和要塞都建有发达的地下水道。最近十几年里，这些地下水道又经历了整体扩建，用于遭遇空袭时避险。
11010711.Subtitle: Most imperial cities and fortresses have elaborate networks of underground sewers. In recent years, some of these tunnels were expanded and reinforced to serve as air raid shelters.

11010712.Content: 如果运气好，同盟没有在地下设伏，或许……或许我们可以试着将伤员转移到那里休整。地下水路连通着要塞外，如果救援到了，也方便接应。
11010712.Subtitle: If we're lucky enough and The Forsakens didn't set up any ambushes, maybe we could get the wounded there to rest and recover. Besides, the sewer tunnels run all the way outside the fortress, so if our reinforcements arrive, they can easily get to us.

11010713.Content: 当、当然……地下也可能有危险。如果您觉得这个提议可行，请允许我先去探探路。
11010713.Subtitle: Of course... the tunnels might be risky as well. If you think it's feasible, allow me to scout ahead first.

11010714.Content: 值得一试。但你一个医务员去侦查，太冒险了。
11010714.Subtitle: It's worth a try, but we can't risk having our medic do this alone.

11010715.Content: 现在只有我们两个可以行动了。秽兽随时可能袭击这儿，您要保护他们安全，就不能走远。
11010715.Subtitle: But now only the two of us can move or act... And the Filthoids might attack this place anytime. You should stay and keep the squad safe.

11010716.Content: 我……虽然不是专业的侦察兵，但多少学过一些知识，所以……
11010716.Subtitle: I may not be a professional scout, but over time I've picked up some useful skills, so...

11010717.Content: 明白了。你谨慎行动，如果遇到敌人，务必避免正面冲突。
11010717.Subtitle: ...Alright, be careful down there. Make sure to sidestep any confrontation with the enemies.

11010718.Content: 好。我会和您保持通讯，也请您继续联络大家。如果我失联半小时以上，就请您……另寻他路。
11010718.Subtitle: Understood. I'll stay on the radio while you keep contacting the others. And if I lose contact for more than half an hour, please... lead the squad to find another way.

11010719.Content: 不要怕，达芙涅。大家活下去的希望都系在你身上了……不要怕。
11010719.Subtitle: Don't be scared, Daphne. Everyone's survival depends on you... Don't be scared.

11011001.Content: 坚持住，我再试试联系“雪狼”分队！
11011001.Subtitle: Hang in there, I'll try contacting the Snow Wolves!

11011005.Subtitle: What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?

11011007.Content: 我是阿瓦尔·赫德兰中校。对面的“狮鹫”小队队员，你们在哪里？
11011007.Subtitle: This is Lieutenant Colonel Avar Hrodland. Report your position, Squad Griffins.

11011008.Content: 医务员达芙涅·塞奥多尔请求支援。我们当前正位于……
11011008.Subtitle: This is Medic Daphne Theodore requesting backup. We're currently at...

11011012.Content: 嗯，有我呢。你专心应付眼前，背后交给我就是。
11011012.Subtitle: Focus on the fight. I've got your six.

11011013.Content: 我们暂时击退了来袭的秽兽，清理出一个临时休整点，不过这边也坚持不了太久。
11011013.Subtitle: We've repelled the Filthoids and set up a temporary shelter, but I don't think this place will hold.

11011014.Content: 达芙涅紧急救治了伤员，但据伤情判断，他们已经暂时丧失了作战能力。
11011014.Subtitle: Daphne has tended to the wounded, but due to their injuries they're currently unable to fight.

11011015.Subtitle: ...Okay. You two have done pretty well.

11011016.Content: 阿瓦尔长官！哈、哈……你来了！你一定会带着大家……攻下这座要塞……
11011016.Subtitle: Commander Avar! Huff... Huff... you're here! I knew it... You'll lead us all... to take this damned fort...

11011017.Content: 你们都是好样的，你们的勇敢对得起胸口的徽章，帝国不会让你们在这里白白流血。
11011017.Subtitle: Each one of you is a credit to the squad. You've shown courage that is truly worthy of your badge. The Empire will not let your efforts go to waste.

11011018.Content: 长官，“雪狼”那边怎么样了？
11011018.Subtitle: Sir, what about the Snow Wolves?

11011019.Content: 他们好好地执行任务呢。我已经联系上了总指挥官，你们尽管放心休息，接下来就交给我们。
11011019.Subtitle: They are performing their duties, and I've reached out to the chief commander. Have a good rest and leave the fighting to us.

11011020.Content: 阿瓦尔长官？我……在做梦吗……
11011020.Subtitle: Commander Avar...? Am I... in a dream...?

11011021.Content: 这不是梦。坚持住，别睡着。
11011021.Subtitle: This is not a dream. Stay with us, and don't fall asleep.

11011022.Content: 向您致意……长官……荣耀……尽归吾皇……
11011022.Subtitle: I salute you, sir... All glory... to our Emperor...

11011024.Content: 长官，以你们的判断，这次作战还有希望吗？
11011024.Subtitle: Sir, do you think we still have the chance?

11011025.Subtitle: From what I see of the battle—

11011026.Content: 以当前的战况来看，援军就在路上。我们很快会夺下要塞，把那群混蛋打得头破血流。
11011026.Subtitle: The tide of battle is in our favour. Reinforcements are on their way. Soon we will take the fortress and crush those bastards.

11011103.Content: 怎么了？既然胳膊腿都好好的，就打起精神来！
11011103.Subtitle: Why the grief? You still have your arms and legs, so stand up straight and pull yourself together!

11011105.Content: ……你们经历的事，我多少能猜到。牺牲的士兵，一路上我也都看见了。
11011105.Subtitle: ...I know what you've been through. I've seen many of our fallen soldiers along the way.

11011106.Content: 但你们是军人。哀悼的话，留到平安下了战场之后再说。
11011106.Subtitle: But you are soldiers. Save your condolences for when you're home and safe.

11011109.Content: 当然，我们很好。只是按上头的命令办事，差点全都死在这儿而已，没什么不好，有劳长官您挂心了。
11011109.Subtitle: We're doing fine. Just carrying out the orders from higher-ups and almost got killed. Thanks for asking, sir.

11011112.Content: 是。“狮鹫”分队原本按照计划，与您所在的“雪狼”分队分两路向龙莎要塞发起攻势——这是您知道的。但在潜入要塞后，我们遭遇了伏击。
11011112.Subtitle: Yes, sir. As planned, the Griffins and the Snow Wolves were expected to launch a two-way assault on Lonza Fortress. However, the Griffins were ambushed shortly after we began our infiltration.

11011113.Content: 各区域间的通道被封锁，我方小部分队员失联，其余则伤亡惨重。向外的通讯也被切断了——我们被困在了这里。
11011113.Subtitle: The passageways between the zones were blocked. We lost contact with some of our men, and the rest have suffered heavy casualties. Our commlinks have been severed, too — we're essentially trapped here.

11011114.Content: “雪狼”分队的情况和你们差不多。情况你们自己知道，先别讲给伤员。
11011114.Subtitle: Actually, the Snow Wolves went through the same situation as yours. Keep this between us, don't let the wounded know.

11011115.Content: 嗯……现在整个“狮鹫”分队能行动的，只剩下你们俩了吗……
11011115.Subtitle: So, seems like the two of you are the only combat-capable Griffins left in the squad...

11011116.Content: 达芙涅，刚才我们打通了仓储区和加工区的通路，中间有片区域还算安全。我给出了信号，待会儿会有人护送你们过去休整。
11011116.Subtitle: Daphne, we've opened the passage between the storage area and the processing area, and there's a place in the middle that's reasonably secure. I've given the signal, and you'll be escorted there for a better rest.

11011117.Subtitle: , you come with me and continue the mission.

11011118.Content: 我也可以行动，请让我——唔！
11011118.Subtitle: I can take action with you. Please, let me... Argh!

11011119.Content: 你的腿受伤了？你……是怎么跑到这儿来的？硬撑着的？疼吗？
11011119.Subtitle: You hurt your leg? Are you okay? ... How did you manage to make it here?

11011120.Content: 别管了。我、我还剩最后一针麻醉剂，是留给我自己的。炼金院新研究的药剂对阻断疼痛很有效，所以没关系——
11011120.Subtitle: Don't mind me. I—I've saved one last dose of anaesthetic for myself. The latest Academy potion is quite effective at killing pains, so it's okay—

11011121.Content: 达芙涅医务员，海伯利亚军团第12条军规是什么？
11011121.Subtitle: Medic Daphne, what is Article 12 of the Hyperborean Legionary Code of Conduct?

11011122.Subtitle: Now is not the time for rules! I can still—

11011123.Content: 达芙涅医务员，你的长官在问你话。
11011123.Subtitle: Medic Daphne, answer your superior officer.

11011124.Content: ……军事行动中，应服从上级指令……
11011124.Subtitle: ...The chain of command must be respected during all military operations...

11011125.Content: 海伯利亚帝国十三军团医务员达芙涅·塞奥多尔。
11011125.Subtitle: Daphne Theodore, Medic of the 13th Legion of the Hyperborean Empire.

11011127.Content: 暂停行动，原地留守。与“雪狼”分队的人员会合后，与“狮鹫”的伤员一起前往加工区休整待命。
11011127.Subtitle: Hold all actions and stand by. After joining up with the Snow Wolves, proceed with the wounded Griffins to the processing area for rest and await further orders.

11011131.Subtitle: Okay. , follow me and proceed with the mission.

11011133.Content: 你也受伤了，什么时候的事？
11011133.Subtitle: When did you get injured?

11011134.Content: 我们几个被那只巨型秽兽袭击的时候。我不是有意向您隐瞒，只是……
11011134.Subtitle: During the attack by that giant Filthoid. I didn't mean to hide it from you, but...

11011135.Content: ……好好休息。听老师的话，去休整点吧。
11011135.Subtitle: ...You need a break. Listen to Sir Avar and go to the processing area.

11011136.Subtitle: I'll go see you when we're back in the capital.

11011137.Content: 嗯。长官都那么说了，我也没有别的选择。但是，我总担心……
11011137.Subtitle: Okay. After what Commander Avar said, I guess I don't have a choice. But I'm still worried...

11011138.Content: 算了，没关系，有他在，应该不会有问题的。
11011138.Subtitle: Forget it. Now that he's here, there shouldn't be any problems.

11011201.Content: 他们改装了所有机关……同盟中也有了不得的工程师吗？
11011201.Subtitle: Since they've reworked the mechanisms, does that mean there are some elite engineers in The Forsakens?

11011202.Content: 当然。早就和上头的老顽固说过，别把神弃者同盟当“野蛮人”。
11011202.Subtitle: Of course. I've repeatedly warned the bigoted higher-ups not to take The Forsakens as mere illiterate barbarians.

11011203.Content: 要是同盟是野蛮人，那帝国让人家占了大半年要塞，岂不是还不如野蛮人？
11011203.Subtitle: They have controlled the fortress for over six months. If they are barbarians, what does that make us?

11011205.Content: 论“指挥的艺术”，没人比富尔维斯在行。
11011205.Subtitle: Well, no one grasps the "Art of Command" better than Fulvis after all.

11011206.Content: 让大艺术家自己去军团长办公室解释吧！看他那副伶牙俐齿还能不能哄得西比尔赦免他。
11011206.Subtitle: Let the great commander explain himself to the Chief! And let's see if his silver tongue can charm Sibylle into letting him off the hook this time.

11011301.Content: 先停下来整理一下现在的情况吧。
11011301.Subtitle: Let's sort through the situation here first.

11011302.Content: 作战计划书上写的是，本次行动总指挥官富尔维斯上校率领人数较多的“一角鲸”部队，在通向龙莎要塞的大桥发起佯攻，以吸引神弃者同盟的关注。
11011302.Subtitle: Our battle plan involved Colonel Fulvis and his numerically superior Squad, the Narwhals, launching a diversionary attack on the bridge leading to Lonza Fortress to distract The Forsakens.

11011303.Content: 而我们“雪狼”、“狮鹫”两支小队则从要塞上方空降，兵分两路潜入，分别沿动力室一线和武器库一线快速突袭，直接拿下要塞中枢——中央控制室。
11011303.Subtitle: Meanwhile, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins would parachute right on top of the fortress. Our two squads would infiltrate the fortress via the engine room and the arsenal, then launch a direct strike and seize the central control room.

11011305.Content: 同盟预判了我们的行动。
11011305.Subtitle: The Forsakens predicted our moves.

11011306.Content: 嗯。可能是我们的通讯被截获了，也可能是军团内部混进来了神弃者同盟的间谍……
11011306.Subtitle: Yes. Either they have intercepted our communications, or there is a spy working for The Forsakens in the Legion.

11011307.Content: 先不管到底是怎么泄露出去的，同盟的准备可做得真足。
11011307.Subtitle: Regardless of how our plans got out, The Forsakens were undoubtedly well-prepared.

11011308.Content: 用要塞防御机关设伏也就算了，偏偏还引来一群秽兽……我们轻装突进，没携带针对大型秽兽的武器，大伙只能拿命硬搏。
11011308.Subtitle: They used the fortress's defense systems to ambush us, and even lured a bunch of Filthoids here... We planned for an infiltration strike, so none of us were equipped with heavy weapons for large beasts. The only option was to throw our lives at it.

11011309.Content: 既然龙莎要塞是帝国工程师设计的，您应该可以破解那些机关吧？
11011309.Subtitle: Given that Lonza Fortress was designed by Imperial engineers, you might know how to disable its defense systems, right?

11011310.Content: 怎么小鬼，军事学院那些日子，密码学没好好上？
11011310.Subtitle: You literally slept through your cryptography courses, didn't you?

11011311.Subtitle: I cannot believe you're still sore about that, sir.

11011312.Content: 算了算了，这次的情况就算你擅长解码也没用。全要塞的机关都被同盟改装过了，根本没时间挨个破解完。
11011312.Subtitle: Never mind. Acing those courses wouldn't be much help in this case anyway. The Forsakens have modified the mechanisms in the fortress. We don't have time to go through each hardpoint and crack every code.

11011313.Content: 不过，“先解决机关”的判断是正确的，我们接下来要去的就是<H>动力室</>。
11011313.Subtitle: But disabling the systems first would be the right call, so we should reach the engine room next.

11011314.Content: 破坏<H>月髓舱</>以切断动力，强行关停机关后，救援其他受困士兵——这就是接下来的作战目标。
11011314.Subtitle: Cutting their power will shut down the systems, giving us the time to rescue our trapped soldiers. That's our main objective in the next move.

11011315.Content: 那边的装置至少需要两个人协力，亏得我先把你捞出来了。
11011315.Subtitle: Operating the devices there requires two people. Thank god I took you with me.

11011316.Subtitle: Hold on, we're getting a call...

11011317.Content: 喂？喂喂？听到了吗？<H>海伯利亚今日天气怎么样？</>
11011317.Subtitle: Hello? Does anyone copy? What's the weather like in Hyperborea today?

11011319.Content: 阿瓦尔长官？是您吗？我是维克！
11011319.Subtitle: Commander Avar? Is that you? I'm Vic!

11011320.Subtitle: Avar listening. Give me a report.

11011321.Content: 与您分开后，我和莫妮卡选择了外环路线，现在已经抵达动力室附近。
11011321.Subtitle: After we split our forces, Monica and I took the path along the outer perimeter. We're about to reach the engine room.

11011322.Content: 动力室？你们莫非也打算——
11011322.Subtitle: Engine room? Are you trying to—

11011323.Content: 我是来特地向您报告的，我们接下来会尝试关闭动力装置。
11011323.Subtitle: I'm calling you specifically to give you an update, sir. We'll make an attempt to shut down the power unit.

11011324.Content: 先别急，动力室很可能有陷阱。你们两个原地待命，我们再有十几分钟就能赶过去帮你们了。
11011324.Subtitle: The engine room is probably full of traps. Cease your actions and stay where you are. Captain  and I will get to your place in about fifteen minutes.

11011325.Content: 先让我们试试吧，长官！多耽误一分钟，其他人就多一分钟危险。
11011325.Subtitle: Please, let us try, sir! Every moment we delay puts our comrades in greater danger.

11011327.Content: 还有最后一件事……既然{nickname2}在您那的话，能不能告诉我“狮鹫”分队的情况怎么样？我弟弟西蒙他……
11011327.Subtitle: And one more thing... Since Captain  is with you, may I ask how the Griffins are doing? My brother Simon is in that squad...

11011329.Content: 我目前没有发现他的尸体。
11011329.Subtitle: We have yet to secure his body.

11011331.Content: 咳，没事，没事。他受了些伤，在休整点躺着。医务员看着呢，别担心。
11011331.Subtitle: Ahem, he means Simon's got some injuries, but the medic is taking care of him in a temporary shelter. There's no need to worry about him.

11011333.Content: 你那张嘴，以后还是别安慰人了，千万别。
11011333.Subtitle: Your way with words... Take my advice, never try to comfort anyone. Okay?

11011402.Content: 维克在下面，他想关停月髓舱，却被锁在了一扇门后面……这里的操作台被重新加密过了，我再想想办法……
11011402.Subtitle: Vic is down there. He was trying to shut down the Phoxichor tank, but he got locked behind a door... They've re-encrypted the control panel... I gotta figure out something else...

11011407.Content: 你别出事！马上就解开了……马上……
11011407.Subtitle: Hang in there! I'm nearly finished... Almost there...

11011409.Subtitle: ...It just won't crack...! Ugh! Of all times...!

11011411.Content: 我来处理上锁的门。{nickname2}，你去下面协助我关停动力装置，营救维克。
11011411.Subtitle: I'll take care of the door. , get down there, and help me shut down the device to save Vic.

11011412.Content: 听我指示行动。我们的动作越快，战友活下来的几率就越高。明白吗？
11011412.Subtitle: Follow my lead. The quicker we are, the higher our chances of saving our comrade. Understood?

11011413.Content: 我找到维克了……只有遗体。
11011413.Subtitle: I found Vic... Vic's body.

11011416.Content: 除了独立供能的中央控制室，整座要塞运转需要的月髓液都在这里。
11011416.Subtitle: Besides the independently powered central control room, this place stores all the Phoxichor that powers the whole fortress.

11011417.Content: 破坏这里的动力装置，要塞中的大部分机关就会停止运转。
11011417.Subtitle: If we destroy the power unit here, we'll disable most of the facilities in the fortress.

11011418.Content: 我们必须让那些机关瘫痪掉……维克不能白白牺牲。
11011418.Subtitle: We must shut down the systems... We can't let Vic die in vain.

11011419.Content: 哦？已经处理好一个了吗，小心些，我好像听到秽兽靠过来的声音了。

11011420.Content: 好，{nickname2}，动力链接已经断开了，我们得趁现在去把整个动力装置都毁了。

11011421.Content: 核心的动力炉就在下面，小心些……

11011422.Content: 有些脏东西围过来了……事办妥了再上来集合！

11011424.Content: 我会逐个解锁防护屏障，等信号亮起，你就把月髓舱打碎！
11011424.Subtitle: I'll disable the protective barriers one by one. When the signal light's on, smash the Phoxichor tank as fast as you can!

11011425.Content: 有些月髓舱可能会配备自毁装置，如果听到倒计时响起，就终止行动，马上离开。
11011425.Subtitle: Some Phoxichor tanks may be equipped with self-destruct devices; if you hear a timer, evacuate immediately.

11011427.Content: 干得不错，我们还有两个要处理。
11011427.Subtitle: Excellent work. We got two more tanks to go.

11011428.Content: 2号月髓舱的屏障解锁了，上吧！
11011428.Subtitle: The 2nd one has been disabled. Now!

11011429.Content: 呼……还有最后一个，你那儿还行吗？
11011429.Subtitle: Whew... One more left. You okay down there?

11011431.Content: 抓紧时间打碎那玩意儿，快从那儿离开！

11011432.Subtitle: Alright, this is the last one!

11011434.Subtitle: The engine room is about to explode. Evacuate now!

11011501.Content: 辛苦你了，小鬼——不愧是你们那届最优秀的学生。
11011501.Subtitle: Fantastic job, kid — you are indeed the best among your peers.

11011503.Content: 好，要塞内大部分的自卫武器都被关停了，其他小队应该会好过些。
11011503.Subtitle: Okay, most of the defensive weapons within the fortress have been disabled. The rest of our squads should have an easier time.

11011504.Content: 你还行吗？能走的话就出发，救援其他人——等下，新的联络。
11011504.Subtitle: So can you continue? Let's go if you can, we've got other comrades to rescue— Hold on, new communication coming in.

11011509.Content: 怎么？连总指挥官的声音都听不出了？
11011509.Subtitle: What's your problem? Can't even recognise the chief commander's voice?

11011511.Content: 今夜有雨。啧，美术馆里的大理石雕都没你脑筋硬。说吧，你们队什么情况了？
11011511.Subtitle: It's raining tonight. Tsk, I've seen marble sculptures in the gallery with more flexibility than your mind. Now, report on your squad.

11011512.Content: 多亏您聪慧的决断，“雪狼”和“狮鹫”两支先遣队还不算全军覆没。怎么，您又有了新的洞见？
11011512.Subtitle: Thanks to your "brilliant" decision-making, the Snow Wolves and the Griffins haven't been completely annihilated yet. What, got any new insight?

11011513.Content: 收起你阴阳怪气的态度。这场仗打成这样，你早该为此感到耻辱。
11011513.Subtitle: Enough with your snide attitude. You should be ashamed of how this battle has turned out.

11011514.Content: 我倒是想光荣，只是如果您的保密工作和行动计划能稍微可靠那么一点点，士兵们此刻会在中央控制室开庆功会，而不是一个个躺在冷冰冰的钢板上。
11011514.Subtitle: I would like to achieve glory, sir. If you exercised proper secrecy and came up with a more credible plan, our soldiers would be popping champagne bottles in the central control room at this very moment instead of waiting for body bags.

11011515.Content: 阿瓦尔·赫德兰，我再次警告你——注意你报告的口气。
11011515.Subtitle: Avar Hrodland, I'm warning you — Watch your tone when speaking to your superior!

11011516.Content: 安东尼·富尔维斯，我也警告你，别再拿我的士兵开玩笑。
11011516.Subtitle: Antonius Fulvis, I'm also warning you — Stop wasting the lives of my comrades.

11011517.Content: 我没空和你闲聊。我是问你，攻坚任务怎么样了。
11011517.Subtitle: I have no time for this right now. I am here to demand a progress update on the mission.

11011518.Content: 两支先遣队遭遇伏击，损失惨重。我准备先搜救失联的士兵，在加工区临时休整，等你支援。
11011518.Subtitle: The two squads have been ambushed and suffered heavy losses. I'm preparing to search and rescue the missing soldiers first, then regroup in the processing area, waiting for your support.

11011519.Content: 你们的任务是迅速突击，不许擅自中止行动。
11011519.Subtitle: Your mission is a rapid infiltration assault. No field officer of mine is permitted to make their own bloody choices.

11011520.Content: 偏离原有行动路线只会让你惊动全要塞的敌人，我命令你，继续沿原定路线向中央控制室进攻。
11011520.Subtitle: Straying off the planned course of action will only alert the entire fortress. I order you to stick to the plan and launch a direct assault on the central control room.

11011521.Content: 你看看你在说什么，怕惊动敌人？敌人早就埋伏好了，就等着全歼我们！八成！八成以上的损失还不够吗？
11011521.Subtitle: Are you even listening to yourself? Alert the fortress? They're already in ambush positions, waiting to wipe us all out! We've sustained eighty percent casualties — eight zero! Isn't that enough for you!?

11011522.Content: 损失、损失、损失！别再和我提那见鬼的损失。你知不知道，你们的进度已经延误了？
11011522.Subtitle: Casualties? Forget about your bloody casualties. All I know is that you're significantly behind schedule!

11011523.Content: 你们令军团的旗帜蒙羞——海伯利亚的军人，可不是因为一丁点损失就停步不前的懦夫！
11011523.Subtitle: You've brought shame to the legion's banner — the soldiers of Hyperborea are not cowards who would stop because of trivial losses like this!

11011524.Content: 从伟大的迪斯一世陛下到“‘神之挽歌’攻势”的昆图斯军团长，我们海伯利亚哪个伟大的统帅怕过损失？
11011524.Subtitle: From Emperor Dis I to Legion Chief Quintus, the mastermind of the Divine Elegy offensive, no Hyperborean commander ever baulked at taking losses.

11011525.Content: 你带的可是十三军团的精锐，攻下这小小的要塞还不是绰绰有余。
11011525.Subtitle: I gave you the elites of the 13th Legion. You should have more than enough resources to take this puny fort.

11011528.Content: 继续任务可以，给我们支援。
11011528.Subtitle: We can continue the mission, but only with additional support.

11011529.Content: 给我们足够的支援，我们才有希望取胜，这也是属于您的胜利。
11011529.Subtitle: Receiving enough support gives us a better chance of victory. A victory in your name, sir.

11011530.Content: 富尔维斯指挥官，如果我们全都死在这里，以你的战术素养，只怕是更拿不下这座要塞。到时候，你就要为战役的失利负责。
11011530.Subtitle: Commander Fulvis, if we all fall here, your tactical acumen alone won't stand a chance to take this fortress. And you'll surely have to answer for such a failure.

11011531.Content: 我们是你荣辱与共的下属，不是你的敌人。
11011531.Subtitle: We are your soldiers who fight for the glory of the Empire, not your enemies.

11011532.Content: 这又是哪个？哦，阿瓦尔那个好学生，“狮鹫”分队的队长{nickname2}？
11011532.Subtitle: And who is this? Oh, it's you, , Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?

11011533.Content: 你那么勇敢，怎么不自己来前线？
11011533.Subtitle: Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?

11011534.Content: 这又是哪个？哦，阿瓦尔那个好学生，“狮鹫”分队的队长{nickname2}？
11011534.Subtitle: And who is this? Oh, it's you, , Avar's favourite protege and the Captain of the Griffins, I presume?

11011535.Content: 你们先不用那么着急，作战会议已经开完了，“一角鲸”分队的支援就在路上，我也会和他们一起亲临前线。
11011535.Subtitle: What's the hurry? We have concluded our tactical meeting. Reinforcements from the Narwhals are on their way, and I'll be gracing the front with them.

11011536.Content: 继续按原计划前进，明白了吗？海伯利亚的军人，但凡一息尚存，就给我去战斗到最后一刻。
11011536.Subtitle: Stick to the plan, you hear me? As Hyperborean soldiers, you fight until your last breath or face the consequences!

11011541.Content: 我是“狮鹫”分队的西蒙，队长，你在吗？
11011541.Subtitle: This is Simon from the Griffins. Do you copy, Captain?

11011542.Subtitle: Copy that. Simon, where are you?

11011543.Content: 轨道线一带有大片秽兽，大家被困在里面，请求支援！
11011543.Subtitle: We're trapped by a Filthoid horde along the rail track. If you have any forces to spare, we need an extraction!

11011546.Content: 我也收到了另一队士兵汇报位置的信号，就在刚结束富尔维斯通讯的时候。{nickname2}，你怎么打算？
11011546.Subtitle: I also picked up a signal from another squad reporting their position, right after Fulvis ended his call. , what are you gonna do?

11011547.Content: 我想先去救援士兵们，现在的情况，只靠我们没什么胜算。
11011547.Subtitle: I intend to get to the soldiers first. We don't stand a chance on our own.

11011548.Subtitle: You kiddo... I knew I was right about you.

11011549.Content: 我认为即使胜算不大，也应该执行总指挥官的命令。
11011549.Subtitle: Even though our chances are slim, we must adhere to the Chief Commander's orders.

11011550.Content: 富尔维斯傲慢又好大喜功，他高高在上地指挥你，靠的不过是富尔维斯家族在元老院中的世袭席位。
11011550.Subtitle: Fulvis is nothing but an arrogant and greedy bastard. His senatorial lineage is the only reason he's up there, barking orders at you.

11011551.Content: 士兵们在他眼里是汇报书里的一串数字，勋章上的一块铁，唯独不是活生生的人。
11011551.Subtitle: He sees soldiers as mere numbers in his reports, treating them as fodder for medals to pin on his uniform, not as living, breathing humans.

11011552.Content: 更何况，战场瞬息万变，他空对着一张地图又能知道什么？
11011552.Subtitle: Besides, battlefields are ever-changing. What true insight can he gain from just staring at a map?

11011553.Content: 去救你的战友，{nickname2}。富尔维斯事后问责起来，就说是我的命令。
11011553.Subtitle: Go rescue your comrades, . In case Fulvis seeks someone to blame later, consider this a direct order from me.

11011555.Content: 我和莫妮卡也出发去救援另一群士兵，他们被困在了4号炮台附近。
11011555.Subtitle: Monica and I will be on our way to rescue another team of soldiers trapped near Turret 4.

11011556.Content: ……我们刚刚解除了动力，炮台的自动防御应该停止了……或许可以考虑先攻下炮台……
11011556.Subtitle: We disabled most defensive weapons within the fortress. The turret's auto-defences should be offline now... We might be able to seize the Turret first.

11011557.Content: ……这样一来，我们还能用月髓炮轰开中心区的防御设施。
11011557.Subtitle: ...And once we do that, we can blow apart the defence system around the central area with the Phoxichor Cannon.

11011558.Content: 就这么办吧。如果你那边顺利，等下就到4号炮台来。
11011558.Subtitle: It's settled then. Meet me at Turret 4 once you've finished everything on your side.

11011604.Content: 快……轨道那儿……大家……被秽兽困住……快……去救……
11011604.Subtitle: Quick... the rail tracks... Everyone is trapped by the Filthoids there... Go save them...

11011605.Subtitle: And... be careful out there, Captain...

11011606.Subtitle: ...Ma... the Filthoids are feasting on my leg... It hurts so much...

11011610.Subtitle: Simon! Are you still with me?

11011614.Content: 你那么勇敢，怎么不自己来前线？
11011614.Subtitle: Since you're so full of courage, why don't you come to the front yourself?

11011619.Content: 这段音乐应该就是秽兽发狂的罪魁祸首了。

11011620.Content: 二号广播室应该就在附近……在救人前，也许可以先去关停广播。

11011706.Content: 喂？我是“狮鹫”分队医务员达芙涅·塞奥多尔。
11011706.Subtitle: Do you copy? I'm Daphne Theodore, the Medic of Squad Griffins.

11011707.Content: ……{nickname2}？是你吗？为什么不说话？你受伤了？
11011707.Subtitle: ...? Is that you? Why aren't you saying anything? Are you hurt?

11011708.Content: 你在哪儿？我马上申请赶过去……
11011708.Subtitle: Where are you!? I'll seek permission and come for you right away...

11011709.Content: 我……只是想听听你们的声音。我没事，你们还好吗？
11011709.Subtitle: I... I just need to hear the voices of my squad. I'm okay. How is everyone on your side?

11011710.Content: “雪狼”的残兵和我们会合了，我们这里暂时还算安稳。你那边呢？
11011710.Subtitle: The Snow Wolves have joined us. We're safe here for now. What about you?

11011711.Content: ……我……也很好。我继续执行任务了，再见。
11011711.Subtitle: ...I... I'm okay. I need to go, I should continue the mission.

11011712.Content: 请多保重……我们会在迪斯玛尼亚平安重逢。
11011712.Subtitle: Please be careful... I'll see you in Dismania.

11011802.Content: 啊，队长，我亲爱的队长！！终于找到你了！！我们的联络频段突然出现异常，这一路谁也联系不上，西蒙就跑出去求救了。
11011802.Subtitle: Oh, Captain! My dear Captain!! You finally came for us!! Something's gone wrong with our comm channels and we couldn't get in touch with nobody. Simon went out looking for help.

11011803.Content: 我刚就一直跟大家鼓劲儿，队长那么厉害心眼儿又好，肯定“唰”的一下就跑过来帮咱们了。
11011803.Subtitle: I was just trying to get everyone to keep it together — told them how good you are and how you're gonna come flying in and get everyone out of this mess.

11011804.Content: 队长，你是一个人来的？你看到西蒙了吗？
11011804.Subtitle: Captain, did you come alone? Did you see Simon?

11011806.Content: ……！！他是我们几个里最机灵的，怎么……
11011806.Subtitle: ...!! He... He's the smartest among us. How come...?

11011807.Content: 现在先别想他。先战斗下去，活下去。
11011807.Subtitle: Now is not the time to dwell on Simon. We need to focus on this battle and surviving.

11011809.Content: ……你说得对……他拼命跑出去求救，可不是为了让我们像废物一样在这里哭。
11011809.Subtitle: ...You're right... He didn't risk his life going out there to look for help so that we could end up here like crybabies.

11011810.Content: 准备好了就走吧，我中途遇到了阿瓦尔长官。我们计划在4号炮台处会合。
11011810.Subtitle: Get going once you're ready. I ran into Commander Avar on my way here. We plan to join them at Turret 4.

11011811.Content: 4号炮台？队长你确定吗？离这里还挺远的，路上不知道有多少秽兽。就咱几个，能行吗？
11011811.Subtitle: Turret 4? Are you sure about that, Captain? That's pretty far, and god knows how many Filthoids there are along the way. There aren't many of us... Can we make it?

11011812.Content: 你们还有一条路可以走……
11011812.Subtitle: There's actually another way...

11011815.Content: 同盟的人，路上抓到的俘虏。
11011815.Subtitle: The Forsakens. We captured them on the way.

11011816.Content: ……我的好兄弟被你们豢养的怪物害死了。既然你提醒，那就在你身上开几个洞，给他抵命吧。
11011816.Subtitle: ...Your pet Filthoids killed a close buddy of mine. Reminded me just now — I ought to carve a few holes in you to honour his memory.

11011818.Content: 俘虏要活着带回去，交由帝国监狱审问。
11011818.Subtitle: We should keep the captives alive. We need to take them back for interrogation in the Imperial Prison.

11011820.Content: 如果只有一个卡戎之民的性命才能平息您的愤怒，就对我开枪吧。但在此之前，恳请您听一下我的解释……
11011820.Subtitle: If sacrificing one Charon can quell your anger, then take me. But first, please, let me explain...

11011821.Subtitle: Come back, Katya! Don't be silly!

11011822.Content: 长官，我们虽然是卡戎之民，但我们不是神弃者同盟的成员。我们只是附近小镇再本分不过的普通人。
11011822.Subtitle: Sir, we may be Charons but we are not part of The Forsakens. We're just ordinary folk living in a town nearby.

11011823.Content: 神弃者同盟的人改造要塞要苦力，就派人到我们镇子，把我们强行绑过来。他们甚至不要人类，而是专挑我们卡戎之民……
11011823.Subtitle: The Forsakens grabbed us from our homes and forced us to help rebuild this fortress. They left the humans in peace and only took the Charons...

11011824.Content: 开什么玩笑——同盟对自己的同胞下手？
11011824.Subtitle: You can't be serious — The Forsakens are enslaving their own people?

11011825.Content: 没错，仅仅因为我们比人类力气更大，更不怕严寒暑热——也许在您的眼中我们是同类，但同盟从未把我们当过“同胞”。
11011825.Subtitle: Exactly. They exploit us because Charons are stronger and withstand extreme heat and cold better than humans. You may think we're the same as The Forsakens, but they've never accepted us as their own.

11011827.Content: 弗兰克爷爷是我的恩人。
11011827.Subtitle: Mr Frank saved my life.

11011828.Content: 几天前，我只是肚子痛歇息了一会儿，就被同盟的畜生毒打了几十鞭子。奄奄一息的时候，是爷爷给了我水和食物，还有这条破袍子。
11011828.Subtitle: Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.

11011829.Content: 如果不是他好心，我那个时候就已经断气了。所以，我愿意替他抵命——请对我开枪吧。但是爷爷他是真心想帮您的，因为我们同您一样无法原谅同盟的恶行。
11011829.Subtitle: I would have died if not for Mr Frank. So if you must shoot him, could you please shoot me instead? He just wants to help, because none of us can forgive what The Forsakens did to us.

11011830.Content: 地下水道四通八达，你们自己一定会迷路。爷爷经常被使唤去修理水阀，他对那边很熟悉。如果您放他一条生路，他就可以带你们去你们要去的地方。
11011830.Subtitle: The sewer tunnels are like a maze. You'd easily get lost without help. The Forsakens always get Mr Frank to fix the sewer valves, so he knows the place like the back of his hand. Let him live and he'll get you where you need to go.

11011831.Content: 行了。马尔科，放下枪——放下，这是命令。
11011831.Subtitle: Alright. Marco, lower your gun — Holster it, this is an order.

11011835.Content: 几天前，我只是肚子痛歇息了一会儿，就被同盟的畜生毒打了几十鞭子。奄奄一息的时候，是爷爷给了我水和食物，还有这条破袍子。
11011835.Subtitle: Just a few days ago, I had to take a break because my stomach was acting up, but those Forsaken rotters whipped me dozens of times and left me for dead. It was Mr Frank who gave me water, food, and this ragged robe to cover me up.

11011839.Content: 老人家，既然你对水道熟悉，那来带路吧。
11011839.Subtitle: I've heard you're familiar with these sewers. Please lead the way then.

11011840.Content: 你们几个盯紧他们，别让他们有小动作。发现任何异样，立即后撤。
11011840.Subtitle: Stay alert and keep a close watch on them. If anything seems amiss, we pull out immediately.

11011841.Content: 老实点！队长说过，不许动！
11011841.Subtitle: Behave! Captain's orders — no sudden moves or funny business, alright?

11011842.Content: 可是，不动的话……就没法为您指路了……
11011842.Subtitle: But if I'm not allowed to move, how am I supposed to lead the way...?

11011843.Subtitle: Right, you have a point there.

11011844.Content: 您无需这样戒备，普通的卡戎之民也是人，大家和您一样，都有妈妈，都想回去和她团聚。
11011844.Subtitle: There's no need to so on guard. We Charons are ordinary people too, with families we're desperate to see again.

11011847.Content: 不一定所有卡戎之民都是同盟那些反抗者——比如阿瓦尔长官也是卡戎之民。就算这几个人真的是同盟成员，活着的他们也比死了的他们更有价值。
11011847.Subtitle: Not all Charons are rebels from The Forsakens — Commander Avar is a Charon, remember? And even if they are, they'd be worth more to us alive.

11011848.Content: ……无论心里有什么声音在回响，都不要屈从它们。马尔科，不要让冲动凌驾在理智之上。
11011848.Subtitle: ...An inner voice might tell you otherwise, Marco, but don't listen to it. Don't let emotions cloud your judgment.

11011851.Content: 是的。您刚才没有当众搜我身。我很感激，身为帝国人的您，愿意留给一个陌生的卡戎女人一丝尊严。
11011851.Subtitle: Yes. You didn't let your man frisk me, and I really appreciate it — it's rare to see an Imperial officer respect the dignity of a Charon girl like me.

11011852.Content: 您会因为您的善良得到报答的。
11011852.Subtitle: Your kindness will reap a just reward.

11011901.Subtitle: ...What did you say!? The reinforcements are delayed!?

11011902.Content: “一角鲸”分队在大桥这边遇到些同盟的小花招，现在我们被耽搁在这儿了。
11011902.Subtitle: The Forsakens sabotaged the Narwhals at the bridge. Now we're stuck here.

11011903.Content: 你让我用这些残兵攻入中央控制室？我们这点人打对方的“信使”？富尔维斯，你做什么梦呢，对方可是“骸”！而且前面还不知道有多少埋伏！
11011903.Subtitle: You expect me to break into the central control room with just two battered squads and directly confront their Messenger? You can't be serious, Fulvis. The enemies are Daimons, and god knows how many more ambushes lie ahead!

11011904.Content: 他们是“骸”，你不也是吗？更何况，你那边不是还有一个堪比“骸”的{nickname2}？
11011904.Subtitle: So what if they are Daimons? You're one too! Besides, don't you have  on your side, who's as strong as any Daimon?

11011905.Content: 中央控制室就在前面，距离你们在的那个4号炮台只有不到五十米了。
11011905.Subtitle: The central control room is just right ahead. It's less than fifty yards away from the Turret you're at.

11011906.Content: 再前进这五十米，我们就可以将胜利献给陛下了！这有什么难？
11011906.Subtitle: Fifty yards further, and we can dedicate the victory to His Majesty! What's so hard about that?

11011908.Subtitle: ? How are things going on your side?

11011909.Content: 西蒙阵亡，其他几个救下来了。
11011909.Subtitle: Simon sacrificed himself. Thanks to him, I managed to save the rest.

11011910.Content: 我们还遇到了几个被同盟掳来的卡戎难民，是他们带我们来这儿的。
11011910.Subtitle: We also met a few Charon refugees enslaved by The Forsakens. They led us here.

11011911.Content: 难民？会不会是同盟的人假扮的？
11011911.Subtitle: Refugees? Not Forsakens rebels in disguise, I hope.

11011912.Content: 所以我让士兵们看好他们了。如果他们是平民，那么跟着我们比乱转更安全；如果他们是同盟的人，就刚好一并带回皇都。
11011912.Subtitle: That's why I asked the soldiers to keep an eye on them. If they are indeed civilians, they'd be safer with us. If they turn out to be from the Forsakens, we'll detain them and bring them back to the capital.

11011913.Content: 如果他们是敌人，那带上他们，埋伏在暗的同盟成员也会适当顾虑同伴的性命。嗯，你很周全。
11011913.Subtitle: In that case, the ambushing Forsakens may think twice about attacking for fear of harming their fellows. Mm, you made a smart decision.

11011914.Content: 至于这边……支援在路上出了些状况，上头的命令是，“任务继续”。
11011914.Subtitle: As for this side... Our reinforcements met a problem on the way here and can't make it... And we're ordered to continue the mission.

11011916.Content: ……往好处想，任务也到最后了。揍扁所有拦路的，想办法打开中央控制室的大门，把秘钥放进控制台，回收权限，一切就结束了。
11011916.Subtitle: ...Look on the bright side, the mission is almost done. Knock out everything that gets in the way, breach the central control room, insert the key, we reclaim access, and then mission accomplished. That's all that stands between us and home.

11011917.Content: ……所以当务之急是解决前面的屏障吧。用这门炮轰开如何？
11011917.Subtitle: ...So the first thing to do now is disable the barrier up ahead, right? How does this cannon work?

11011918.Content: 这门炮作为底火的月髓刚好用光了，我正准备——
11011918.Subtitle: The cannon just ran out of Phoxichor primers. I was about to—

11011920.Content: 听起来那位长官好像需要月髓，我知道最近放月髓的仓库在哪里。我可以带您去。
11011920.Subtitle: It sounds like you need Phoxichor. I know where the nearest storage is. I can take you there.

11011923.Content: ……已经带您平安抵达了这里，您还是不肯信任我吗。
11011923.Subtitle: ...You still don't trust me? Even after I brought you here safely?

11011924.Content: 抱歉，只是稍微有点……没事，我和您一起就是了。
11011924.Subtitle: ...Fine, I'll go with you.

11011926.Content: 长官，我来帮您拿着吧。没关系，我什么重活都干过，力气很大的。
11011926.Subtitle: Allow me to carry that for you, sir. I've done all kinds of heavy work and have great strength.

11011927.Subtitle: ...Er, sure you don't want my help...?

11011928.Content: 这些月髓液真好看，透明的，亮晶晶的。
11011928.Subtitle: The Phoxichor is beautiful, all clear and shimmering.

11011929.Content: 如果不是用来杀人的就好了。
11011929.Subtitle: If only it wasn't used for killing people.

11011932.Content: 长官，我们是不是很快就可以回家了？
11011932.Subtitle: Sir, does that mean we're going home soon?

11011934.Content: 如果能活着回去，我想去服装店，买好多好多以前不舍得买的衣服。
11011934.Subtitle: If I make it back alive, I'm going to a fashion boutique to buy all the dresses I've dreamed of.

11011935.Content: 如果能有一双漂亮的袜子就更好了。
11011935.Subtitle: And it would be nice to have a pair of pretty stockings, too.

11011936.Content: 不过麻烦的是，中央控制室的门没法从外侧打开……
11011936.Subtitle: The trouble is, though, we can't open the door to the central control room from the outside...

11011937.Subtitle: That's why you're adjusting this cannon now...

11011938.Content: 对。现在要塞的动力瘫痪了，得先想个办法把这门炮运过去。
11011938.Subtitle: Exactly. But the power to the entire fortress has been cut off, we need to get this thing there first.

11011939.Content: 长官，成功在附近仓库找到了罐装月髓液，已经按您的吩咐连接上剩下的髓动轮了。
11011939.Subtitle: Sir, we've found some Phoxichor Canisters at a nearby warehouse, and got them connected to the remaining Phoxynamo Wheels as you instructed.

11011940.Content: 好……应该足够支持把这门炮运到中央控制室附近了。
11011940.Subtitle: Excellent. That should be enough to move this cannon near the central control room.

11012001.Content: 干得好，出发吧。把炮台开到轰击中央控制室的最佳位置。
11012001.Subtitle: Well done. Now let's move the cannon to an optimal spot to bombard the central control room.

11012002.Content: 嗯，多亏了这两位难民的帮助。
11012002.Subtitle: Thanks to the help of these two refugees.

11012003.Content: 留意炮台，别让秽兽把它弄坏了。
11012003.Subtitle: Keep the cannon from the Filthoids.

11012004.Content: 我们找个轰击中心区屏障的最佳位置。你盯着点，别让秽兽把炮台弄坏了。
11012004.Subtitle: Let's find an optimal spot to bombard the barrier of the central area. Stay vigilant and protect the turret from the Filthoids.

11012101.Subtitle: We have a clear view from here. This is our stop.

11012102.Content: 接下来，我们就用这门月髓炮轰击前面的屏障。
11012102.Subtitle: Next, we'll use the Phoxichor cannon to blow apart the barrier ahead.

11012103.Content: 有秽兽被吸引过来了，直接开炮吧。
11012103.Subtitle: Some Filthoids picked up the scent. Just fire away.

11012105.Content: 连月髓炮都能抗住，工程炼金院那帮人的技术还真是有两下子……
11012105.Subtitle: Took a Phoxichor cannon shot with barely a dent. Those guys at the Aeolipile have some real skills...

11012106.Content: 不要停，继续轰击，记得换高爆弹。
11012106.Subtitle: Don't stop, keep firing! Use the high explosive shells!

11012107.Content: 就算轰不破这面屏障，我们也能让里面的家伙自己把门打开。
11012107.Subtitle: Even if we fail to tear down the barrier, continious fire can force the enemies from the inside to open the gate themselves.

11012108.Content: 有什么人从侧边跑出来了——是同盟的家伙！
11012108.Subtitle: Someone's running out from the side gate — it's the Forsakens!

11012109.Subtitle: That should do it. Let's go check it out.

11012110.Subtitle: Hey, quit fooling around. Get over here!

11012201.Content: 他们真的自己打开了门……
11012201.Subtitle: They've actually opened the gate from the inside...

11012202.Content: 留在里面受到的冲击更大，他们多半撑不住的。
11012202.Subtitle: The blast impact was far stronger inside. They would've perished had they not opened it.

11012203.Content: 我和{nickname2}走前面，其他人小心跟上！
11012203.Subtitle: Captain  and I are taking the lead. Everyone else, fall in behind us!

11012301.Content: 蹲下干什么？怎么不走了？
11012301.Subtitle: What's wrong? Why squatting down?

11012303.Content: 我亲爱的长官，别急，请让我稍微准备一下——
11012303.Subtitle: Easy, sir. I'm just doing some preparation—

11012401.Content: 你这疯女人！笑什么笑，你对队长恩将仇报，就一点都不忏悔吗？
11012401.Subtitle: You crazy girl! What are you laughing at? Is this how you repay the Captain's kindness? Don't you feel guilty at all?

11012402.Content: 忏悔……？哈，小弟弟，你是不是吃多了你们炼金院的药，脑子吃出毛病了啊？
11012402.Subtitle: Guilty...? Ha, have you had too many alchemical concoctions from your Academy that damaged your brain?

11012403.Content: 哦，有一件事确实要忏悔。刚才为了哄骗你那个笨笨的小长官，我把帝国对我们做的好事全都说成了同盟干的。唉，我对不起同盟的兄弟姐妹，忏悔忏悔！
11012403.Subtitle: Oh wait, I do feel guilty about one thing — to manipulate that stupid captain of yours, I lied about The Forsakens and blamed them for what the Empire did to us. I'm so sorry to The Forsakens!

11012405.Content: 瞧这是谁——哦，我最亲爱的长官大人！
11012405.Subtitle: Oh, look what the cat dragged in. Hello, dear sir.

11012407.Content: 找我干什么？向我展示海伯利亚军官老爷不计前嫌的大度？还是假惺惺地惋惜一下我这个“误入歧途”的可怜小姑娘，想要“拯救”我啊？
11012407.Subtitle: So what are you doing here? Come to show off the benevolence of a Hyperborean officer? Or perhaps you pity this poor girl who's been led "astray," trying to save me from my "sins"?

11012408.Content: 哦！我知道了，你一定是想加入神弃者同盟，让我帮忙介绍！
11012408.Subtitle: Oh, I get it! You want to join The Forsakens, right? Need a reference?

11012409.Content: 喂——你们听见了吗——这位军官大人想要加入神弃者同盟——
11012409.Subtitle: Hey — you guys hear that? Your captain wants to join The Forsakens!

11012410.Content: 不用喊了，没有人会理你的。
11012410.Subtitle: Save it. No one would give you any attention.

11012411.Content: 呜呜呜，这可真是太令人悲伤了，呜呜呜。
11012411.Subtitle: Oh, no. This is so sad. Boohoo whoo.

11012412.Content: 对，我想加入，所以你的联络人是谁？
11012412.Subtitle: Yeah, I'm interested. Who's your contact?

11012413.Content: 亲爱的，你套话的手段真烂。省省吧，别想着能从我嘴里得到什么情报。背叛战友，把情报卖给敌人的败类，只有你们军团才会有。
11012413.Subtitle: Oh honey, you really suck at this. Save it — you won't get anything from me. Lowlives who betray their comrades and sell intel to their enemy only exist in your beloved Legion.

11012414.Content: 你前面有那么多下手的机会，为什么挑现在？
11012414.Subtitle: You had many chances for an ambush. Why played the long game?

11012415.Content: 谁让你警惕心那么重呢？即使是独处的时候，我也挑不出什么机会下手。我只能慢慢等着，甚至多帮你几次，等你最终卸下戒备。
11012415.Subtitle: Because you're always so on guard. I couldn't find a chance, even while we were alone. I had to bide my time patiently. Even offered you help a couple of times to lower your guard.

11012416.Content: 而且，这样更好玩呀！被信任的人背叛，不是比被陌生人捅一刀好玩多了？
11012416.Subtitle: And it's more fun this way! Betrayal by a trusted friend is far more memorable than a stab from a stranger, isn't it?

11012417.Subtitle: (Give her a punch to shut her up)

11012418.Content: 好疼！！谁来管管啊！！有人在殴打手无寸铁的柔弱小姑娘啊！！
11012418.Subtitle: Oww, it hurts! Someone do something about this! An armed soldier's hitting a helpless young girl!

11012420.Content: 怎么了，眼睛瞪得像头牛？哦，抱歉，长官！我忘了，您还是比较喜欢我这样说话。
11012420.Subtitle: Aww, you look like an angry bull. I'm so sorry, sir! I forgot you like it better when I talk like this.

11012421.Content: ……行了。收起你无聊的表演，回答我一个问题。
11012421.Subtitle: ...Cut the act, and answer my question.

11012422.Content: 嗯嗯！长官你尽管问，当然，回不回答看我心情！
11012422.Subtitle: Sure! Ask away. I'll answer whenever I feel like it.

11012423.Content: 被你摆了这么一遭，总得告诉我是为什么吧？这是针对海伯利亚士兵的袭击，还是针对我个人的刺杀？
11012423.Subtitle: I deserve to know why you stabbed us in the back after I helped you. Is it out of plain hatred for the Hyperborean Legion, or an assassination attempt targeting me specifically?

11012424.Content: 这个啊……行，告诉你——看在你让我寻了个开心的份上，就当做额外奖励吧。
11012424.Subtitle: If this is your question... Sure, I can answer that — given that you've been naive enough to fall for my trick.

11012425.Content: 同盟就是想要海伯利亚的走狗们都死在这里，而且最好是死在自己造出来的杀人机器里——喜欢吗？我们准备的大礼？
11012425.Subtitle: The Forsakens simply want all Hyperborean dogs to die here, and preferably at the hands of the killing machines they created — I hope you enjoyed our fiery gift.

11012426.Content: 至于我本人……我呀，当然是为了<H>你</>而来的！
11012426.Subtitle: As for me... Well, I personally came for you!

11012427.Content: 听闻皇家军事学院去年最优秀的毕业生，人称“苍白死神”的你也来到了龙莎要塞，我怎么能忍心不来见一见呢？是吧，亲爱的？
11012427.Subtitle: I heard that you, the top graduate of the Imperial Military College, who is also known as the "Pale Reaper," were coming to Lonza Fortress. How could I not come have a good look at the Pale Reaper myself?

11012428.Content: 你以前认识我？我们有过过节？
11012428.Subtitle: You've heard about me? Have we met before?

11012429.Subtitle: Hehe, that's for you to guess.

11012430.Content: 我都听线人说啦，我们伟大的苍白死神{性别2：先生|女士}只有寥寥几年的记忆。你一丁点也不了解你的过去，连自己到底是从哪里冒出来的都不知道。
11012430.Subtitle: My sources said that our great {性别2:Mr|Miss} Pale Reaper only has a few years' worth of memories. You know nothing of your past. You don't even know where you came from.

11012432.Content: 那我们来玩个游戏吧！你来猜——猜猜我到底是你隔壁邻居呢，是你的老仇家呢，还是说——
11012432.Subtitle: Let's play a game then! Now, honey, take a guess — was I your neighbour, an old nemesis—

11012433.Content: 还是说，我根本不认识你，海伯利亚喜欢你，我就讨厌你，海伯利亚人拥护你，我就要干掉你？
11012433.Subtitle: Or a complete stranger? Maybe I just hate you for being one of Hyperborea's honorable people, and I simply wish to destroy that which they cherish?

11012435.Content: <W>你的头很痛，对吗？你听，这个疯女人的喋喋不休的话语就像一群嗜血的蚂蟥，啃噬你的颅骨，吸吮你的脑汁。</>
11012435.Subtitle: Your head hurts, right? The jabbering of this mad girl is worming through your skull like a leech sucking at your brains.

11012436.Content: <W>看，你手里有一把剑——没错，你惯用的那一把。它的剑柄上还残留着你的体温，你是如此熟悉利刃切开血肉那一刻，那不易察觉的细弱迟滞感。</>
11012436.Subtitle: See, you have a sword in your hand. That's right — it's the one you've wielded in countless battles. The hilt still carries your warmth. You're familiar with the slick feeling and the subtle tug of resistance when its blade slices through flesh.

11012437.Content: <W>你可以轻松地割破它的咽喉，让那张令人生厌的嘴只能发出痛苦的哀鸣。</>
11012437.Subtitle: You can easily slit this creature's throat and make its detestable lips gurgle and whimper in pain.

11012438.Content: （又是……这个声音！为什么这个时候……）
11012438.Subtitle: (It's... that voice again! Why now...?)

11012440.Content: （循着声音的指引，把手伸向剑。）
11012440.Subtitle: (Follow the voice and reach for the sword)

11012441.Content: 你怎么不说话？刚才不是还装模作样地教训我吗，哑巴啦？
11012441.Subtitle: Why suddenly so quiet? You seemed ready to lecture me. Cat got your tongue, honey?

11012442.Content: <W>我是你最古老的灵魂，是你内心深处的冲动。不要拒绝我——看，正是我给了力量，令你在战斗中所向披靡。</>
11012442.Subtitle: I am the origin of your soul, the impulse within the deepest recesses of your mind. Do not refuse me... Listen — I am the one who gave you power and made you invincible in battle.

11012443.Content: <W>拔出你的剑吧。那把锋利的剑。</>
11012443.Subtitle: Unsheathe your sword, the one that bears the killing razor.

11012445.Content: （循着声音的指引，尝试拔出剑。）
11012445.Subtitle: (Follow the voice and try to draw the sword)

11012446.Content: 快猜呀——猜呀猜呀！当然，就算猜出来，我也不会告诉你的！
11012446.Subtitle: Go on, make your guess — any guess would do, because I won't tell you the truth anyway!

11012447.Content: <W>不要再犹豫了！快用你的剑！它在呼唤着你，它在等待着血肉赐予的甜蜜与欢愉！</>
11012447.Subtitle: Do not hesitate! Use your sword! It's calling to you! It thirsts for the sweet joy that can only be sated by flesh and blood.

11012448.Subtitle: Quick! Silence this mad lass for good!

11012450.Subtitle: (Follow the voice and wield the sword)

11012452.Subtitle: ...Okay, looks like somebody needs anger management here.

11012453.Content: ……莱昂，看好她。把她完好无损地带回去，别让她自尽。必要的话，用弗兰克的命来威胁。
11012453.Subtitle: ...Leon, keep a close watch on her. Bring her back in one piece, and make sure she doesn't harm herself. Use Frank as leverage if necessary.

11012456.Content: 你还记得，在去炮台的路上，我对你说过的吗？“你会因为自己的善良得到报答”。
11012456.Subtitle: Remember what I said back on our way to the turret? "Your kindness will reap a just reward."

11012457.Content: 耳朵凑过来。我还有句悄悄话，只对你一个人讲——放心吧，刚才你们搜过我身了，这次真的什么凶器都没藏啦。
11012457.Subtitle: Lend me your ear. I've got a secret that's just for you. Rest assured, you've just frisked me. I am really out of weapons.

11012458.Content: 这句话可能对你很重要哦，确定不听？
11012458.Subtitle: It may be extremely important to you. You sure you don't want to hear it?

11012461.Content: 嘻嘻，好的，好的。祝愿你不会为你的选择后悔。
11012461.Subtitle: Hehe, fine. I hope you won't regret your choice.

11012463.Content: <W>还有人想要你的命，那家伙就藏在你们军团的人之中。</>
11012463.Subtitle: Someone in your Legion wants you dead.

11012465.Content: 我说了，悄悄话只有一句。呵呵……一路顺风，我的长官。
11012465.Subtitle: Secrets are meant to be whispered once. Take care, sir.

11012466.Content: 亲爱的，你回来了？该不会是突然反悔，想听悄悄话了？
11012466.Subtitle: You're back, honey. Changed your mind already? Desperate to hear out the secret?

11012467.Content: 但是很遗憾，我现在心情不太好，不想说了。
11012467.Subtitle: Sorry to disappoint, but I'm no longer in the mood for sharing.

11012468.Content: 亲爱的，我知道你想问什么。
11012468.Subtitle: I know what you want, honey.

11012469.Content: 但是很遗憾，我这个可怜的阶下囚，现在已经没心情说话了~
11012469.Subtitle: But I'm just a poor little captive now, not in the mood to talk.

11012501.Content: <W>没错，就是这样……把剑柄握得紧紧的。是的，你做得很好。你只需要对准它的喉咙——</>
11012501.Subtitle: That's right — you've made the right choice. Grip the hilt tightly. Yes, just like that. Now aim at the creature's throat...

11012503.Subtitle: Yes, do it. Do not hesitate.

11012506.Content: <W>这个人也一起。它是你无用的羁绊。</>
11012506.Subtitle: This one too. The old fool is just dead weight.

11012509.Content: <W>对！抛去那无意义的理性吧，遵从我的指引……</>
11012509.Subtitle: That's right! Forget about meaningless reason. Just follow my lead...

11012510.Content: 队长！住手！你要干什么！队长！队长疯了，你别过来——
11012510.Subtitle: Captain! Commander Avar! The Captain's gone mad! Stay away from me! Help! STOP! NOOOO!

11012602.Content: 不，并非全然的寂静。只是所有嘈杂的声音，正顺着我的双手缓缓流淌，滴答、滴答。
11012602.Subtitle: No, not dead silent. It's just that every noise had coalesced into a warmth flowing down my arms, dripping to the floor.

11012603.Content: 这是时间流泻的沙沙声。是生命的嘶吼声。是胚胎在羊水里的心跳声。是封存于我心中的古老回声。
11012603.Subtitle: It was the sound of passing time, the roar of life that once was, the heartbeat of an embryo, and an ancient echo sealed deeply within my heart.

11012604.Content: 我想，我已与这亘古的声音交融。
11012604.Subtitle: I felt as though I had become one with this primal voice.

11012608.Content: 喂，你突然鬼叫什么，吓人一跳！
11012608.Subtitle: What's gotten into you? You scared me!

11012701.Content: 看来富尔维斯的援军短时间内是等不来了。
11012701.Subtitle: I doubt Fulvis will bring reinforcements anytime soon.

11012702.Content: 最终目标中央控制室就在前面了。要继续前进吗？同盟的“信使”大概就在里面……
11012702.Subtitle: The central control room is just ahead. Should we push forward? The Messenger of The Forsakens might be inside...

11012703.Content: 而她这样的埋伏，前面不知道还有多少。
11012703.Subtitle: I'm not sure how many assassins like her are waiting for us.

11012704.Content: 嗯，可能会死。你，或者我，或者我们全部。
11012704.Subtitle: Yes, death is a real possibility — for you, me, and probably all of us.

11012706.Content: 十三军团剩下的士兵们，前面是中央控制室，龙莎要塞的中枢，这次任务的最终目标……也是建立功勋，将荣耀献给海伯利亚的机会。
11012706.Subtitle: Soldiers of the 13th Legion! Before us lies the central control room of Lonza Fortress, the ultimate goal of this mission. This is our chance to claim glory for Hyperborea.

11012707.Content: 但是很抱歉，我不会把最大的功劳让给你们。
11012707.Subtitle: However, I must apologize, as I won't be giving you the lion's share of this victory.

11012709.Content: 这次行动到现在，我们功劳与危险并存，而且危险总是更多一些。
11012709.Subtitle: With glory comes great danger, and this action is more dangerous than ever.

11012710.Content: 你们还年轻，未来的路很长，也会有很多很多沐浴荣光的机会。所以，这功劳可不能让你们抢走。还是让我一个人去，再添一枚勋章吧。
11012710.Subtitle: You're young, with many years ahead. There will be other opportunities for glory. But today, the old man here will seek one more medal, and he isn't keen on sharing it with any of you.

11012711.Content: 你们据守炮台，如果我失联，就继续炮击中央控制室，切勿冒进，继续等待后续支援。
11012711.Subtitle: Stay at your posts by the turret. If you lose contact with me, continue to shell the control room from a distance and wait for reinforcements. Do not assault it directly.

11012712.Content: 长官，您一个人办不到的……这不是您的本意。
11012712.Subtitle: Commander Avar, you can't do this alone... I know you didn't mean what you just said.

11012713.Content: 什么本意不本意的，这是命令。
11012713.Subtitle: What are you talking about? I just simply gave you orders.

11012715.Content: 我知道你们担心什么，但这种场面我见得多了。长官耍着帅，一副好像这次真的要死了的样子，那时候我也像你们这样垂着眼泪，一副没出息的样子。
11012715.Subtitle: I understand your concerns, but I've been through a lot things like this. I was once like you, young and tearful, thinking my commanding officer had a death wish.

11012716.Content: 但长官最后还是好好地回来了。所以说，别担心。想想你们的母亲，她正在壁炉边一边织毛衣，一边等你们回家。
11012716.Subtitle: But he always returned safely. So I'm telling you that there's no need to worry. Think of your mother, probably by the fireplace knitting a sweater, waiting for you to come home.

11012717.Content: 长官，我总受你照顾，刚刚你还救了我一命。就算我妈妈在这里，她也会说，“跟上你的长官，不要惧怕死亡。你是海伯利亚的战士，当以生命守卫帝国的一切。”
11012717.Subtitle: Commander Avar, you've always looked out for me, and you just saved my life. Even if my mother were here, she would say, "Follow your officer, do not fear death. You're a Hyperborean warrior and you're supposed to defend the Empire with your life."

11012718.Content: 没有人怕死，我怕的是——毫无意义的死。
11012718.Subtitle: It's not about fearing death. I just don't want any lives lost in vain.

11012719.Content: 不会毫无意义的。只要我们前进一步，战线就向前推进了一步。
11012719.Subtitle: It won't be in vain. Every step we take pushes the frontline forward.

11012720.Content: 更何况，既然前面对我们来说是“未知”的，那便意味着——“生还”也是一种可能。
11012720.Subtitle: And since we don't know what lies before us, it means that survival is also a possibility.

11012721.Content: 我是“狮鹫”小队的成员，我听{nickname2}队长的。
11012721.Subtitle: I'm a Griffin and I stand with Captain .

11012722.Content: 我这次听清了！我也听{nickname2}队长的！
11012722.Subtitle: Yeah! I heard that loud and clear this time! I stand with Captain !

11012724.Content: ……如果有{nickname2}，以{性别2：他|她}刚才的实力，的确……胜利并非没有希望。
11012724.Subtitle: ...Well, since we have , maybe {性别2:he|she} does have what it takes to lead us to victory.

11012725.Content: 嗯。准备好，我们就出发吧。
11012725.Subtitle: Alright, prepare yourselves. We set off together.

11012726.Content: 嗬，还学会和你的长官抢话了。
11012726.Subtitle: Heh, you've even learned how to take over your commander's speech.

11012727.Content: 或者我们也可以等一下再出发，先撬开这女人的嘴——
11012727.Subtitle: Maybe we could wait for a while to gather more intel from this lass first—

11012728.Subtitle: Oh? Are you going to interrogate me?

11012729.Content: 不。我们见识过这小姑娘的精明狡猾，她提供的情报只会干扰我们的判断。
11012729.Subtitle: No. I've seen how crafty this girl is. Her "intel" will only mess with our judgment.

11012730.Content: 这样吧，我们分两队行动。我和{nickname2}先行侦查，其他人做好准备，收到进攻信号马上进发，收到后退信号就退守4号炮台。莱昂留下看守犯人。
11012730.Subtitle: Here's the plan: we split into two groups.  and I will scout ahead. The rest prepare and initiate the assault upon our signal. If we call it off, retreat to Turret 4. Leon, you stay back and guard the captives.

11012732.Content: 走吧，不知道神弃者同盟还准备了什么惊喜等着我们。
11012732.Subtitle: Let's move, and see what surprises The Forsakens have prepared for us.

11012802.Content: 小伤而已，歇歇就行。别看那小姑娘虚张声势，其实力气跟路边野猫似的，让她拿枪都怕砸了脚……
11012802.Subtitle: Just a scratch; it'll heal soon. That little girl was just bluffing. Even a stray cat would've put up a better fight.

11012803.Content: 哎，去哪儿了，我记得是放这里了来着……
11012803.Subtitle: Ugh, where did it go? I thought I had it right here...

11012805.Content: 没什么，就是一张照片。你快去审审那个女人吧，她好像是冲着你来的。
11012805.Subtitle: Just a mere photo. Why don't you go interrogate that girl? She seems to be after you.

11012806.Subtitle: (A photo? Maybe I should have a look around for it when I can.)

11012808.Subtitle: Hmm? What's that on the floor...?

11012809.Content: 这是，年轻时的老师和……达芙涅？
11012809.Subtitle: It's a younger Sir Avar with… Daphne?

11012810.Content: 把照片交还给阿瓦尔老师吧。
11012810.Subtitle: I should take it back to Sir Avar.

11012811.Content: 对了，我刚才捡到了这个……
11012811.Subtitle: Sir, I found this...

11012812.Content: 哦！居然给你捡到了，谢啦。
11012812.Subtitle: Oh, you found it! Thanks for bringing it back.

11012814.Content: 啊，哦，她是从前邻居家的小姑娘啊，哈哈……
11012814.Subtitle: Oh, ah... She is just my neighbour's little girl. Haha...

11012815.Content: ……算了，不瞒你了。达芙涅是我女儿，你没猜错。
11012815.Subtitle: ...I suppose it's time for the truth — You're right. Daphne is my daughter.

11012816.Content: 说起来还挺不好意思的，这是我跟那孩子一起拍的最后一张照片……那之后没多久，她母亲就带着她离开了。“塞奥多尔”这个姓氏，是她母亲的。
11012816.Subtitle: This is the last photo we took together before she and her mother left. Daphne took the last name "Theodore" from her mother.

11012817.Content: 不过这件事你别说出去啊，我们就是为了不让人知道达芙涅是我女儿，才离婚的。
11012817.Subtitle: Don't tell anyone about this. We divorced specifically to keep people from knowing that Daphne is my daughter.

11012818.Content: 首席炼金术师很喜欢达芙涅，说她会成为未来帝国最优秀的炼金术师。他早已宣布不再招收学生，却为这孩子破例了。
11012818.Subtitle: The chief alchemist thinks very highly of Daphne and believes she has what it takes to become the Empire's top alchemist. He'd sworn off taking more apprentices, but he made an exception for this kid.

11012820.Content: 她确实在炼金术上很有天赋，但佩剑炼金院那种地方，最不缺的就是天才。首席炼金术师说，达芙涅是特别的，因为她拥有一些其他炼金术师没有的东西。
11012820.Subtitle: She's talented, but it's more than that. The Spathatoi is never short on talent. The chief alchemist said Daphne has a unique gift that sets her apart.

11012821.Content: 他的话我也没听太明白，但有一点是明确的，达芙涅有很好的前途。所以，绝对不能有一个卡戎之民的父亲阻碍她的道路——她母亲是这样认为的。
11012821.Subtitle: I don't quite understand what he meant by that, but it's clear that Daphne has a promising future. So, we must not let a Charon father stand in her way — at least that's what her mother thought.

11012823.Content: 不知道。她打小心思就单纯，也很黏我，怎么能告诉她这个。
11012823.Subtitle: No. She has a heart of gold and adores her old man. How can I tell her?

11012824.Content: 所以我就装作是一个抛妻弃女的坏父亲，她走在路上叫我爸爸，我就会跟她说，“闭嘴，叫什么爸爸、套什么近乎呢，叫长官。”
11012824.Subtitle: So, I play the part of a bad father who's done with family life. And when Daphne calls me dad, I tell her, "Zip it. I'm not your father. Address me as your superior officer."

11012825.Content: 可她还是太懂事了，连骂我的话都骂不出口，只能和自己闹别扭。
11012825.Subtitle: But Daphne's such a sweet kid. She couldn't bring herself to curse at me, and always ended up blaming herself instead.

11012826.Content: 她其实并不喜欢炼金院。您和夫人应该考虑一下她的想法。
11012826.Subtitle: Actually, she doesn't like the Academy. Perhaps you and the missus should also take her preferences into consideration.

11012827.Content: 我已经知道了。这次她非要转到龙莎特别行动队来，她母亲怎么劝都不听，还瞒着我向富尔维斯递交申请，可见她是真的不想待在炼金院了。
11012827.Subtitle: I knew about that already. Daphne volunteered to join the Lonza Fortress mission and refused to be dissuaded by her mother. She even submitted her application to Fulvis behind my back. That girl was dead set on quitting the Academy.

11012828.Content: ……等回去，我和她母亲好好谈谈吧。
11012828.Subtitle: ...I'll talk to her mother about this when we return.

11012829.Content: 您也牺牲了很多……辛苦了。
11012829.Subtitle: You've made a huge sacrifice... You're a good father.

11012830.Content: ……我倒是希望她再多记恨我一些，至少这样，她自己会好过点。
